GSP28msbh1-7u:693: 273*} nāstīty avagacchāmaḥ. na ca tasmin asati vijñānasadbhāvo 'nupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:694: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. kṣaṇikatvaṃ cāsya pratyakṣapūrvakam eva. na ca jñātari vijñānād anyasmin asati jñāne cānitye aparedyur icchānupapannā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:698: 275*} eṣiteti. idaṃ tu dṛṣṭaṃ yat kvacid anyena dṛṣṭam anya icchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:699: kvacin na. samānāyāṃ santatāv anya icchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:701: atrocyate - na hy asmartāra icchantīty upapadyate. na cādṛṣṭapūrve{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:705: pūrvavijñānaviṣayaṃ vā smṛtir ity ucyate. tac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:708: pratyakṣāvagatatvād eva. anyasmin skandhaghane 'nyena skandhaghanena yaj jñānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:710: 279*} nātatsantatijena. tasmāc chūnyāḥ skandhaghanā iti. athāsminn arthe{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:711: 280*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:714: atrocyate{*1/282*} - naitad evam. anyedyur dṛṣṭe 'paredyuḥ - aham idam adarśam iti bhavati pratyayaḥ. pratyagātmani caitad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:728: 287*} vayam - imam arthaṃ vayam evānyedyur upalabhāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:729: vayam evādya smarāma iti. tasmāt - vayam imam artham avagacchāmo vayam eva hyo,
GSP28msbh1-7u:732: 289*} hyo 'dya ca, na te vinaṣṭāḥ. athāpy asminn arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati. sa vā ayam ātmeti prakṛtyāmananty aśīryo na hi śīryata iti. tathāvināśī vā are 'yam ātmā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:734: 290*}. vinaśvaraṃ ca vijñānam. tasmād vinaśvarād anyaḥ sa{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:736: 292*} avagacchāmaḥ. na ca śakyam evam avagantum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:740: nopalabhyante tathā bhavantīti. tathā hi sati - śaśo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:742: 293*}. na cāhampratyayo vyāmoha iti śakyate vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:743: bādhakapratyayābhāvāt. tasmāt sukhādibhyo vyatirikto 'sti. evaṃ cet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:745: āha - yadi vijñānād anyad asti vijñātṛ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:746: vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām - idam tad īdṛśam ceti. na ca tan nidarśyate. tasmān na tato 'nyad astīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:747: atrocyate - svasaṃvedyaḥ sa bhavati. nāsāv anyena śakyate draṣṭum. katham asau nidarśyeteti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:749: 295*} kaścic cakṣuṣmān svayaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati na ca śaknoty anyasmai jātyandhāya tan nidarśayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:750: na ca tan na śakyate nidarśayitum ity etāvatā nāstīty avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:751: evam asau puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate na cānyasmai śaknoti darśayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:752: anyasya draṣṭus taṃ puruṣaṃ prati darśanaśaktyabhāvāt. so 'py anyaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam ātmānam upalabhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:754: 296*}. tena sarve svena svenātmanā ātmānam upalabhamānāḥ santy eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:756: 297*} iti. athāsmin arthe brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - śāntāyāṃ vāci kiṃjyotir evāyaṃ puruṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:759: 298*}. pareṇa nopalabhyata ity atrāpi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - agṛhyo na hi gṛhyateti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:760: 299*}. pareṇa na gṛhyata ity etadabhiprāyam etat. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:762: 300*} brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotir bhavatīti{*1/301*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:766: 304*}brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati - sa eṣa neti nety ātmeti hovāceti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:768: 306*} evaṃrūpa iti na śakyate nidarśayitum. yac ca paraḥ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:769: tatpratiṣedhas tasyopadeśopāyaḥ. śarīraṃ paraḥ paśyati. tenātmopadiśyate. śarīraṃ nātmā. asti śarīrād anyaḥ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:772: 309*} tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo 'nya upadiśyate. tathā parasthāḥ sukhādayaḥ pareṇa liṅgair upalabhyante. te 'pi nātmāna iti tatpratiṣedhena tebhyo{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:775: na tato 'nyaḥ puruṣa ity etad api puruṣapravṛttyānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:776: yadāsau puruṣaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāmikṛtānām arthānāṃ pratisamādhāne śeṣānuṣṭhāne ca yatate, ataḥ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:777: 311*} pravṛttyāvagamyate nūnam asāv anityān nityam avagacchatīti{*1/312*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:778: upamānāc copadiśyate yādṛśaṃ bhavān svayam ātmānaṃ paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:779: anenopamānenāvagaccha - aham api tādṛṣam eva paśyāmīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:780: yathā kaścid ātmīyāṃ vedanāṃ parasmā ācakṣīta - dahyamānasyeva me bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:782: 313*} me bhavatīti. ataḥ svayam avagamyamānatvād asti tadvyatiriktaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:783: yad apy{*1/314*} ucyate - vijñānam apāsya tan nidarśyatām iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:785: na śakyam upāyam antareṇopeyam upetum. ayam evābhyupāyo jñātavyānām arthānāṃ yo yathā jñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:786: sa tatheti. tad yathā - kaḥ śuklo nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:787: yatra śuklatvam asti. kiṃ śuklatvaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:789: yac chuklaśabda uccarite pratīyate. tasmān na vijñānaṃ pratyākhyāya kasyacid rūpaṃ nidarśayituṃ śakyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:790: na ca niyogataḥ pratyaye pratīte pratyayārthaḥ pratīto bhavati. apratīte 'pi hi pratyaye saty arthaḥ pratīyata eva. na hi vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:791: vijñeyo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣa ity etat pūrvam evoktam. tad avaśyakarta[24]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:792: 315*}vye 'pahnave kāmaṃ vijñānam apahnūyeta nārtha ity etad apy{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:793: 316*} uktam eva. tasmād asti sukhādibhyo 'nyo nityaḥ puruṣa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:794: atha yad uktaṃ vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:796: atrocyate - atraiva mā bhagavān mohāntam āpīpadad iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:804: yad uktam - na caiṣa yātīti vidhiśabda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:805: mā bhūd vidhiśabdaḥ. svargakāmo yajeteti vacanāntareṇāvagatam anuvadiṣyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ.

GSP28msbh1-7u:1288: uktam - nityaḥ śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandha iti. tad anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1290: punar asya kriyamāṇasyārthenākṛtakaḥ saṃbandho nopapadyate. na hi prathamaśrutāc
GSP28msbh1-7u:1291: chabdāt kaścid arthaṃ pratyeti. kathaṃ punar anityaḥ śabdaḥ. prayatnād uttarakālaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1292: dṛśyate yataḥ. ataḥ prayatnānantaryāt tena kriyata iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1293: nanv abhivyañjyāt sa enam. neti brūmaḥ. na hy asya prāg abhivyañjanāt sadbhāve kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. saṃś cābhivyajyate nāsan.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1295: no{*1 /322*} khalv apy uccaritaṃ muhūrtam apy upalabhāmahe. ato vinaṣṭa ity avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1296: na ca san nopalabhyate. anupalaṃbhakāraṇānāṃ vyavadhānādīnām abhāve 'py anupalambhanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1301: *{1/322: E1 gibt als v.l: na cainam uccaritaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1304: mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1305: na te nūnam avagacchanti sa evāyaṃ śabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1308: tad ekasya nityasyānupapannam iti. asati viśeṣe nityasya nānekatvam. kāryāṇāṃ tu bahūnāṃ nānādeśeṣu kriyamāṇānām upapadyate 'nekadeśasaṃbandhaḥ. tasmād apy anityaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1311: yakāro vikṛtir ity upapadiśanti. yad vikriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1315: api ca bahubhir uccārayadbhir mahān śabdaḥ śrūyate. sa yady abhivyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1316: bahubhir alpaiś coccāryamāṇas tāvān evopalabhyeta. ato manyāmahe nūnam asyaikaikena kaścid avayavaḥ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1321: 324*} uktam - prayatnād uttarakāle darśanāt kṛtako 'yam iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1322: 325*}. yadi vispaṣṭena hetunā śabdasya nityatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1323: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt prayatnenābhivyajyata iti bhaviṣyati. yadi prāg uccāraṇād anabhivyaktaḥ prayatnenābhivyajyate. tasmād ubhayoḥ pakṣayoḥ samam etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1328: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - uccaritapradhvasta iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1329: 326*}. atrāpi yadi śakṣyāmo nityatām asya vispaṣṭaṃ vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1330: tato nityapratyayasāmarthyāt kadācid upalambhaṃ kadācid anupalambhaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃcid
GSP28msbh1-7u:1331: upalambhasya nimittaṃ kalpayiṣyāmaḥ. tac ca saṃyogavibhāgasadbhāve sati bhavatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:1332: saṃyogavibhāgāv evābhivyañjakāv iti vakṣyāmaḥ. uparatayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayoḥ śrūyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:1333: iti cet. naitad evam. na nūnam uparamanti saṃyogavibhāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1334: yata upalabhyate śabda iti. na hi te pratyakṣā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1335: yadi śabdaṃ saṃyogavibhāgā evābhivyañjanti na kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1336: ākāśaviṣayatvāc chabdasyākāśasyaikatvād ya evāyam atra śrotrākāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1340: tasya vāyavīyāḥ saṃyogavibhāgā vāyvāśritatvād vāyuṣv eva kariṣyanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1341: yathā tantavas tantuṣv eva paṭam. tasya pāṭaliputreṣv anupalambho yuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1345: tena dūre yac chrotraṃ tena nopalabhyata iti. naitad evam. aprāptāś cet [28]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1346: 328*}saṃyogavibhāgāḥ śrotrasyopakuryuḥ. saṃnikṛṣṭavikṛṣṭadeśasthau yugapac chabdam upalabheyātām. na ca yugapad upalabhete. tasmān nāprāptā upakurvanti. na ced upakurvanti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1348: naitad evam. abhighātena hi preritā vāyavas timitāni{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1349: 330*} vāyvantarāṇi pratibādhamānāḥ sarvatodikkān saṃyogavibhāgān utpādayanti. yāvad
GSP28msbh1-7u:1350: vegam abhipratiṣṭhante. te ca vāyor apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogavibhāgā nopalabhyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1351: anuparateṣv eva teṣu śabda upalabhyate noparateṣu. ato na doṣaḥ. ata eva cānuvātaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1359: yad aparaṃ kāraṇam uktam - śabdaṃ kuru mā kārṣīr iti vyavahartāraḥ prayuñjate{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1367: *{1/333: E1,5; E2,6: saṃvāhe (E1 gibt saṃvāhe als Fn.)}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:1370: 334*} sato nānādeśeṣu yugapad darśanam anupapannam iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:1371: 335*}. ādityaṃ paśya devānāṃpriya. ekaḥ sann anekadeśāv asthita iva lakṣyate. kathaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:1372: punar avagamyata eka āditya iti. ucyate - prāṅmukho devadattaḥ pūrvāhne saṃprati
GSP28msbh1-7u:1373: purastād ādityaṃ paśyati. tasya dakṣiṇato 'vasthito na dvau paśyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1376: 337*} tasmād eka āditya iti. dūratvād asya deśo nāvadhāryate. ato vyāmohaḥ. evaṃ śabde 'pi vyāmohād anavadhāraṇaṃ deśasya. yadi śrotraṃ saṃyogavibhāgadeśam āgatya śabdaṃ gṛhṇīyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1377: tathāpi tāvad anekadeśatā kadācid avagamyeta. na ca tatsaṃyogadeśam āgacchati. pratyakṣā hi karṇaśaṣkulī taddeśā
GSP28msbh1-7u:1378: gṛhyate. vāyavīyāḥ punaḥ saṃyogavibhāgā apratyakṣasya vāyoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:1379: karṇaśaṣkulīpradeśe prādurbhavanto nopalabhyanta iti nānupapannam. ata eva vyāmoho yan nānādeśeṣu śabda iti. ākāśadeśaś ca śabda iti. ekaṃ ca punar ākāśam. ato 'pi na nānādeśeṣu.
GSP28msbh1-7u:1380: api caikarūpye sati deśabhedena kāmaṃ deśā eva bhinnāḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2391: 553*} aśvinor abhidhānāni dvivacanāntāni lakṣyante. anenāśvinoḥ kāmam aprā ity{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2392: 554*} āśvinaṃ sūktam avagamyate. devatābhidhānāni ca ghaṭante jarbharītyevamādīni. avayavaprasiddhyā ca laukikenārthena viśeṣyante. evaṃ sarvatra.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2402: *{1/557: E2 nimmt den Kommentar irrtümlicherweise als eigenes Sūtra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:2405: 559*} vidhānād vivakṣitārthānām eva mantrāṇāṃ bhavati liṅgeṇopadeśaḥ. yadi te 'gniprayojanāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2410: ūhadarśanaṃ ca vivakṣitārthānām eva bhavati. kim ūhadarśanam. na pitā vardhate, na māteti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2411: 560*}. anye vardhanta iti gamyate. pratyakṣaṃ kaumārayauvanasthāvirair vardhante
GSP28msbh1-7u:2412: mātrādayaḥ. śabdo na vardhata iti brūte. kā punaḥ śabdasya vṛddhiḥ. yad dvivacanabahuvacanasaṃyogaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2416: vidhiśabdāś ca vivakṣitārthān eva mantrān anuvadanti - śataṃ himāḥ śataṃ varṣāṇi jīvyāsam ity etad evāheti{*1/561*}. [64]{*1/562*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2419: dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syāt // MS_1,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2420: evaṃ tāvat kṛtsnasya vedasya prāmāṇyam uktam. athedānīṃ yatra na vaidikaṃ śabdam upalabhemahi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2421: atha ca smaranti - evam ayam artho 'nuṣṭhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2422: etasmai ca prayojanāyeti. kim asau tathaiva syān na veti. yathā - aṣṭakāḥ kartavyāḥ;
GSP28msbh1-7u:2426: śikhākarma kartavyam ityevamādayaḥ. tad ucyate - dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syād iti. śabdalakṣaṇo dharma ity uktam{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2427: 563*} - codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ iti. ato nirmūlatvān nāpekṣitavyam iti. nanu ye vidur ittham asau padārthaḥ kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2428: katham iva te vadiṣyanty akartavya evāyam iti. smaraṇānupapattyā, na{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2429: 564*} hy ananubhūto 'śruto vārthaḥ smaryate. na cāsyāvaidikasyālaukikasya ca smaraṇam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2430: pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvād iti. yā hi bandhyā smareta - idaṃ me dauhitrakṛtam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2432: na jātucid asau pratīyāt - samyag etaj jñānam iti. evam api yathaiva pāramparyeṇāvicchedād ayaṃ veda iti pramāṇam eṣāṃ smṛtiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2433: evam iyam api pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. naitad evam. pratyakṣeṇopalabdhatvād granthasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2434: nānupapannaṃ pūrvavijñānam. aṣṭakādiṣu tv adṛṣṭārtheṣu pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvād vyāmohasmṛtir
GSP28msbh1-7u:2435: eva gamyate. tad yathā kaścij jātyandho vadet - smarāmy aham asya rūpaviśeṣasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2436: kutas te pūrvavijñānam iti ca paryanuyukto jātyandham evāparaṃ vinirdiśeta. tasya [65]{*1 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:2437: 565*} kutaḥ? jātyandhāntarāt. evaṃ jātyandhaparamparāyām api satyāṃ naiva jātucit saṃpratīyur vidvāṃsaḥ samyagdarśanam etad iti. ato nādartavyam evaṃjātīyakam anapekṣaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2441: api vā kartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam anumānaṃ syāt // MS_1,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2442: api veti pakṣo vyāvartyate. pramāṇaṃ smṛtiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2443: vijñānaṃ hi tat. kim ity anyathā bhaviṣyati. pūrvavijñānam asya nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2444: kāraṇābhāvād iti cet. asyā eva smṛter draḍhimnaḥ kāraṇam anumāsyāmahe. tat tu nānubhavanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2445: anupapattyā. na hi manuṣyā ihaiva janmany evaṃjātīyakam artham anubhavituṃ śaknuvanti. janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryate. granthas tv anumīyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2447: nanu nopalabhanta evaṃjātīyakaṃ grantham. anupalabhamānā apy anumimīran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2448: vismaraṇam apy upapadyata iti. tad upapannatvāt pūrvavijñānasya tarivarṇikānāṃ smaratām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2449: vismaraṇasya copapannatvād granthānumānam upapadyata iti pramāṇaṃ smṛtiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2450: aṣṭakāliṅgāś ca mantrā vede dṛśyante - yāñ janāḥ pratinandantītyevamādayaḥ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2451: 566*}. tathā pratyupasthitaniyamānām ācārāṇāṃ dṛṣṭārthatvād eva prāmāṇyam - guror
GSP28msbh1-7u:2452: anugamāt prīto gurur adhyāpayiṣyati granthagranthibhedinaś ca nyāyān parituṣṭo vakṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2453: tathā ca darśayati - tasmāc chreyāṃsaṃ pūrvaṃ yantaṃ pāpīyān paścād anvetīti{*1 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:2455: na dharmāyety evāvagamyate. tathā ca darśanam - dhanvann iva prapā [66]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2456: 569*}. tathā - sthalayodakaṃ parigṛhṇantīti ca. gotracihnaṃ śikhākarma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2457: darśanaṃ ca - yatra bāṇāḥ saṃpatanti kumārā viśikhā iveti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2459: te tata eva pramāṇam. ye tv adṛṣṭārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2470: audumbarīṃ spṛṣṭvodgāyed iti śrutyā viruddham. aṣṭācatvāriṃśad vaṛṣāṇi vedabrahmacaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2471: jātaputraḥ kṛṣṇakeśo 'gnīn ādadhītety anena viruddham. krītarājako bhojyān na iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2472: tasmād agnīṣomīye saṃsthite yajamānasya gṛhe 'śitavyam ity anena viruddham. tat pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2473: kartṛsāmānyād ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - aśakyatvād vyamoha ity avagamyate. katham aśakyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2474: sparśavidhānān na sarvā śakyā veṣṭayitum udgāyatā spraṣṭuṃ ca. tām udgāyatā spraṣṭavyām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2475: avagacchantaḥ kenemaṃ saṃpratyayaṃ bādhemahi sarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇeneti brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2476: nanu nirmūlatvād vyāmohas tat smaraṇam iti vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ mūlaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. bhaved vaidikaṃ vacanaṃ mūlam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2477: yadi sparśanaṃ vyāmohaḥ. avyāmohe tv aśakyatvād anupapannam. yathānubhavanam anupapannam iti na kalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2478: tathā vaidikam api vacanam. kathaṃ tarhi sarvaveṣṭanasmaraṇam. vyāmohaḥ. kathaṃ vyāmohakalpanā. śrautavijñānavirodhāt. atha kim arthaṃ nemau vidhī vikalpye[67]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2479: 571*}te vrīhiyavavad bṛhadrathantaravad vā. nāsati vyāmohavijñāne vikalpo bhavati. yadi sarvaveṣṭanavijñānaṃ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2481: smṛtir vyāmohaḥ. vikalpaṃ tu vadan sparśanasya pakṣe tāvat prāmāṇyam anumanyate. tasya ca mūlaṃ śrutiḥ. sā cet pramāṇam anumatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2483: pakṣe tāvan na śaknoti śrutiṃ parikalpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2484: sparśavijñānena bādhitatvāt. tataś cāvyāmohe ca tasminn aśakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum. na cāsāv avyāmohaḥ pakṣe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2485: pakṣe vyāmoho bhaviṣyatīti. yad eva hi tasyaikasmin pakṣe mūlam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2486: tad evetarasminn api. ekasmiṃś cet pakṣe na vyāmohaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2487: śrutiprāmāṇyatulyatvād itaratrāpy avyāmohaḥ. na cāsāv ekasmin pakṣe śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2488: nibaddhākṣarā hi sā na pramādapāṭha iti śakyā gaditum. tena naitat pakṣe vijñānaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2489: vyāmohāt pakṣāntaraṃ saṃkrāntam ity avagamyate. tatra duḥśrutasvapnādivijñānamūlatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2490: ta sarvaveṣṭanasyeti virodhāt kalpyate. na hi tasya sati virodhe prāmāṇyam abhyupagantavyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2491: iti kiṃcid asti pramāṇam. tasmād yathaivaikasmin pakṣe na śakyā śrutiḥ kalpayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2494: api cetaretarāśraye 'nyataḥ paricchedāt. keyam itaretarāśrayatā. pramāṇāyāṃ smṛtau sparśanaṃ vyāmohaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2496: tad etad itaretrāśrayaṃ bhavati. tatra sparśanasya kḷptaṃ mūlaṃ kalpyaṃ smṛteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2497: so 'sāv anyataḥ paricchedaḥ. kalpyamūlatvāt smṛtiprāmāṇyam anavakḷptaṃ. tad aprāmāṇyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:2498: sparśanaṃ na vyāmohaḥ. tad avyāmohāt smārtaśrutikalpanānupapannā pramāṇābhāvāt. nanv
GSP28msbh1-7u:2499: evaṃ sati vrīhisādhanatvavijñānasyāpy avyāmohād yavaśrutir nopapadyeta. satyaṃ nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2500: yady apratyakṣā syāt. pratyakṣā tv eṣā. na hi pratyakṣam anupapannaṃ nāmāsti. dvayos tu śrutyor bhāvāt. dve hy ete vākye. tatraikena kevalayavasādhanatā gamyate, [68]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2501: 572*} ekena kevalavrīhisādhanatā. na ca vākyenāvagato 'rtho 'pahnūyate. tasmād vrīhiyavayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:2502: upapanno vikalpo bṛhadrathantarayoś ca. tasmād uktaṃ śrutiviruddhā smṛtir apramāṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2506: lobhād vāsa āditsamānā audumbarīṃ kṛtsnāṃ veṣṭitavantaḥ kecit. tat smṛter bījam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2507: bubhukṣamāṇāḥ kecit krītarājakasya bhojanam ācaritavantaḥ. apuṃstvaṃ pracchādayantaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:2508: cāṣṭācatvāriṃśad varṣāṇi vedabrahmacaryaṃ caritavantaḥ. tata eṣā smṛtir ity avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2510: yūpahastino dānam ācarantīti. tatkartṛsāmānyāt pramāṇam iti prāpte{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2511: 573*}. apramāṇaṃ smṛtiḥ. atrānyan mūlam. lobhād ācaritavantaḥ kecit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2512: tata eṣā smṛtiḥ. upapannataraṃ caitad vaidikavacanakalpanāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2518: dakṣiṇācāreṇa kartavyam ityevaṃlakṣaṇāny udāharaṇāni. kim etāni śrutiviruddhāni na kartavyāni utāviruddhāni kāryāṇīti. [69]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2520: tair apy anuṣṭhīyamānair vaidīkaṃ kiṃcin na kupyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2525: naitad evam. śāstraparicchinnaṃ hi kramaṃ bādheran. katham. vedaṃ kṛtvā vediṃ kurvītetīmāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2526: śrutim uparundhyād antarā vedaṃ vediṃ cānuṣṭḥīyamānam ācamanādi. dakṣiṇena caikahastenānuṣṭhīyamāneṣu
GSP28msbh1-7u:2527: padārtheṣu kadācit pradhānaṃ svakālam atikrāmeta. ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ anutiṣṭhan
GSP28msbh1-7u:2529: api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe prayuktāni pratīyeran // MS_1,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2530: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. agṛhyamāṇakāraṇā evaṃjātīyakāḥ pramāṇam. nanu kramakālau virundhanti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2531: 577*}. naiṣa doṣaḥ. ācamanaṃ padārthaḥ padārthānāṃ ca guṇaḥ kramaḥ. na ca guṇānurodhena
GSP28msbh1-7u:2532: padārtho na kartavyo bhavati. api ca prāptānāṃ padārthānām uttarakālaṃ krama āpatati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2535: kena saha virodho bhaviṣyatīti. tathā yadi dakṣiṇena nācaryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2537: tatra kālānurodhena padārtho nānyathātvam abhyupagacchet. prayogāṅgaṃ hi kālaḥ padārthānām
GSP28msbh1-7u:2538: upakārakaḥ. ato na kālānurodhena vyathayitavyaḥ padārthaḥ. api ca śaucaṃ dakṣiṇācāratā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2539: yajñopavītitvaṃ caivaṃjātīyakā arthā vyavadhātāro na bhavanti. sarvapadārthānāṃ [70]{*1 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:2544: teṣv adarśanād virodhasya samā vipratipattiḥ syāt // MS_1,3.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2547: 579*}; vaitase kaṭe prājāpatyān saṃcinotīti yavavarāhavetasaśabdān samāmananti. tatra kecid dīrghaśūkeṣu yavaśabdaṃ prayuñjante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2555: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yavaśabdo yadi dīrghaśūkeṣu sādṛśyāt priyaṅguṣu bhaviṣyati. yadi priyaṅguṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2557: 581*} kṣīṇe bhavanti dīrghaśūkāḥ priyaṅgavaś caitat tayoḥ sādṛśyam. kaḥ punar atra
GSP28msbh1-7u:2558: niścayaḥ. ya śāstrasthānāṃ sa śabdārthaḥ. ke śāstrasthāḥ. śiṣṭāḥ. teṣām avicchinnā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2559: smṛtiḥ śabdeṣu vedeṣu ca. tena śiṣṭā nimittaṃ śrutismṛtyavadhāraṇe. te hy evaṃ samāmananti
GSP28msbh1-7u:2560: yavamayeṣu karambhapātreṣu vihiteṣu vākyaśeṣam - yatrānyā oṣadhayo mlāyante,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2563: yavaśabda iti gamyate. tasmāt priyaṅguṣu gauṇaḥ. tasmād dīrghaśūkānāṃ puroḍāśaḥ kartavyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2567: 587*} hi gāvo 'nudhāvanti. vañjulo 'psu jāyate. jambūvṛkṣa sthale girinadīṣu vā.

GSP28msbh1-7u:2583: cetareṣām. tasmād dhātuto 'rthaḥ kalpayitavya ityevaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - coditam aśiṣṭair
GSP28msbh1-7u:2587: na nyāyyaṃ tyaktum. yat tu śiṣṭācāraḥ pramāṇam iti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2589: - abhiyuktatarāḥ pakṣiṇāṃ poṣaṇe bandhane ca mlecchāḥ. yat tu nigamaniruktavyākaraṇānām arthavatteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2591: na yatra mlecchair apy avagataḥ śabdārthaḥ. api ca - nigamādibhir arthe kalpayamāne 'vyavasthitaḥ śabdārtho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2592: tatrāniścayaḥ syāt. tasmāt pika iti kokilo grāhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2595: sata iti dārumayaṃ pātram parimaṇḍalaṃ śatachidram. [72]{*1/589*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2601: kauṇḍinyakam ityevaṃlakṣaṇakāni kiṃ pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ veti saṃdigdhāni. kiṃ prāptam.

GSP28msbh1-7u:2607: pramāṇāntareṇa vacanenāvagatam iti na doṣaḥ. vedavākyaiś caiṣāṃ tulya ādaraḥ. tasmāt pramāṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2618: 593*}. nātra vidhir gamyate vartamānakālapratyayanirdeśāt. na cātra vākyaśeṣaḥ stāvako 'sti. tasmād{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2620: sa nāntarīyakatvād vedavākyamiśrasamāmnānāt. yat tu śrutir iti naitat,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2641: anumānāt smṛter ācārāṇāṃ ca prāmāṇyam iṣyate. yenaiva hetunā te pramāṇam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:2656: api veti pakṣavyāvṛttiḥ. evaṃjātīyakaḥ sarvadharmaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tannyāyatvād vidhānasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2657: vidhīyate 'neneti vidhānaṃ śabdaḥ. so 'numīyate smṛtyāḥ. na ca tasyākṛtivacanatā
GSP28msbh1-7u:2661: yo 'numīyeta. tasmāt sarvadharmatā vidher nyāyyā. kutaḥ. padārthāḥ kartavyā iti pramāṇam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2662: vyavasthāyāṃ tu na kiñcit pramāṇam asti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2670: idaṃ padebhyaḥ kebhyaścid uttaraṃ sūtram. kāni tāni padāni. atha kim arthaṃ na liṅgād vyavasthā. yathā - śuklo hotā iti. nāsti tan nityam eṣāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2671: yad yathādarśanam anuvartate. ye 'pi śyāmā bṛhanto lohitākṣāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2672: te 'pi na sarva ārhnīnaibukādīn kurvate. anevaṃliṅgā api cānutiṣṭhanti. tasmān na vyavasthā. śuklo hoteti pratyakṣā śrutiḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2674: atha kasmān na samākhyayā niyamaḥ. ye dākṣiṇātyā iti samākhyātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2675: ta āhnīnaibukādīn kariṣyanti. ya udīcyā iti samākhyātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2677: te holākādīn. yathā - rājā rājasūyeneti. naitad evam. deśasaṃyogād ākhyā bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2678: dākṣiṇadeśān nirgataḥ prākṣu vodakṣu vāvasthita āhnīnaibukādīn karoty eva. udīcyāś
GSP28msbh1-7u:2680: 603*}, prācyāś ca holākādīn. anyadeśaś ca deśāntaragato na niyogataḥ parapadārthān{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2687: na syād deśāntareṣv iti cet // MS_1,3.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2688: iti cet paśyasi - yadi deśasaṃyogād ākhyā bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2689: deśāntarasthasya na bhavet. bhavati ca deśānatarasthasya māthura ity asaṃbaddhasyāpi mathurayā. tasmān na deśasaṃyogād ākhyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2691: deśasaṃyoganimittāyām apy ākhyāyāṃ deśān nirgatasya tadākhyā na viruddhā. yata eṣā yogākhyā yogamātrāpekṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2692: na bhūtavartamānabhaviṣyatsaṃbandhāpekṣā. yato dṛśyate - mathurām abhiprasthito māthura iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2693: mathurāyāṃ vasan mathurāyā nirgataś ca. yasya tv ato 'nyatamaḥ saṃbandho nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2694: na sa māthuraḥ. tasmān na samākhyayā vyavasthā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2696: atha kasmān na karmāṅgaṃ deśaḥ. yaḥ kṛṣṇamṛtikāprāyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2697: sa āhnīnaibukādīnām. yathā - prācīnapravaṇe vaiśvadevena yajeteti{*1/607*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2705: tathānyaliṅge 'pi kurvanti. tasmān na deśato vyavasthā. prācīnapravaṇaṃ tu śrutyā niyataṃ vaiśvadevasya. [76]{*1/610*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:2709: prayogotpattyaśāstratvāc chabdeṣu na vyavasthā syāt // MS_1,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2711: 611*} śabdā udāharaṇam. gośabdo yathā sāsnādim iti pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2712: kiṃ tathā gāvyādayo 'py uta neti saṃdehaḥ. kim atraikaḥ śabdo 'vicchinnapāramparyo 'rthābhidhāyī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2714: uta sarve 'nādayaḥ. sarva iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. pratyayāt. pratīyate hi gāvyādibhyaḥ sāsnādimān arthaḥ. tasmād ito varṣaśate 'py asyārthasya saṃbandha āsīd eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2716: tataś ca paratareṇety anāditā. kartā cāsya saṃbandhasya nāstīti vyavasthitam eva. tasmāt sarve sādhavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2717: sarvair bhāṣitavyam. sarve hi sādhayanty artham. yathā - hastaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2719: pāṇir iti. arthāya hy eta uccāryante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2720: nādṛṣṭāya. na hy eṣām uccāraṇe śāstram asti. tasmān na vyavatiṣṭheta kaścid eka eva sādhur itare 'sādhava iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2726: mahatā prayatnena śabdam uccaranti - vāyur nābher utthitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2730: vaktre vicaran vividhān śabdān abhivyanakti. tatrāparādhyetāpy uccārayitā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2732: sakṛd upasprakṣyāmīti dvir upaspṛśati. tato 'parādhāt pravṛttā gāvyādayo bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2736: na caiṣa nyāyaḥ yat sadṛśāḥ śabdā ekam artham abhiniviśamānāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2738: sādṛśyāt sādhuśabde 'py avagate pratyayo 'vakalpyate. tasmād amīṣām eko 'nādir anye 'pabhraṃśāḥ. hastaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2740: pāṇir ityevamādiṣu tv abhiyuktopadeśād anādir amīṣām arthena saṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2743: 613*} tattvaṃ śakyaṃ vijñātum. śakyam ity āha. arthino hy abhiyuktā bhavanti. dṛśyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:2744: cābhiyuktānāṃ guṇayatām avismaraṇam upapannam. pratyakṣaṃ caitad guṇyamānaṃ na bhraśyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:2752: ata eṣām apy anādiarthena saṃbandha iti. tadaśaktir eṣāṃ gamyate. gośabdam uccārayitukāmena kenacid aśaktyā gāvīty uccāritam. apareṇa jñātaṃ sāsnādimān asya vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2753: tad arthaṃ gaur ity uccārayitukāmo gāvīty uccārayati. [78]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2754: 615*} tataḥ śikṣitvāpare 'pi sāsnādim iti vivakṣite gāvīty uccārayanti. tena gāvyādibhyaḥ sāsnādimān avagamyate. anurūpo hi gāvyādigośabdasya.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2757: ata eva hi vibhaktivyatyaye 'pi pratyayo bhavati. aśmakair āgacchāmīty aśmakaśabdaikadeśa upalabdhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2758: aśmakebhya ity eva śabdaḥ smaryate. tato 'śmakebhya ity eṣo 'rtha upalabhyata iti. evaṃ gāvyādidarśanād gośabdasmaraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2761: atha gaur ityevamādayaḥ śabdāḥ kim ākṛteḥ pramāṇam uta vyakter iti saṃdehaḥ. ucyate. idaṃ tāvat parīkṣyatām - kiṃ ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2762: ta eva vaidikā utānya iti. yadā ta eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2765: utānya iti saṃśayaḥ. tatrānye laukikāḥ śabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2766: anye vaidikā anye caiṣām arthā iti brūmaḥ. kutaḥ. vyapadeśabhedād rūpabhedāc ca. ime laukikāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2767: ime vaidikā iti vyapadeśabhedaḥ. agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad ity{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2768: 616*} anyad idaṃ rūpaṃ laukikād agniśabdāt. śabdānyatvāc ca na ta evārthāḥ. api ca samāmananti - uttānā vai devagavā vahantīti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2770: ta uttānā vahantīty ukte gamyata eva - ya uttānā vahanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2772: 618*}iti. tasmād anyo vaidikagośabdasyārthaḥ. tathā - devebhyo vanaspate havīṃṣi hiraṇyaparṇa pradivaste artham iti{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2774: 620*} vanaspatir vede. etad vai daivyaṃ madhu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2776: 621*} veda ghṛte madhuśabdaḥ. tasmād amīṣām anye 'rthā iti prāpte brūmaḥ - ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2778: ta evaiṣām arthā iti. kutaḥ. prayogacodanābhāvāt. evaṃ prayogacodanā saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2780: ta evārthāḥ. itarathā śabdānyatve 'rtho na pratīyeta. tasmād ekaśabdatvam iti. ucyate prayojanam idam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2781: hetur vyapadiśyatām iti. tato hetur ucyate - avibhāgād iti. na teṣām eṣāṃ ca vibhāgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:2782: upalabhāmahe. ata evaikaśabdatvam. tāṃś ca tāṃś cārthān avagacchāmaḥ. ato nānyatvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:2783: ca vadāmaḥ. yac coktam - ya uttānā vadanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2786: sa vanaspatir iti. nāsti vacanaṃ yad uttānānāṃ vahatāṃ gotvaṃ brūyāt. ye gāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2787: ta uttānā vahantīty evaṃ tat. yadi cānena vacanena gotvaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2788: uttānā vahantīty anuvādaḥ syāt. na cottānā vahantaḥ prasiddhāḥ kecit. te niyogato vidhātavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2789: teṣu vidhīyamāneṣu na śakyaṃ gotvaṃ vidhātum. bhidyate hi tathā vākyam. yadi cānye vaidikāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2790: tata uttānādīnām artho na gamyeta. tatra natarāṃ śakyetāvijñātalakṣaṇaṃ gotvaṃ vijñātum. na cottānavahanavacanam apy anarthakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2792: hiraṇyaparṇatā ca vanaspateḥ. tasmāt ta eva śabdā arthāś ca.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2794: tadā saṃdehaḥ - kim ākṛtiḥ śabdārtho 'tha vyaktir iti. kā punar ākṛtiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2795: kā vyaktir iti. dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyamātram ākṛtiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2800: tad ucyate - vyaktiḥ śabdārtha iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2801: prayogacodanābhāvāt. ālambhanaprokṣaṇaviśasanādīnāṃ prayogacodanā ākṛtyarthe na saṃbhaveyuḥ. yatroccāraṇānarthakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2802: tatra vyaktyarthaḥ. ato 'nyatrākṛtivacana iti cet. uktam{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2803: 623*} - anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. kathaṃ sāmānyāvagatir iti cet. vyaktipadārthasyākṛtiś cihnabhūtā bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2805: sa gaur iti. yathā yasya daṇḍo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2807: na ca daṇḍavacano daṇḍiśabdaḥ. evam ihāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2821: yady ākṛtiḥ śabdārtho bhavet. ṣaḍ deyā dvādaśa deyā{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2822: 624*} caturviṃśatir deyā iti. na hy ākṛtiḥ ṣaḍādibhiḥ saṃkhyābhir yujyate. tasmān nākṛtivacanaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2829: anyasyālambho nopapadyate. anyasvāpi paśudravyasya saivākṛtiḥ. tasmād vyaktivacana iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2833: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. ākṛti śabdārthaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:2836: yady ākṛtyarthaḥ śyenaśabdaḥ. vyaktivacane tu na cayanena śyenavyakti[81]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2837: 627*}r utpādayituṃ śakyata ity aśakyārthavacanād anarthakaḥ. tasmād ākṛtivacanaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2838: nanu śyenavyaktibhiś cayanam anuṣṭhāsyate. na sādhakatamaḥ śyenaśabdārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2839: īpsitatamo hy asau śyenaśabdena nirdiśyate. ataś cayanena śyeno nivartayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2841: nanūbhayatra kriyāyā asaṃbhava eva vyapadiśyate. nākṛtiḥ śabdārthaḥ. kutaḥ. kriyā na saṃbhaved ākṛtau śabdārthe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2845: 629*}, śyenacitaṃ cinvīta iti. yad apy ucyate - vrīhīn prokṣatīti vyaktilakṣaṇārthākṛtir iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2846: śakyam anyatrāpi śyenacitaṃ cinvīta iti vaditum ākṛtilakṣaṇārthā vyaktir iti. kiṃ punar atra jyāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2847: ākṛtiḥ śabdārtha iti. yadi vyaktiḥ śabdārtho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2848: vyaktyantare na prayujyeta. atha vyaktyantare prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2850: sarvasāmānyaviśeṣavinirmuktā hi vyaktir ity. ucyate - naiṣa doṣaḥ. vyaktyantare sarvasāmānyaviśeṣavinirmukta
GSP28msbh1-7u:2851: eva pravartiṣyate. yadi vyaktyantare sarvasāmānyaviśeṣaviyukte pravartiṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2852: sāmānyam eva tarhi tat. nety ucyate - yo hy arthaḥ sāmānyasya viśeṣāṇāṃ cāśrayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2853: sā vyaktiḥ. vyaktivacanaś ca śabdo na sāmānye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2854: na viśeṣe vartate. teṣāṃ tv āśrayam evābhidadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2855: tena vyaktyantare vṛttir adoṣaḥ. na hi tat sāmānyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2857: sarvasāmānyaviśeṣaviyuktāyām aśvavyaktau gośabdaḥ kim iti na vartate. āha - yeṣv eva prayogo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2859: na sarvatra. na cāśvavyaktau gośabdasya prayogo dṛṣṭaḥ. tasmāt tatra na vartiṣyate. yadi yatra [82]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2862: adyajātāyāṃ gavi prathamaprayogo na prāpnoti tatrādṛṣṭatvāt. sāmānyapratyayaś ca na prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2866: iyaṃ vā gaur iti syāt. bhavati tu sāmānyapratyayo 'dṛṣṭapūrvāyām api govyaktau. tasmān na prayogāpekṣo gośabdo vyaktivacana iti śakyata āśrayitum. evaṃ tarhi śakteḥ svabhāva eṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2870: evam etad bhaviṣyatīti. naivaṃ sidhyati. na hy etad gamyate kasyāṃcid vyaktau vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2872: gotvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. yatra gotvaṃ tasyāṃ vyaktāv iti. evaṃ tarhi viśiṣṭā vyaktiḥ pratīyeta. yadi ca viśiṣṭā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2873: pūrvataraṃ viśeṣaṇam avagamyeta. na hy apratīte viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaṃ kecana pratyetum arhantīti. astu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2875: viśeṣyatvena vyaktim. na hy ākṛtipadārthakasya vyaktir na padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2876: vyaktipadārthakasya vā nākṛtiḥ. ubhayam ubhayasya padārthaḥ. kasyacit kiṃcit prādhānyena vivakṣitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2879: naitad evam. ubhayor ucyamānayor guṇapradhānabhāvaḥ syāt. yadi cātrākṛtiḥ pratīyate śabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2880: tadā vyaktir api padārtha iti na śakyate vaditum. kutaḥ. ākṛtir hi vyaktyā nityasaṃbaddhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2881: saṃbandhinyāṃ ca tasyām avagatāyāṃ saṃbandhyantaram avagamyate. tad etad ātmapratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2882: yac chabda uccarite vyaktiḥ pratīyata iti. kiṃ śabdād utākṛter iti vibhāgo na pratyakṣaḥ. so 'nvayavyatirekābhyām avagamyate. antareṇāpi śabdam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2884: 631*} vyaktim. yas tūccarite 'pi śabde mānasād apacārāt kadācid ākṛtiṃ nopalabheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2885: na jātucid asāv imāṃ vyaktim avagaccheta. nanu vyaktiviśiṣṭāyām ākṛtau vartate. [83] vyaktiviśiṣṭāyāṃ ced varteta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2886: vyaktyantaraviśiṣṭā na pratīyeta. tasmāc chabda ākṛtipratyayasya nimittam. ākṛtipratyayo vyaktipratyayasyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2887: nanu guṇabhūtā pratīyata ity uktam. na guṇabhāvo 'smatpakṣasya bādhakaḥ. sarvathā tāvat pratīyate. arthād guṇabhāvaḥ pradhānabhāvo vā. svārthaṃ ced uccāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2893: atha ca daṇḍaviśiṣṭo 'vagamyate. evam ihāpi na tāvad ākṛtir abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2894: atha cākṛtiviśiṣṭā vyaktir gamyeteti. naitat sādhu ucyate. satyaṃ daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍo
GSP28msbh1-7u:2895: nābhidhīyate. na tv apratīte daṇḍe daṇḍipratyayo 'sti. asti tu daṇḍiśabdaikadeśabhūto daṇḍaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2896: yena daṇḍaḥ pratyāyitaḥ. tasmāt sādhv etad,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2897: yat - pratīte viśeṣaṇe viśiṣṭaḥ pratīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2901: na gośabda ākṛtivacana iti. na ca yathā daṇḍiśabdo na daṇḍe prayuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2902: evaṃ gośabdo nākṛtau. tadartham eva nidarśitaṃ kevalākṛtyabhidhānaḥ śyenaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2903: tad evam anvayavyatirekābhyām asati śyenavyaktisaṃbandhe śyenaśabdoccāraṇād ākṛtivacana
GSP28msbh1-7u:2904: iti gamyate. na tu vrīhyākṛtisaṃbandham antareṇa vrīhivyaktau śabdasya prayogo dṛṣṭaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2905: tasmād ākṛtivacanaḥ śabda ity etaj jyāyaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:2912: na kriyā syād iti ced arthāntare vidhānaṃ na dravyam iti cet // MS_1,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:2913: atha yad uktam - na kriyā saṃbhaved vrīhin prokṣatīti. [84]{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2915: ṣaḍ deyā iti anyadarśanavacanaṃ ca na syāt, anyaṃ{*1/
GSP28msbh1-7u:2923: prokṣaṇaṃ hi dravyasya kartavyatayā śrūyate. katamasya. yad yajati sādhanam. apūrvaprayuktatvāt tasya nākṛteḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:2924: aśakyatvāt. tatra vrīhiśabda ākṛtivacanaḥ prayujyate prokṣaṇāśrayaviśeṣaṇāya. sa hy ākṛtiṃ pratyāyayiṣyati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:4333: bahupade bhedānāṃ saṃsargāṇāṃ ca bahutvāt. ekaprayojanatvād upapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4336: tat vākyam. nanv atra devasya tvā savituḥ prasave nirvapāmīty ekaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4338: evaṃ bahūni vākyāni. yadi nirvapāmīty anuṣaṅgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4342: tadā pratipradhānaṃ bhidyeta. na ca nirvāpo devasya tvetyevamādīnām arthenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4343: sādhanaprādhānye hy adṛṣṭārthatā vacasya syāt. nirvāpe punaḥ pradhāne dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ nirvāpaprakāśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4344: tat sarvair viśeṣaṇair viśiṣṭam ucyate. tasmād avirodhaḥ. yathā ca padaṃ padena viśeṣyate tathoktaṃ tadbhūtānām iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4352: aryamā vāṃ vibhajatv ity ekārthāḥ sarve vibhāgam abhidadhati. nanu bhagaviśiṣṭād vibhāgād aryam aviśiṣṭo 'nyo vibhāgaḥ. nety ucyate, [133]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4357: vibhāge tu na sākāṅkṣam. tasmād bhinnam idaṃ vākyaṃ vibhāge vikalpyate. tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā susevaṃ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4358: 162*}. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medhaḥ sumanasyamāna iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4361: sadanakaraṇaṃ puroḍāśapratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca. tasmād bhinne vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4378: kim evamādiṣu bhinnaṃ vākyam utaikam iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4380: īṣe tvety evam ukte na kiṃcid dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4384: evam alyīyasy adṛṣṭānumānakalpanā bhaviṣyati. tasmād ekaṃ vākyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4385: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sameṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4388: ūrje tvety anenāparaḥ. nanu idānīm evoktaṃ nātra dṛṣṭo 'rtha iti. yady api pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena nopalabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4393: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity āyuḥkḷpter anyā prāṇakḷptiḥ. nanu sāmānyamātram idaṃ tan na viśeṣaṇabhedād bhedam arhatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4395: 168*} nirvāpa ekas tasya viśeṣāḥ savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ puṣṇo{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4397: na teṣāṃ bhedān nirvāpasya bheda iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4399: nāsāv āyurādibhir viśeṣair bhinno bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate - iha kḷptīr vācayatīti bahvaḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4402: tatraikām āyuḥkḷptim āyuḥyajñena kalpatām ity eṣa mantraḥ śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4403: prāṇo yajñena kalpatām ity ayam api prāṇakḷptim aparām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4405: tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanam. tasmād anekārthatvāt tatrāpi vākyabheda iti. nanu sāmānyavacanād ekatvaṃ yathā vibhāge. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4406: vibhāge dṛṣṭārthaṃ sāmānyam iha na. api ca kḷptīr vācayatīti vihitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4407: āyuḥyajñena kalpatām iti cāyuḥkḷptyabhidhānam abhinivartyate pratyakṣam. prāṇo yajñena kalpatām iti ca prāṇakḷpteḥ. tasmād vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4416: ugraṃ vaco apāvadhīt tveṣaṃ vaco apāvadhīt svāhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4421: āhosvil laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4422: yā te agne rajāśayety etasya tanūr-varṣiṣṭheti na vākyaśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4423: na hy ayam asmāt paraḥ prayujyate. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - anuṣaṅgo vākyasamāptiḥ syāt tanūrvarṣiṣṭheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4424: yathaiva hy ayaṃ yā te agne 'yāśayety etasyānantaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4426: yā te agne harāśayety etayor api. harāśayety etasya vyavahita iti cet. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4429: 172*} samudāyena ca vākyaśeṣasya saṃbandhābhāvāt samudāyibhyāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4430: samudāyisaṃbandhe ca na gamyate viśeṣaḥ. tasmāt sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4431: api ca sākāṅkṣasya sannidhau paras tātpurastād vā paripūrṇasamarthaḥ śrūyamāṇo vākyaśeṣo bhavati. kiyāṃs tu kālaḥ sannidhir iti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4432: ucyate - yāvati śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum. kaś cāsau?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4434: tāvati hi śaknoty ubhāv apy apekṣitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4435: saṃbandhipadavyavāye hi saṃbandhād eva pūrvasaṃskāro nāpaiti. yatrāpy apareṇa sākāṅkṣena vyavāyas tatrāpy asti saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4436: dvayor api hi kāryaṃ vaktavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4440: tasmād yathaivāyam ekasya sannidhāv evam aparasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4445: avyavadhāne vicchede 'pi bhavati saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād anuṣaṅgaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4451: 174*} savitā punātv achidreṇa pavitreṇa vasoḥ sūryasya raśmibhir iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4452: 175*}, atra hi punātv antāni paripūrṇāni na kiṃcid ākāṅkṣanti. nanv achidreṇety etad ākāṅkṣiṣyati{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4458: ekena ca saṃbaddho nānarthako bhavati. tasmān netarāv ākāṅkṣatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4459: itarāv api paripūrṇatvān na tam ākāṅkṣataḥ. nanv etasya vākyaśeṣasyaikam apy ākāṅkṣato na gamyate viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4461: kena vā neti. tenānavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarvaiḥ saha saṃbhantsyate. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4463: yenāsya pratyakṣam ānantaryam upalabhāmahe tena saha saṃbhantsyata iti gamyate viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4465: 178*}ntsyata iti nāsti sarvatrānuṣaṅga iti. āha - naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4468: ekaś cāsau punātuśabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccaritaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4471: tatra tenaikavākyatvād achidreṇety ayam api prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4472: tathā ca sati citpatis tvetyevamādayo vinā punātuśabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4476: tena punātuśabdena sānuṣaṅgeṇa niyogataḥ sarve nirākāṅkṣīkartavyāḥ. tasmāt sarveṣu tulyaprayogā iti vākyaparisamāptir anuṣajyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4490: 182*} vātena gacchatām ity eṣa saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīti bahuvacanāntana vyavahitatvāt saṃyajñapatir āśiṣety atra nānuṣajyata{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4493: tato bahuvacanāntena saṃ yajatrair aṅgānīty etena saṃbandham anupetya vyavetatvāt pareṇa na saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4496: gamyamāne viśeṣe na tatra bhāvo vākyaśeṣasyopapadyate. tasmād bahuvacanāntasya parasya ca tadvyapetasya laukiko vākyaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti. [137]{*2/185*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4508: asti jyotiṣṭomas tatra śrūyate - somena yajeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4511: 186*}; yajati - dadāti - juhotayas te kiṃ saṃhatya kāryaṃ kurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4517: ekaikasmin hi śakyate śikyam avalambayitum. ato yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4519: juhotavyaḥ saṃhatya sādhayeyur viyutya veti jāyate saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4525: tasminn asati dṛṣṭaś cet śruto vā na virudhyate//
GSP28msbh1-7u:4526: virudhyamāne kalpyaḥ syāj jāyate tena so 'rthavān/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4530: bahubhya ekam apūrvam iti. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4532: avayavānāṃ samudāyaṃ praty arthavattvād ekam apūrvaṃ samudāyāt kalpitaṃ bhaviṣyati. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4534: avayavaśabdair eva samudāyasyoktatvāt. tasmāt samudāyaś cikīrṣitaḥ. atha vā yajetety etasya pūrvo bhāgo [138]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4538: evaṃ juhotīti pūrvo bhāgo juhoty artham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4539: uttaras tam evānuvadati. tenaikasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ trayo yajaty ādaya upāyā vidhīyante śrutyā. tasmād etair yāgadānahomair viśiṣṭāpūrvasya bhāvanā
GSP28msbh1-7u:4540: ata ucyate - saṃhatyaikam apūrvaṃ sādhayantīti. yad vā yajatiśabdena vihitaṃ dānaṃ dānahomaśabdenānūdyate guṇasambandhārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4542: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - pratiśabdam apūrvabheda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4546: śabdāntaratvāt. prayogavākyaśeṣabhāvena hi samudāyasya sattāsambandho gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4548: yajeta - iti sannihitayor api vākyena dānahomayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4550: na dānahomayoḥ. śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmān na samudāyaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4552: śabdāntaraṃ ca yajater dadātiḥ. tatra yady api paro bhāgo bhāvanāvacanaḥ sarveṣu samānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4554: anyaś ca tena samudāyaḥ śabdāntaram anyasmāt samudāyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4556: dadyād iti dānena sādhayed iti kevalam eva dānaṃ karaṇaṃ bhāvanāyāḥ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4557: na yāgahomau sahāyāv apekṣate. tathā juhotīti homasādhanāṃ bhāvanām āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4559: dānena kevalena sidhyatīti juhotīty api homena kevalena sidhyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4560: na tu dānena kevalena sidhyatīti vijñānam nivartate. dadāti tarhi svena kārakagrāmeṇa kṛtānubandho na yāgaṃ homaṃ vānubandham apekṣate. tasmād bhinnāni vākyani,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4562: 189*} iti. na ca dānasya yajati juhotir vānuvādo yāgahomayor avivakṣāprasaṅgāt. na ca dānam itarayor anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4564: itarayoś ca tyāgārthatvāt. prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe samudāyād apūrvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4565: siddhānte tu yāgasya phalavattvād itarayor guṇabhāvaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4569: ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_2,2.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4572: 190*} pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabdaḥ kim ekam apūrvaṃ codayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4573: kiṃ pratyabhyāsam apūrvabheda iti. śabdāntare karmabheda uktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4574: iha sa eva śabdaḥ punaḥ punar uccāryate. tasmād ekam evātrāpūrvam. nanv apūrvāntaram avidadhad anarthako bhavati. satyam evāprayojano bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4578: 192*} tad eva gamyate. tasmāt pañcakṛtvo 'bhyasto yajatiśabda ekam apūrvaṃ codayati. na cābhyāso 'narthako bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4581: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4582: karmabhedaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ. tāvaty eva vidhīyamāne 'sati kasmiṃścid viśeṣe punaḥśrutir
GSP28msbh1-7u:4583: anarthakā bhavet. nanūktaṃ na śaknoty arthāntaraṃ vidhātum iti. ucyate - samidho
GSP28msbh1-7u:4585: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti yāgaḥ prāpta eva. tatra devatā na śakyā vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4590: 193*} vidhīyamāno 'kriyamāṇe yāge na śakyaḥ kartum ity anarthakaḥ syāt. kriyamāṇe tu śakyate. tasmād abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4592: 194*} iti, na ca yat samitsaṃbandhena kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4605: evaṃ hi samāmananti - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavati{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4606: 196*}; tāv abrūtām agnīṣomāv ājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4608: tābhyām etam agnīṣomīyam ekādaśakapālaṃ paurṇamāse prāyacchat{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4615: 201*}. tathā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4616: ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4620: tathā, ya evaṃ vidvān ity evaṃ saṃyuktau prakṛtānāṃ karmaṇām anuvaditārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4621: atha vā ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4622: ya evaṃ vidvān amāvāsyāṃ yajata ity apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4624: 203*} prāptam - śabdāntara-tvād abhyāsāc ca samapradhānānīti prāpte brūmaḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4628: ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīsaṃjñakaṃ yāgaṃ yajata iti na sarve yāgā [141]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4631: kīdṛśam evaṃsaṃjñakasya yāgasya rūpam iti, te na{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4632: 206*} kiṃcit pratipadyemahi. ato brūmaḥ - yady apūrvasya vidhātārāv anarthakāv iti. atha nu prakṛtānām anuvaditārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4633: tataḥ sannihitāḥ paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāsaṃyuktā yāgā iti gamyate rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4634: tatrārthavattā vacanasya. kathaṃ punar ekavacanānto bahūnāṃ vācako bhaviṣyatīti yady ucyate. samudāyaśabdatayāvakalpiṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4636: teṣāṃ ca pracayaśiṣṭaḥ samudāyo 'py asti tadapekṣo 'yam arūpaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4638: bhavati hi bahūnām ekavacanāntaḥ śabdaḥ samudāyāpekṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4639: yathā - yūthaṃ vanaṃ kulaṃ pariṣad iti. yadāgneyādīnāṃ samudāyavacanāvetau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4640: tadā darśapaurṇamāsaśabdenaita evābhidhīyante. tata eṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4644: *{2/197: E1,6; E2,5: nāv upāṃśu; E4: nāv uvāṃśu}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:4656: na vikṛtau prayājā dṛṣṭantām dṛśyante tu - prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhotīti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4668: 210*} bhaviṣyati. nanu rūpaṃ nāsti. vākyāntareṇa rūpam avagamiṣyāmaḥ. paurṇamāsyām āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo bhavatīti yad etat paurṇamāsīnām karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4671: puroṅāśo dravyam iti. ata āgneyādibhir guṇo vidhīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4673: codanā vā guṇānāṃ yugapac chāstrāc codite hi tadarthatvāt tasya tasyopadiśyeta // MS_2,2.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4676: ekenaiva vākyenātrāneko guṇo vidhātum iṣyate bhavatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4678: śabdāntareṇa codite karmaṇy aneko guṇaḥ parasparasaṃbandhe cāsati śakyate vidhātum. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4679: yadi tāvat paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālo bhavatīti saṃbandho vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4680: na tadāyam artho 'ṣṭākapālaḥ sat tayābhisaṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4683: tadānīm āgneya ity ayam asyāntikād apy upanipatito bhavati saṃbandhābhāvān nānena saṃbandham arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4684: aṣṭākapāla āgneyo bhavatīti. athāgneyaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ bhavatīti vivakṣyate. tadāgneyapuroṅāśayor asaṃbandha eva syāt. atha paurṇamāsyām aṣṭākapālasyāgneyatā vidhīyate. vaktavyam{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4685: 211*}, kena tasyām aṣṭākapālo vihita iti. atha tasyām āgneyasyāṣṭākapālatā. tathāpy eṣa doṣaḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4688: 213*} syāt. atha dravyadevate paraspareṇa viśiṣṭe satyau paurṇamāsyā saṃbadhyeyātām ity ucyate. āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo yaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4690: tasyāprasiddhatvād etad apy ayuktam. atha kenacid agnaye saṅkalpitaḥ paurṇamāsyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4691: vidhīyate. tathāpi devatāyā avidhānād rūpābhāva eva. athāgnir devatā bhaviṣyatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:4694: na hy āgneyaśabdo 'nuvādo vidhiś ca bhavatīti. kalpayiṣyāmo devatām iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4695: asati vidhāne devatāyā abhāvāt. saṃbandhiśabdo 'yaṃ devateti sa evāgnir aṣṭākapālasya devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4699: na dravyaṃ devatā vā. na ca yāgasya yāgāntaraṃ rūpaṃ bhavati. ato rūpāvacanāt paurṇamāsyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4700: āvāsyāsaṃyuktau nāpūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhātārau. yat tūktam - paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāśabdau
GSP28msbh1-7u:4701: lakṣaṇayā prakṛtān yāgānanuvadituṃ śaknuto nāñjasyeneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4708: avaṭasamīpe tiṣṭhatīti bhavati saṃvyavahāraḥ. lakṣaṇāpi hi laukikyeveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4714: ugrāṇi ha vaitāni havīṃṣy amāvāsyāyāṃ saṃbhriyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4715: āgneyaṃ prathamam aindra uttara iti sam-uccayaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4716: āgneyādīnāṃ guṇatve vikalpaḥ syāt. tatrāgneyaṃ prathamam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4717: aindra uttare dva iti vyavadeśo nāvakalpeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4720: liṅgaṃ ca dṛśyate - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4724: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyate yad anvañcau puroḍāśāv upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4727: agnīṣomāv upāṃśu yaṣṭavyāv ajāmitvāya iti. tatra sandehaḥ - upāṃśuyājamantarā yajatīti kiṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakānāṃ prakṛtānāṃ yāgānāṃ samud-āyasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:4728: atha vāpūrvasya yāgasyeti. tata ucyate - paurṇamāsīvad upāṃśuyājo bhavitum arhati. kutaḥ - nāmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4732: prakṛtāś copāṃśuguṇakā yāgā vidyante. tasmāt samudāyaśabda iti. nanūpāṃśuguṇakaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4733: yāgāntaram upāṃśutvena rūpeṇa rūpavad vidhīyate. na evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabda upāṃśuviśiṣṭaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:4738: avyutpannaḥ punar upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ. tasmān na rūpavad yāgāntaram. athāpi nāmasaṃyuktaṃ yajatisāmānyam eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4739: tathāpy anupadiṣṭadevatādravyarūpaṃ na yāgāntaraṃ pratipadyemahi. nanv evaṃ sati prakṛtānām apy avācakaḥ prāpnoti. mā bhūd upāṃśuyājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4741: tathā saty upāṃśuyājaśabde 'py anuvādatvād anāñjasye 'pi na doṣaḥ. [145]{*2/219*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4752: nanv idānīm evoktaṃ viṣṇvādiguṇakāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyanta iti. na vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4754: te vidhayo viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayaḥ. arthavādā hi te. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4756: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti etad etasmin vākye vidhī-yate. yadīme 'pi vidhīyeran, bhidyeta{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4757: 221*} tarhi vākyam. api ca - yāgasya viṣṇvādināṃ ca saṃbandho 'tra gamyate vākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4758: na ca yāgasya vidhānam. nanu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4759: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīty atrāpy antarālasaṃbandho 'vagamyate. vāḍham{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4760: 222*}, sa tu vidhīyata upāṃśutvādisaṃbandhaḥ. ekaṃ hīdaṃ vākyaṃ nānekaṃ vidhātum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4761: jāmi vā etad yajñasya kriyata ity evam upakramam etad vākyam ajāmitvāyety evam antam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4762: tasya madhye samāmnātaṃ viṣṇvādivākyaṃ tena saṃbandhya-mānaṃ na vākyāntaraṃ bhavitum arhati. tasmād viṣṇur upāṃśu yaṣṭavya ityevamādayo na vidhayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4763: kiṃ tarhy arthavādāḥ. kaḥ punar arthavādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4766: upāṃśuyājam antarā yajatīti vihitam. kathaṃ tena bhiṣajiṣyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4768: yathā viṣṇur yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatir agnīṣomau ceti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4771: na tv antarālasaṃbandhasyānyat prayojanam asty ato vidhānāt. kathaṃ viṣṇvādayo yaṣṭavyā ity etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4772: yaṣṭavyān ayaṣṭavyān vā viṣṇvādīn upāṃśuyājābhiṣṭavāya saṅkīrtayatīti gamyate. [146]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4773: 224*} tatra kecit tāvad āhuḥ - prāptā eveti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4774: śākhāntare vidhānād iti. yady apy aprāptiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4775: tathāpy upāṃśutvasāmānyāt prajāpatir devatā viṣṇuś cety anuvādāv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4778: tad upāṃśv eva kriyata ityevamādisaṅkīrtanān mantrasamāmnānāc ca viṣṇum aprāptam api prāptam iva vadet. agniṣomayos tu vidhāyakam udāhriyate - etāv abrūyātām{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4779: 225*} agnīṣomāv vājyasyaiva tāv upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4791: upāṃśu paurṇamāsyāṃ yajan iti. tasmān na doṣaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4796: agryaprāye likhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhaved ayam agrya iti matiḥ. tasmān na samudāyaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4806: payasā juhotītyevamādi. tatra sandehaḥ - kim ūrdhvam [147]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4808: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir āghārā homāś ca vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4811: utaitāv evāpūrvayor āghārahomayor vidhātārāv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4814: etayoḥ pūrvebhyo homāghārebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ rūpam asti. yataḥ karmāntaram adhyavaseyam. ataḥ prakṛtatvāt{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4828: havanaṃ homaḥ. yady āghāraṇasāmānyaṃ homasāmānyaṃ ca vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4833: sa viśeṣo gamyata ity apūrvāvāghārahomavidhī nāvakalpyete. api ca kathaṃ kriyā sādhanaśabdenocyeta?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4841: na ca, prakṛtam api dravyadevatam āghāre vidyate. yena rūpavān syāt. tasmād etāv api samudāyaśabdāv iti. [150]{*2/231*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:4852: tena karmāntare vidhīyeta ity avagacchāmaḥ. āghārāgnihotraśabdau ca havanāghāraṇasāmānyavācinau prajñātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4853: ato nāvijñātārthau. tena rūpavantau santau vidhīyete.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4855: dadhnā juhotītyevamādibhir vihitatvād anuvādāv iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4856: na hy ete homāghārau vidhātuṃ śaknuvanti. ūrdhvam āghārayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4857: dadhnā juhotīti ca naitad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4862: dadhihomasaṃbandhaḥ kartavya iti. tasmād arāptatvān nānuvādau. nanu saṃbandhe vihita arthād dhomāghārau bhaviṣyataḥ. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4863: asmin hi sati vidhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nārthād āpadyete homāghārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4867: na dadhyūrdhvatādisaṃbandhaḥ. satyaṃ na śrūyate. tasmin nidher guṇārthena vyāpāraśravaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:4868: avakalpiṣyate. nanu padārthāntaragataṃ vyāpāraṃ śrutir na śaknoti vaditum. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4870: taṃ tu svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdo viśekṣyati, sa eva{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4872: viśiṣyāt svapadārthaṃ guṇaśabdaḥ, na tv eṣa{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4873: 233*} guṇagato vyāpāraḥ pratīyeta. tatra kiṃ bhaviṣyati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4874: avyāpriyamāṇe 'pi guṇe śabdārthāvakḷpto bhaviṣyati. guṇavacanasannidhir idānīṃ kim arthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4879: asati tv arthe kim anyad ucyeta. evaṃ tarhi vākyād bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4880: śrutyarthe sati na vākyārtho 'vakalpyate. satyam evam etat. avivakṣite tv avakalpiṣyate. katham avivakṣā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4882: svapadārthasya ca śabdāntareṇa vihitatvāt. tasmāt siddham - guṇārthena dadhnā juhotītyevamādīnāṃ punaḥśrutiḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4883: 236*}. juhoter uccāraṇaṃ cānuvādo guṇasaṃbandhārthaḥ. yadi juhotīty anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4885: dadhiśabdeneti mā vocata. nanv idānīm eva vākyād guṇavyāpāro{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4886: 237*} gamyata ity uktam. satyam evam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4888: pramāṇam asya nāvagamyeta. asati pramāṇe vyāmohaḥ syāt. evaṃ tarhi vidhāyakau juhotyāghārayatiśabdau. kasya tarhy anuvādaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4893: vākyārtho yas taṃ vidhātum ity adoṣaḥ. tasmāt karmāntaracodane. yad uktam - nāsty āghāre prakṛtaṃ dravyadevatam iti. kim evaṃ sati dravyadevatena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4894: yadā prasiddhārthābhidhānān nirjñātam evāsya rūpam. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4895: caturgṛhītaṃ vaitad abhūt tasyāghāram āghāryety ājyamasya dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4897: indra ūrdhvo 'dhvaro divi spṛśatu mahato yajño yajñapata indravān svāhetyāghāram āghārayatīti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4898: 238*}, evam asāv indravān yady asyendro devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4910: prakaraṇe hy anarthako dravyasaṃyogo na hi tasya guṇārthena // MS_2,2.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4911: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4925: ye ime ālabhatiyajatibhyāṃ karmaṇī vidhīyeyātām iti cintyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4926: pūrvam eva ta avadyatigṛhṇātibhyām avagamite. na cāvagamito 'rtho vidhīyate. hṛdayādīṃs tu paśuśabdenānuvadati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4927: somaśabdena ca rasam. tasmāt somena yajetety anuvādo yajatiḥ yajeta svargakāma iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4928: 245*} phalasambandhārthaḥ. paśum ālabheteti cālabhatir agnīṣomasaṃbandhārthaḥ. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4929: daśaitān adhvaryuḥ prātaḥsavane grahān gṛhṇātīti samuccayo dṛśyate. tathāśvino daśamo gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4930: tṛtīyo hūyata iti ca kramaḥ. yadi cāpūrvau yāgau vidhīyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4934: pālāśe badhnāti rohitake badhnātīti. tatra kramasamuccayadarśane nopapadyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4936: yajatau samyag etad avakḷptaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyānuvādau.
GSP28msbh1-7u:4937: [151]{*2/246*} evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - apūrvayoḥ karmaṇor vidhānacodane paśusomayoḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4938: soma-śabdaḥ kṣīriṇyāṃ latāyāṃ prasiddho na rase,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4939: ākṛtivacano hi somaśabdo na vyaktivacanaḥ. tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4940: śṛṅgiṇi pucchavati lomaśe catuṣpadi dravyaviśeṣe paśuśabdam ākṛtivacanam upacaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4942: evam ākṛtikadravyāḥ prakṛtā yāgā vidyante. yeṣām imau samudāyasyānuvaditārau bhaveyātām. nanu paśu-vikāro hṛdayādiḥ paśuśabdenāgnīṣomasaṃbandhārtham anūdyate. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4944: nāyaṃ prakṛto hṛdayādiḥ paśur iti. tatra yadi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4945: laukikasya paśor grahaṇaṃ tato mukhyaḥ paśuśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4948: somaśabdo 'pi vikārasaṃbandhenānuvādaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrve karmaṇī vidhīyeyātāṃ nānuvādau. athaindravāyavādiṣu prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu latā vidhīyeteti. ucyate - na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4950: śrutyā hi rasa aindravāyavaḥ. tasmād dravyasaṃyogavacanaḥ prakṛteṣu yāgeṣv api satsu vidhātum anuvadituṃ vā na śaknuvann anarthakaḥ syāt. tasmād apūrvakarmaṇī vidhīyeyātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4960: evaṃ tāvat, prakṛteṣu satsv api nānuvādāv ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4962: prakṛtā eva yāgā na santīty ucyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:4969: aindravāyavaṃ gṛhṇātītīndravāyubhyāṃ saṃkalpayatīty etāvad uktaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4970: tatra yāgam antareṇa saṃkalpayatīty etan na yujyata iti yāgaḥ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4974: prakṛtānāṃ yāgānām abhāvān na samudāyaśabdo yajatiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4978: tadbhedāt karmaṇo 'bhyāso dravyapṛthaktvād anarthakaṃ hi syād bhedo dravyaguṇībhāvāt // MS_2,2.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:4979: paśau vṛttā kathā daśame punar udbhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4980: soma idānīṃ vartate. kathaṃ kramasamuccayāv iti. indravāyvādyā devatā naivaṃ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4985: kevalayā hi devatayā tadā yāgo nirvartyata iti vihitam abhaviṣyat. atha punar imāḥ adṛṣṭārthaṃ gṛhṇāti saṃskāraṃ prati devatā vidhīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4987: tena gṛhṇātau tatkṛtād adṛṣṭād adṛṣṭāntaram utpādayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4990: 249*} niyataparimāṇeṣūrdhvapātreṣu prādeśamātreṣu niyataparimāṇeṣūdakakalaśeṣu saṃskṛtasya daśamuṣṭiparimitasya kṛtsnasya somasya nāvakalpate. yady api cāvakalpeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4991: tathāpi nityavihitānāṃ devatānāṃ vikalpapakṣe tāvat prayogavacano mā bādhīty ava[153]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:4994: tad eva mitrāvarūṇābhyām iti nāvakalpeta. tasmāt kalpanabhedāt pṛthagavasthitaḥ somo
GSP28msbh1-7u:4995: nānādevatatvād eva naikyena śakyaḥ kartum. na cāsati devatāyāge devatābhyaḥ śakyate
GSP28msbh1-7u:4996: saṃkalpayitum. tasmād avaśyaṃ yathāsaṃkalpitā devatā yaṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4997: tāsu cejyamānāsu jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti śruto yāgo nirvṛtta eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:4999: kṛtsnena ca daśamuṣṭinā somena yāgaḥ śrutaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5000: so 'saty abhyāse nāvakalpata ity arthāt sa guṇo bhaviṣyatīty abhyasitavyo yāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5001: na hy anabhyastaḥ sarvābhir devatābhiḥ sarveṇa ca{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5002: 251*} somena saṃpanno bhaviṣyati. tasmiṃś cābhyasyamāne kramasamuccayau yuktāv eva bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5009: yad apy ucyate - yathā khādire badhnāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5013: tatra saṃskāram abhinirvartayituṃ khādirādayaḥ śrūyante. yadi cendravāyvādyā api grahadevatā yāgam abhinirvartayituṃ śrūyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5015: na tv etā yāge śrutāḥ. tasmāt samuccīyeran.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5025: atha saptadaśapaśuguṇakam ekaṃ karmeti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5027: prajāpataye saptadaśa paśavaḥ saṅkalpyante. kim ekaṃ yāgam abhinivartayitum uta bahūn iti saṃśaye ekam iti nyāyyaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5030: tatraikasminn eva parikḷpte saptadaśānām eva paśūnāṃ parikalpanam upapannaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5031: kena ca dvitīyādīn yāgān avakalpayema. evaṃ saty{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5032: 254*} alpīyasy adṛṣṭānumānaprasaṅgakalpanā bhavati. tasmād eko yāgaḥ saptadaśabhiḥ paśubhir nirvartyate{*2/255*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5033: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṅkhyayā karmabhedo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5035: tac ca paśūnāṃ pṛthaktvaṃ bahuṣu yāgeṣv avakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5037: ekādaśabhir avadānair asau yāgo nivartayitavya ity evaṃ codakaḥ pratidiśati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5039: tatra dvitīyāder ālambho nāvadānasaṃpādanāya bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5043: 257*}. tenaikasmin paśau pṛthaktve niveśinī saptadaśasaṅkhyā nāvakalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5045: tena saptadaśabhyo yāgebhyaḥ saptadaśa paśūn upādadīraṃs tatra saṅkhyāsāmaṃ jasyaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5047: nanv ekasminn api yāge saptadaśabhir avadānagaṇair yakṣyate vacanāt. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5051: sā hy avadānaprakṛtidravyaṃ viśiṣantī prakṛtau pradhānasyopakṛtavatīti [155]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5055: tasmād ekasmai avadānagaṇāyaikaḥ paśur ālabdhavyaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5057: evam evāvakalpiṣyate. yadi śṛṅgābhiprāyā varṇābhiprāyā rūpābhiprāyā vābhiviṣyan saptadaśapaśavaḥ śvetaḥ kṛṣṇo rohita ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5061: te hi śyāmās tūparā ekarūpāḥ śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5063: naikasmin. tasmāt saptadaśa yāgā iti. prayojanam ekasminn aṣṭe duṣṭe kṛtsnaḥ paśugaṇa āvarteta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5065: pūrvapakṣe 'dṛṣṭārtham. siddhānta eka eva paśur āvartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5066: na hi karmabhede paśuḥ paśvantaram ākāṅkṣatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5074: athaiṣa jyotir athaiṣa viśvajyotir athaiṣa sarvajyotir iti. atra{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5075: 259*} saṃdehaḥ, kim ebhir nāmadheyaiḥ prakṛtaṃ jyotiṣṭomaṃ saṅkīrtya tatra sahasradakṣiṇādiguṇo vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5076: atha vā vakṣyamāṇaviśeṣāṇi karmāntarāṇy upadiśyanta iti. kiṃ prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5077: prakaraṇānugrahāt prakṛtasya guṇavidhānam iti. nanu vākyasāmarthyāj jyotirādīnām ete guṇā vidhāyiṣyante. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5080: viśvajyotir iti trivṛdādīny asya jyotīṃṣi vākyaśeṣasaṅkīrtitāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5082: tenāsau viśvajyotiḥ sarvajyotiś ca jyotiṣṭoma iti evaṃ prāptam.

GSP28msbh1-7u:5496: tathāpi tad bādhitvā vākyena rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmnaś ca bhavitum arhati.

GSP28msbh1-7u:5499: yadi rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti. nanu nāsty atra vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ. ucyate - asti ya eṣaḥ syād iti. āha - naiṣa vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5501: na vidhānārtheneti. atra brūmaḥ - yad etat sayadikaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5510: rathantarasāmno bṛhatsāmno vā bhāvo nimittatvena śrūyamāṇo 'py arthavān bhavati. tasmād avivakṣito yadisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5511: tasmiṃś cāvivakṣite padadvayam idaṃ rathantarasāmā somaḥ syād iti śaknoti rathantarasāmānaṃ kratuṃ vidhātum,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5520: aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti. kathaṃ punaḥ śālibhojanaṃ tena vākyena vihitaṃ bhavatīti. ucyate - vyatyāsena saṃbandhaḥ kalpyeta,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5526: evam ihāpi yady aindravāyavāgrān grahān gṛhṇīyād iti grahītum icched ity arthaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5530: śāliṃ bhuñjīteti dadhyupasecanasaṃkīrtanād dadhyupasiktaṃ śāliṃ bhuñjīteti tenaikavākyatvād gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5531: evam atrāpi grahāgratāviśeṣasaṅkīrtanāt tenaikavākyatvād grahāgratāviśiṣṭo rathantarasāmā gamyate. atha vātra hetuhetumator liṅ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5532: rathantarasāmā soma aindravāyavāgrāṇāṃ grahāṇāṃ hetuḥ kartavya iti. tasmāt kṛtsnakratusaṃyogād guṇaḥ karmāntaraṃ prayojayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5536: sati hi nimitte naimittikaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5538: yac ca bhaviṣyat tan na sat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5540: tat kathaṃ pūrvakālasya grahāgratāviśeṣasya nimittaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. api ca niḥsandigdhaṃ jagatsāmā karmāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5541: tatsāmānyād itarad api karmāntaram iti gamyate. tasmān na jyotiṣṭomasya guṇavidhānam iti. [171]{*2/295*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:5544: ekasya tu liṅgabhedāt prayojanārtham ucyetaikatvaṃ guṇavākyatvāt // MS_2,3.2 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:5551: bṛhatsāmnaś ceti. parihṛtam etaj jyotiṣṭoma eva rathantarasāmā bṛhatsāmā ceti. punar
GSP28msbh1-7u:5553: viśeṣaṇaṃ rathantareṇa bṛhatā vā na prakalpata iti. tad ucyate - prakalpate viśeṣaṇam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5559: atha yad uktam - pūrveṇa nimittena bhavitavyam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5573: rājā rājasūyena svārājyakāmo yajeteti. taṃ prakṛtyāmananty aveṣṭiṃ nāmeṣṭim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5574: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇetyevamādi. tāṃ prakṛtya vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5575: yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutim āhutiṃ hutvābhighārayet,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5579: uta brāhmaṇādīnām ayaṃ yāgo vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā bhavet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5580: kathaṃ vā yāgavidhānam iti. yadi rājaśabdo brāhmaṇādiṣv api kenacit prakāreṇa,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5597: nanu janapadapuraparirakṣaṇavṛttim anupajīvaty api kṣatriye rājaśabdam āndhrāḥ prayuñjante prayoktāraḥ. na brūmaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5608: tathāryāvartanivāsināṃ śabdārthopāyeṣv abhiyuktānām abhivyāharatāṃ karmāṇi cānutiṣṭhatām antyajanapadavāsibhyo mlecchebhyaḥ samīcīnatara ācāro bhavati. tasmād yaugiko rājaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5611: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - aveṣṭau tu khalu kratupradhānaṃ brāhmaṇādiśravaṇam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5618: prakaraṇāc ca na karmāntaravidhānaṃ nyāyyam ity uktam. atrocyate - nobhayābhidhānam avakalpate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5621: tenāryāvartanivāsināṃ prayogo na virotsyate. atha yadi rājyaśabdaḥ paripālane nityasaṃbaddho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5622: tatas tasya karteti rājaśabdaḥ kṣatriyajātau tannimitto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5623: tatrāndhrāṇāṃ prayogo na virotysyate. tasmān na prayogadarśanād ubhāv api rājarājyaśabdau jātiparipālanābhyāṃ nityasaṃbaddhāv ity abhyupagantavyam. ko nu khalu nirṇayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5626: evaṃ hi smaranto 'bhiyuktāḥ tasya karmeti ṣyañpratyayaṃ vidadhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5627: na tu tasya karteti pratyayalopaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5628: prātipadikapratyāpattiṃ vā samāmananti. tasmād rājñaḥ karma rājyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5631: taṃ tu loko rājaśabdenābhivadati. ucyate - yogāl lokaḥ prayuṅkte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5633: sa tu paripālane rājyaśabdo rājayogād ity asmābhir uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5636: 299*} api brāhmaṇavaiśyayo rājaśabdaḥ prayujyate. na tv evaṃ smaranti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5638: yat tūktam - anumānād rājyasya kartā yaḥ sa rājā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5639: yathā audamegheḥ pitodamegha iti. ucyate - anumānāt prayogo balavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5641: kṣatriye tu pratyakṣaṃ prayuñjānān upalabhāmahe. tathā yogam apy anumimīmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5642: rājyasya kartā rājeti. rājñaḥ karma rājyam iti tu smaranti. anumimānāś ca smṛtiṃ anumimate sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5644: tena tatra smṛtir balīyasīti. āha - yo yo rājyaṃ karoti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5654: janapadaparipālanam akurvaty api rājety āndhrā vadantīty uktam. nanu rājayogād rājyam ity etad api vyabhicarati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5656: 301*} nimiṣitaṃ ca sarvaṃ rājyam ity ucyate. yadi vayaṃ prayogān nimittabhāvaṃ brūyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5657: tata evam upālabhyemahi. smṛtyā tu vayaṃ nimittabhāvaṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5658: tena yad yad rājajātīyasya karma jātyā viśeṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5659: tad rājyam ity abhyupagacchāmaḥ. yat tūktam - āndhrā api rājyayogād rājānam abhyupa-gacchantīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5661: prayogo durbalaḥ smṛter iti. yad uktam - āryāvartanivāsinaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5675: uta brāhmaṇādīnām ādhānaṃ vidhīyata iti. kathaṃ nimittārthatā syāt?

GSP28msbh1-7u:5683: tac cāviditaṃ vedyata iti. nanu brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādadhati nāpy asti samuccāraṇam. vāḍham{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5685: na tv amīṣām ādhānasaṃbandho na viditaḥ. kena prāpto vidita iti. kāmaśrutibhiḥ. kāḥ kāmaśrutayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5687: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajetetyevamādayaḥ. kathamābhiḥ śrutibhir ādhānaṃ prāptam iti. ucyate - sāmarthyāt,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5697: tac cādhānena vinā na sidhyatīty ādhānam api kartavyam ity avagamyate. tat kena kartavyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5698: yasya kāmaśrutayaḥ. tāś cāviṣeśeṇa brāhmaṇādīnām. tasmād amīṣām ādhānasaṃbandho vidita iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5699: ubhābhyāṃ brāhmaṇādīnāṃ saṃbandhe vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5700: tadānīm eko 'rtho vidhīyate. ato nimittārthāḥ śrutaya ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5703: sarvakarmaṇāṃ śeṣabhūtam ādhānam iti na śrutiliṅgādīnām anyatamenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5708: nādhānm iti. nanv agnīnām abhyupāya ādhānam iti. ucyate - naiteṣām arjane ādhānam evaiko 'bhyupāyaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5719: eva kevalo 'gnis teṣāṃ sādhaka iti niścīyate. kathaṃ cātmārthatādhānasya gamyata
GSP28msbh1-7u:5720: iti. kartrabhiprāye hi kriyāphala ādadhītety etad ātmanepadaṃ saṃbhavati. asatyasmin
GSP28msbh1-7u:5722: api ca satīṣv etāsv ādhānaśrutiṣu na kāmaśrutayaḥ śaknuvanty aparām ādhānaśrutiṃ kalpayitum,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5755: tatrāpūrvajñāpanavacanaḥ śabdaḥ uparudhyeta. na tu liṅgā vihite praśaṃsāvacanam uparudhyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5768: iyam api kevalasyādhānasya punaḥśrutiḥ saṃbhāravidhānam upakramitum iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5773: dvābhyāṃ tu viśeṣaṇābhyāṃ viśiṣṭam ekam ādhānaṃ vidhāyiṣyate, [179]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5774: 316*} tena na bhaviṣyati vākyabhedaḥ. tasmād brāhmaṇādīnāṃ ādhānasya prāpakāṇi śravaṇānīti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5792: 318*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsayor eva guṇāt phalam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5817: prajākāmasya yāga upayo vidhīyate. vidhīyate cet,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5830: atra hi eva khalu sā saṃpad bhavatīti. yadi dākṣāyaṇayajño darśapūrṇamāsāv eva,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5855: atrāpi hi guṇāt phalam ucyate. kathaṃ naitad evaṃ saṃbadhyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:5873: caturo muṣṭīn nirvapatīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
