GSP28msbh1-7u:5904: tataḥ tau lakṣayitvā śveto vidhātavyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5906: tau ca bhūtikāmasya brahmavarcasakāmasya ceti dvāv apy athā vidheyau syātām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5907: tatra vākyam bhidyeta. atha vā yo 'sau vidhāyakaḥ śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5908: sa lakṣayitavyopayukta iti vidhāyakābhāvād eko 'py artho na śakyate vidhātum. atha sa eva lakṣayiṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5909: tenaiva ca vidhāyiṣyate guṇa iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5912: ya ālambhaḥ sa etadguṇaḥ kartavya iti. tathāpi na prākṛto lakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5915: sa hi kartavyo nirjñāto na laukikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5916: ato na prākṛtānuvādo ghaṭa iti yāvad uktam ālambhamātraṃ nirvāpamātraṃ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5925: yajatis tu dravyaphalabhoktṛsaṃyogād eteṣāṃ karmasaṃbandhāt // MS_2,3.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:5939: iha hi śvetaṃ vāyavyam ālabhetety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5943: paṭaṃ dīrghaṃ vayeti paṭasya dīrghatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5945: evam ihāpi sauryavāyavyaśabdaprayogād dravyadevatābhisaṃbandho vidheya iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5948: taṃ cālabhetety arthadvayavidhānād bhidyetaiva vākyam. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5951: taṃ cālabhetety arthaviśiṣṭam. śrutyaiva hi puruṣaprayatno viśiṣṭo gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5952: vākyena ca dravyadevatāśraya iti nātra dvābhyāṃ vākyābhyāṃ prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5953: yathā raktam aśvaṃ yojayeti yadā guṇavidhiparaṃ bhavati vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5956: tatra guṇavidhipare 'pi vākye paryavasita eva guṇadvayavidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5959: evam ihāpīti. saṃbandhaś ca bahubhiḥ padair viśiṣṭa eka evocyata ity ekārthatvam, vibhajya[184]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5963: ity eṣa saṃbandho 'vakalpate. tasmād yajimatī ete karmaṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:5968: liṅgaṃ khalv apy etam arthaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5973: yadi yajimatī ete karmaṇī. atha prakṛtau guṇavidhānaṃ yāvad uktaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5986: 342*}. kevalaṃ viśaye saṃśaye prāyadarśanaṃ hetur iti nirdiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5987: kasyāyaṃ hetur iti na vijānīmaḥ. prakṛtaṃ yajimad etat karmeti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5988: 343*}, tad api na saṃbandhyamānam iva paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5990: 344*} sūtram eva tāvad anarthakam. atha kātra pratijñā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:5991: kaś ca sandeha iti vaktavyam. vṛttikāravacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5992: pratijñāṃ saṃśayaṃ cāvagacchāmaḥ. atra bhagavān ācārya idam udāhṛtya vatsam ālabheta vatsanikāntā hi paśava iti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:5997: 346*} saṃśayaś ca. tatra ca pūrvapakṣaṃ pratijānīte sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:5998: yajimad abhidhāna iti. idaṃ tu pratyudāharaṇasūtraṃ pūrvasyādhikaraṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6000: tathāpi puruṣāṇām uccāvacabuddhiviśeṣān ālocya bhavati mandānāṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭenāpy āśaṅkā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6003: mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikenāpi daṣṭo mriyeta na jātucit kadāpi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6004: tatra cikitsā nādareṇa kartavyā bhavet. atastāṃ nivartayituṃ pūrvapakṣam upanyasyati sma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6005: ālabhatir asmābhiḥ prāṇisaṃyukto yajimad abhidhāno dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6007: tenāyam api yajimadvacana eveti bhavati kasyacid āśaṅkā. atha vā yajimadabhidhāno dṛṣṭa ālabhatiḥ prāṇisaṃyuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6009: tathā ca phalam na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6010: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asmin saṃśaye ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6013: tatraitad api śrūyate. prāyād api cārthaniścayo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6015: agryaprāye likhito 'grya iti gamyate. nanu liṅgaṃ prāyadarśanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6016: katham anena siddhir iti. ucyate - yathā prāyadarśanena sidhyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6017: tathā varṇayitavyam. kathaṃ ca prāyadarśanaṃ hetuḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6018: nyāyataḥ prāptau satyām. kaḥ punar nyāyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6020: vatsa ālabhyamāno gāṃ prastāvayiṣyatīti. tasmād evaṃ nyāyaprāpte prāyadarśanaṃ dyotakaṃ bhavati. tasmād ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāraḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6037: tatraivaṃjātīyakaṃ vacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmād apy ālambhamātraṃ saṃskāra iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6041: saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena tadarthaḥ śrutisaṃyogāt // MS_2,3.18 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6042: asty agniḥ, tatra naivāraś carur bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6044: yad enaṃ carum upadadhātīti samāmananti. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6045: kiṃ carur yāgārtho yāgaṃ kṛtvāvaśiṣṭa upadhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6047: caror hi prasiddhaṃ kāryaṃ yāgo nopadhānam. ucyate - yady api yāgārthatā caroḥ prasiddhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6048: tathāpi devatāvacanasaṃbandhābhāvād yajatiśabdāsaṃbandhāc ca na yāgārthateti gamyate. tad ucyate - tasyaiva vākyaśeṣe śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6049: bṛhaspater vā etad annaṃ yan nīvārā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6050: tena devatāvacanena sannihitenaikavākyatā bhaviṣyatīti bṛhaspatidevatāka upadhātavya iti. tasmād yāgārthaś carur ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6051: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - saṃyuktas tv arthaśabdena kāryaśabdenopadadhātīti tad arthaḥ eva syād upadhānārthaḥ. upadadhātinā cāsya pratyakṣam ekavākyatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6053: carum upadadhātīti hi pratyakṣaṃ vākyam. bārhaspatyam upadadhātīty ānumānikam. tasmāt kṛtsnaś carur upadhātavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6055: tad anyatra śrutam anyatra kṛtaṃ bhavet. yat tu bārhaspatyā nīvārā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6056: arthavādaḥ sa iti. yat tūktam - prasiddhā caror yāgārthateti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6057: prasiddhir vākyena bādhyate. tasmād upadhānārtha iti siddham. [187]{*2/351*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6061: 352*}, yat paryagnikṛtaṃ pātnīvatam utsṛjantīti. tatra sandehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6063: uta tasmād yāgāntaram iti. yadi paryagnikṛtam utsṛjantīti padadvayaṃ paraspareṇa saṃbaddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6070: ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kathaṃ pātnīvataśabdenānūdyeta. api ca tvāṣṭrasyotsarge vidhīyamāne
GSP28msbh1-7u:6071: paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvakalpeta. ato brūmaḥ - paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6074: pūrvasyaivotsṛjatiśabdenāvacchedo vidhīyate. kim evaṃ bhaviṣyati. yajimattā tāvat kalpayitavyā na bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6075: utsṛjatiśabdaś ca śrutyotsargaṃ vidadhad vākyena na bādhito bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6076: karmāntarapakṣe vākyena pātnīvatatāyāṃ vidhīyamānāyām arthāt prāpta utsargo dhātunānūdyeta. api ca paryagnikṛtasya pātnīvatatā pūrvasya viditaiva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6077: sā vidhātum na śakyate. tasmāt pūrvasya karmaṇo 'vacchedaḥ. yat tūktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6078: tvāṣṭrasyotsargo vidhīyamāne paryagnikṛtam iti viśeṣaṇaṃ tāvan nāvakalpeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6082: ata eva tvāṣṭraḥ pātnīvata ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ kevalena pātnīvataśabdena lakṣaṇayānūdyeteti na doṣaḥ. tasmād avaccheda iti siddham. [188]{*2/353*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6087: eṣa vai haviṣā havir yajate yo 'dābhyaṃ gṛhītvā somāya yajata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6088: tathā parā vaitasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'ṃśuṃ gṛhṇātīti{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6096: na grahaḥ kaścid yo 'bhyasyeta. tasmād yāgāntaram. nanu dravyadevataṃ na śrūyate. mā bhūd dravyadevatam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6097: sākṣād eva yajatiśabdo vidyate. tasmāt karmāntaram adābhyasaṃjñakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6098: aṃśusaṃjñakaṃ ca yāgaṃ karotīty evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6099: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - adravyadevatāke kevale nāmadheye śrūyamāṇe brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6101: etat tāvad grahasya nāmadheyaṃ na yāgasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6103: vyavahitatvād yāgasya. aṃśur iti ca muktasaṃśayam eva grahanāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6106: dravyadevataṃ śrūyate. yato gṛhṇātir yajimadvacano bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6112: aṃśvadābhyaśabdābhyām apy aparau grahābhyāsau vidhīyeta iti siddham. [189]{*2/355*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6115: agnis tu liṅgadarśanāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta // MS_2,3.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6116: asty agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6123: kim ayam agniśabdo yāgavacano jyotiṣṭomādibhyaḥ karmāntaraṃ cinuta ity ākhyātena vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6129: agneḥ stotram agneḥ śastram iti tathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6131: yasya stotraṃ śastram upasadaś ca tasyāgniśabdo vācaka iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6133: tasmāt yāgavacana iti. nanu liṅgam asādhakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6134: prāptir ucyatām iti. atrocyate - athāto 'gnim agniṣṭomenaivānuyajatīti yāgam abhinivartayatīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6135: tam agnim iti viśinaṣṭi. tasmād agnisaṃjñaka iti gamyate. anuśabdo 'py upasargo yajater viśeṣaka evam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6136: yady agnir yāgaḥ. tasmāt kratuśabdaḥ pratīyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6139: dravyaṃ vā syāc codanāyās tadarthatvāt // MS_2,3.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6142: atra hy eṣa prasiddhaḥ. cinuta ity eṣā hi codanā cayanārthā na yajaty arthaṃ śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6143: cayanenainaṃ saṃskurute citau sthāpayatīti. anuśabdaś ca paścād artho bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6144: cayane nirvṛtte paścād agniṣṭomena yāgena yajatīti. [190]{*2/357*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6146: tatsaṃyogāt kratus tadākhyaḥ syāt tena dharmavidhānāni // MS_2,3.23 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6157: māsaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajata ityevamādi. tatra sandihyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6158: kiṃ niyate 'gnihotre niyatayoś ca darśapūrṇamāsayor māso vidhīyate kālaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6159: atha kiṃ niyatāgnihotrān niyatābhyāṃ ca darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ karmāntaravidhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6162: kālavidhisarūpa eṣa śabdo māsam iti. kathaṃ kālavidhisarūpatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6164: māsam ity aviditam. evaṃ cāgnihotraśabdo darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaś ca nārthāntaravṛttau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6165: tasmāt kālavidhiḥ. nanu kuṇḍapāyinām ayanaprakaraṇaṃ bādhyetaivam. kāmaṃ bādhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6167: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇāntare śrūyamāṇaṃ vākyaṃ yasya prakaraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6168: tasya vācakaṃ bhavitum arhati. nanu pratyakṣo 'gnihotrasya darśapūrṇa[191]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6173: upasado 'gnihotrasya darśapūrṇamāsayoś ca santi. tasmād aśakyas tatra māsavidhiḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6174: upasado 'pi vidhīyanta iti. tathā guṇavidhānārtho 'smin vākye 'nekaguṇavidhānād vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asmin pakṣe punar atantram agnihotraśabdo na karma viśekṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6175: tena vākyabhedo na bhaviṣyati. tasmāt karmāntaram iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6178: anārabhya kiṃcic chrūyata āgneyam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped rukkāmaḥ{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6188: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - phalaṃ ca bhedakam akarmasannidhau śrūyamāṇam. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6189: anuvāde sati na śakyeta phalaṃ vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6192: avidhīyamāno hy upāyo ruco bhavatīti gamyate. api ca rukkāme 'tra vidhīyamāne kāmasya [192]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6194: āgneyādīnāṃ nityatvāt saṃbandho nāvakalpeta. evaṃ sarvatra. tasmāt karmāntarāṇi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6199: sannidhau tv avibhāgāt phalārthena punaḥśrutiḥ // MS_2,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6203: etayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayeteti. tatra sandehaḥ - kiṃ karmāntaram aveṣṭer utāveṣṭir eveti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6206: uktena nyāyena. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sannidhau phalārthena punaḥśrutir aveṣṭer eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6208: avibhāgāt, etayety eṣa śabdo na śaknoty aveṣṭyā vibhaktaṃ yāgam anyaṃ vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6209: sannihitasya pratinirdeśaka eṣa śabdaḥ. tasmād aveṣṭir evānnādyakāmasya vidhīyata iti. kiṃ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6214: darśapūrṇamāsayor āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyābhyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti vidhāya punar ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6215: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ bhavatīti. tatra sandehaḥ - kim amāvāsyāyāṃ dvir āgneyena yaṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6218: ekasyaivaṃ punaḥśrutir aviśeṣād anarthakaṃ hi syād iti{*2/363*}. [193]{*2/364*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:6225: na, abhyāsasya vācakaḥ śabdo 'stīti. nanv āgneyaḥ punaruccaritaḥ paraṃ karma vidhāsyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6227: 366*} na punar arthaḥ kartavya iti śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6230: nānyaḥ. nanu vihitam eva punar viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhad anarthako bhavati. bhavatu kāmam anarthakatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6233: na tv arthāntaravacanatā. tasmān na dvir abhyasyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6239: arthavādārthā bhaviṣyatīty ucyate. kim arthavādena prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6240: yadā pūrvenaiva vākyena sārthavādakena vihitaḥ āgneyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6251: evam etad iti. tad ucyate - anyārthā vā punaḥśrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6255: na kevalenāgninā sa sādhur bhavatītīndrasahito 'gniḥ samīcīnataraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6266: yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyām yajeteti. atra sandeheḥ - kiṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāso yāvajjīvikatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6267: uta kartṛdharmo niyamaś codyate yāvajjīvikateti. kathaṃ karmadharmo 'bhyāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6268: kathaṃ vā kartṛdharmo niyama iti. yadi juhotir anuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6271: tataḥ kartṛdharmo niyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6278: tasmād abhyāsaḥ. evaṃ kṛtvā satrasaṃstavo yukto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6279: jarāmaryaṃ vā etat satraṃ yad agnihotram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6283: kartur dharmo niyamaś codyata iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6290: paurṇamāsyam āvāsyāparisamāptau ca darśapūrṇamāsau. yady ucyeta - jīvanakālasyaikadeśe 'pi kṛtaṃ tena kālena kṛtaṃ bhavatīti. naitad evam, [195]{*2/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6291: 373*} arthaprāptaṃ hi tan na vidhātavyaṃ śabdena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6298: śrutiś ca prakaraṇād balīyasī. yadīyaṃ vacanavyaktir asya vākyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6299: yāvajjīvam ity anuvādo juhoti yajatīti ca vidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6300: ity evaṃ yajatijuhotiśabdau svārthāv eva bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6302: nābhyāsalakṣaṇo bhaviṣyatīti jīvane nimitte karma vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6312: liṅgaṃ ca bhavaty api ha vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī paurṇamāsīm amāvāsyāṃ vātipātayeteti. kathaṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6313: karmadharme hi prakrāntaṃ satraṃ yāvajjīvanakālena parisamāpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6314: na tatra kālātipātaḥ syāt. tatra cānarthakam anyat syāt prāyaścittādi vidhīyamānam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6318: darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeteti. yadi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somasya kālo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6319: vyaktaṃ na yāvajjīvanakālena tau parisamāpyete. atha jīvanaṃ nimittam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:6846: vihitas tu sarvadharmaḥ syāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca // MS_3,1.8 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:6901: tad uddhaṇanaṃ na sphyād anyena kartavyam. yadā caivam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:6915: pratyakṣaṃ tu viśeṣavacanena viśeṣavidhānam. tasmād yad yenotpattyā saṃyuktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6924: arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:6925: jyotiṣṭome krayaṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - aruṇayā piṅgākṣyaikahāyanyā{*3/

GSP28msbh1-7u:6929: gamyamāne saṃśaya iti. ucyate - iha hi guṇam aruṇimānam amūrtaṃ santaṃ kriyāyāḥ karaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:6931: yat karaṇābhidhāyinyā tṛtīyāvibhaktyā saṃyujya nirdiśati - aruṇayeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6932: na cāmūrto 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6933: ato 'saṃ-bandhaṃ krīṇātināruṇaguṇasyāvagacchāmaḥ. na cāśaṅkanīyam arthaṃ pramāṇabhūtaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:6934: śabdo 'bhidhāsyatīty evaṃ prakalpanā kadācid upapadyetāpi. kenacit prakāreṇa saṃbandha
GSP28msbh1-7u:6938: ekavākyatayā kraya evāruṇimānaṃ niveśayiṣyāmaḥ. atha tv apramādyadbhir anviṣyamāṇo na kathaṃcana saṃbandha upapatsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6939: tato vākyabhedam abhyupagamya prakaraṇadharmam enam adhyavasāsyāmaḥ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:6944: prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca. nanu prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyo bhavatīty ekavākyatvād aruṇimā krayeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. naitad evam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6947: yo hi brūyāt - udakena dagdhavyam agninā kledayitavyam iti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:6952: strīliṅgasaṃbandhāt. dravyaviśeṣā hy ete strī pumān napuṃsakam iti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:6964: strīpratyayadarśanāt tu nūnam aruṇāprātipadikaṃ dravyavacanam ity anumānam. pratyakṣaṃ cānumānād balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6968: 38*} buddhiḥ, evam aruṇeti. guṇavacanaś cet krīṇātinā na saṃbadhyate. tasmād vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā prakaraṇe sarvasminn eva saṃniveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6971: na bhaviṣyati vākyabheda iti. tan na,

GSP28msbh1-7u:6979: yathā nīlam utpalam iti. tad anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6982: kalpanīyaṃ tv ekavibhaktisaṃyogād ekahāyanīśabdasaṃnidhānāc ca tad ekavākyatām abhyupagamyaikahāyanīśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6983: na ca liṅgād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmād asad etat.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6984: tatrocyate - yadā kevalaguṇavacanatāyāṃ śabdaḥ pravartamāno nānyena saṃbandhaṃ labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6985: tadānupadeśakatvād ānarthakyaṃ mā bhūd iti dravyaparatām āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6986: tasyām avasthāyām ekavibhaktiyuktenaikahāyanīśabdena saṃnihitenaikavākyatām āpadyamānaḥ samānādhikaraṇo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6988: nīlam utpalam ity upapadyate. sa cāyam aruṇāśabdas tasyām avasthāyāṃ vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6989: na hy asya svārtham abhidadhata ito vicchinnasya prakaraṇe 'py arthavattā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:6992: 43*} 'rthaḥ kriyāyāḥ sādhanaṃ bhavatīti. na ca kriyāsādhanair dravyaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6993: na hi kevalaguṇavacanaḥ śaknoti dravyam abhidhātum iti sa eva hetuḥ prakaraṇasaṃbandhābhāve 'pi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:6996: tac cobhayam apy anupapannam. ato 'narthakatvaparijihīrṣayā saṃnihitenaikahāyanīśabdenāruṇāśabdaḥ saṃbadhyate. nāsti vākyabhedaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:6998: na hy ayam aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7001: kārakāṇāṃ hi kriyayā saṃbandho na dravyeṇeti. sa eṣa śrutisāmarthyāt kriyāviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7004: nanu ca guṇasya kriyāsaṃbandhābhāvād avivakṣitā kāraka[218]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7005: 46*} ity ekahāyanīsaṃbandho 'yam adhyavasitaḥ. evam api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7006: yadi kārakābhidhānam avivakṣitam iti guṇaśabdenaitena dravyam abhidhātum iṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7007: tadā prātipadikārthasyāvyatireka iti prathamā vibhaktiḥ prāpnoti. na hi tṛtīyāntas tam abhisaṃbandhaṃ śaknoti vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7008: na cānyathānupapattir ity anyo 'syānupapadyamāno 'rthaḥ śakyate kalpayitum,

GSP28msbh1-7u:7011: avyatirikte prātipadikārthe bhavitum arhatīti. tasmāt kāmam anarthako 'vagamyatāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7015: vyaktam aruṇaguṇaviśiṣṭam etena kārakam abhidhīyate. kadācit tu kiṃcid vidhitsitaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7019: kadācit tu nirjñāte puruṣe daṇḍaguṇavidhānārtham uccāryate - daṇḍī praiṣānanvāheti. tathā{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7020: 47*} lohiteṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantīti. evam ihāpi yady anupasarjanabhūto{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7021: 48*} 'ruṇo guṇaḥ, pradhānabhūtaṃ kārakam. tathāpy anūdite kārake 'ruṇaguṇavidhānārthaṃ vacanaṃ yujyate. tasmād ekahāyanīsaṃbandha upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7023: atra hy ekahāyanīkrīṇātyor anavabuddhaṃ saṃbandhaṃ bodhayitum ayam ekahāyanīśabda uccaritaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:7027: aruṇaguṇena ca samāne samabhivyāhāre krīṇātinā saṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7029: bhavati hi kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā vibhaktir ekahāyanīśabdam anuniviṣṭā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7030: na tu guṇasaṃbandhasya vācikā. kā punaḥ kriyāsaṃbandhasya vācikā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:7033: saṃbandhamātravivakṣāyāṃ ṣaṣṭhī. na cātra ṣaṣṭīṃ paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7034: paśyāmas tu khalu tṛtīyām. ataḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandham abhyupagacchāma ekahāyanīśabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7040: utpalaśabdasaṃnidhāne tadapekṣī nīlaśabdas tenaikavākyatām abhyupagacchan nājahat svārthavṛttir upalaviśeṣābhidhānapara uccāryamāṇaḥ saṃbandham
GSP28msbh1-7u:7041: nanv ihāpi vākyalakṣaṇas tadvad evāruṇimnā samaṃ saṃbandha ekahāyanyā yujyate. neti brūmaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:7050: tadvad iha krayāviśeṣaṇārtham uccāryamāṇa ekahāyanīśabdo nāruṇāśabdena saṃbandham arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7053: sarvatra tu bodhite padārthe vākyārtha upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7060: tad etad uktam - tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāyo 'rthasya tannimittatvād iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7064: kevalasvārthavṛtti padam anupadeśakam iti padāntareṇa saṃnihitenaikavākyatvam abhyupaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7065: nānyatheti. tad iha yady apy ekahāyanīśabdaḥ krīṇātinā saṃbandhyamānaḥ kṛtārtho na padāntareṇa saṃbandham ākāṅkṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7066: aruṇāśabdas tu padāntareṇa saṃbandham alabhamāno 'narthaka ity ekahāyanīśabdenaikavākyatām abhyupaiti. nanūktam - kriyāsaṃbandhārthaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:7071: tābhyaś ca pānīyaṃ pīyata upaspṛśyate ca. evam ihāpi krayasaṃbandhārtham ekahāyanīśabda uccāryamāṇo 'ruṇāśabdena saha saṃbhantyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7072: na kiṃcid duṣyati. tasmān na vākyabheda iti. naitad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7073: yady apy ayam aruṇāśabdo 'narthako mā bhūd ity ekahāyanyā saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7074: tathāpi sarvasmin prakaraṇe niveṣṭum arhati. na cainaṃ somaṃ krīṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. na hy ayaṃ viśeṣaṇatvenocāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7076: nanv apūrvo 'pi vidhīyamāna ekahāyanīśabdavad itareṇa saṃbhantsyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7080: tena buddhau saṃnihitena śakyate sākāṅkṣaḥ śabdaḥ saṃbandhayitum iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7084: tatra vākyena śrutiḥ pīḍitā syāt. na cāyam [221]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7087: nanv etad uktam - prakaraṇe 'py asya saṃbandho 'nupapanna iti. nānupapannaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7091: anyā guṇena saṃbadhyamānasya. ajñātavaj jñāpyate vidhīyamāno 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7093: na ca sakṛd uccāryamāṇo jñātavad ajñātavac ca bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7095: aruṇāśabdena saṃbadhyamānaś ca jñatavat. vākyabhede punar na doṣo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7096: prakaraṇe tu vākyāntaraiḥ kriyādravyāntarāṇī ca prāptāni. tair idaṃ vākyāntaravihitaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7098: anyasmin vākye 'nūdyata ity upa-pannaṃ bhavati. tasmāt saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7100: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - arthaikatve dravyaguṇayor aikakarmyān niyamaḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7102: tatra dravyaguṇāv ekasmin padārthe niyamyeyātām. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7104: ekaṃ hi kāryaṃ dravyaguṇayoḥ śrūyate krayasaṃbandhaḥ. katham etad avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7108: tayor evaṃ nairutsukyāt. yady ekakāryatā kim iti vikalpo na bhavati? naitad{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7109: 58*} evam. ekārthās tu vikalperann iti vikalpadharmāṇau prāpnuta ity ayukto 'yaṃ paryanuyogaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7112: vipakṣasya ca pratīpam ācarati, na ca [222]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7115: 60*} ity eṣa naḥ pakṣaḥ. na ca vikalpo nānākāryatvāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7116: nanv idānīm evoktam - ekaṃ kāryam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7119: amūrta-tvād guṇo na kriyayā saṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7120: idānīṃ viparītam abhidhīyate - ubhāv api dravyaguṇāv ekārthau krayam abhinirvartayata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7125: sākṣād dhi dravyaṃ kriyāṃ pratyupakaroti. guṇas tu viśiṣṭānāṃ sādhanam. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7128: guṇasya kriyām abhinirvartayata etad eva sāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7129: yat sādhanaṃ viśiṣyāt. ākāṅkṣati ca kriyā sādhanaviśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7130: cihnabhūto hi guṇaḥ sādhanaṃ lakṣayati. asati cihne na lakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7131: katamat sādhanaṃ kriyāyā iti. tataḥ kriyā nādhyavasyema kartum iti bhavati kriyāsādhanaṃ gunaḥ. na caiva sati vikalpo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7134: tāny adhāryamāṇāni na śaknuvanti kriyām abhinirvartayitum, tathā{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7136: tāny asamāhitāni na śaknuvanti svaṃ svam artham abhinirvartayitum. yasmiṃs tu sādhanopakāre kārye tasminn evopakāre 'nyat sādhanaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7141: evaṃ tarhi tad evedaṃ saṃjātaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7144: tatra sa eva doṣo vākyabhedaḥ prasajjyeteti. na brūmaḥ - aruṇāśabda ekahāyanīśabdena saṃbadhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7145: kiṃ tarhi krīṇātinaiva saṃbadhyate. evaṃ hi śrūyate 'ruṇaguṇena krayam abhinirvartayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7147: tathā yatitavya bhavati. na cāviśiṃṣan sādhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7150: yathā sthālyāṃ paced iti kriyāsādhanatvena nirdiṣṭe 'rthāt saṃbhavane dhāraṇe ca syālīṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7151: 63*} vyāpārayati tadvad ihāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmān nāsti vākyabhedaprasaṅga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7152: nanv evam api vākyaṃ bhidyeta. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7154: yathā devadattayajñadattaviṣṇumitrā bhojyantām iti pratyekaṃ bhujiḥ samāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7155: yathā ca yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pived iti. evam ihāpy aruṇayā krīṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7158: na sarvasmin prakaraṇa iti. satyam eṣa doṣo na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7159: kiṃ tv anaruṇayāpy ekahāyanyā krayaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7161: tatra yad uktaṃ dravyaguṇayor niyama iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7162: sā pratijñā hīyate. na tarhi brūmaḥ - vākyabheda iti. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7167: asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ - samudāye vākyaparisamāptir iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7169: tathā abhiṣutya hutvā bhakṣāyantīti. tasmād ubhayaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭaḥ krayo vidhīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7170: kathaṃ punas tasmiṃś cetariṃś ca dṛṣṭānte saty ekāntenāvadhāryate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7171: samudāya eva vākyaparisamāptir na pratyavayavam iti. atra brūmaḥ - iha dravyāruṇimānāv ubhāv api kriyāsaṃbaddhāv upalabhyete paraspareṇāsaṃbaddhau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7173: tatra yadi dravyaparam aruṇim aparaṃ ca bhavati vacanam idam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7174: tataḥ pratyavayavam asaṃśayaṃ krayasaṃbandhaḥ. atha krayavidhitsayābhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7176: 64*}śiṣṭaḥ, evam aruṇim aviśiṣṭa iti niyamata ubhayasaṃbandho 'bhyupagamanīyaḥ. na cātra dravyāruṇimānāv īpsitau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7181: sa ca nānyataraviśiṣṭaḥ pratīyata iti samudāye vākyaparisamāptir iha niścīyate. yadā caivam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7184: na cāruṇād anyaḥ sādhanasya viśeṣako guṇa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7186: atra vadāmaḥ - yadi krayasya sādhane guṇo 'bhisaṃbandhum upaiti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7187: tadā vākye bhinne 'pi krayasādhanatvād aruṇimāsmin dravye na nivekṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7188: kim artham ekavākyatā prayatnena sādhyata iti. tad etad abhidhīyate - bhinne hi vākya ekāhāyanīsādhanakaḥ krayo 'vabuddho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7190: na tasminn evaikahāyanīsādhane kraye 'ruṇimā vihito bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7192: tatrārthāt prāptam anyad api sādhanaṃ bhavati. tad api viśiṃṣan aruṇo guṇas tena
GSP28msbh1-7u:7193: saṃbadhyeta. ekavākyatve tu tat parihṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt sādhv abhidhīyate - arthaikatve
GSP28msbh1-7u:7223: asti jyotiṣṭomaḥ - ya evaṃ vidvān somena yajata iti{*3/ 65*}. [225]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7230: uta sarveṣāṃ grahāṇāṃ sarveṣām agnīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ puroḍāśānām iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7236: śabdalakṣaṇe ca hi karmaṇi yac chabda āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7238: yathā paśum ālabheta ity ukta eka eva paśuḥ pumāṃś cālabhyate. evam atrāpy eko grahaḥ saṃmārjanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7244: sarveṣāṃ vā lakṣaṇatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi lakṣaṇam // MS_3,1.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7255: sāmānyāvagamād viśeṣān avagamāc ca sarvapratyayaḥ. tathāgnipuroḍāśānām api. nanv ekavacanaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7257: ekatvaṃ hi śrūyamāṇaṃ grahādiṣv ekatvaṃ brūyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7260: 69*} pratiṣedhakaḥ. tenāpratiṣiddhe dvitīyādau sāmānyavacanena prāptaṃ saṃmārjanādi kim iti na kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7262: ekavacanam iha śrūyamāṇaṃ prāpta evaikasmin dravye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7276: ādatta iti liṅgenaivādāne prāptatvān mantrasya parisaṃkhyā yuktā. iha punar yad ekavacanaṃ dravye śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7277: tac chrūyamāṇam apy avidhīyamānatvena na nivartakaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7278: yathā kaścid odanaṃ nirdiśya brūyāt - ya enaṃ bhakṣayet kaścic chvā mārjāro vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7280: tatra yadi bhakṣaṇaṃ nimittatvena vidhīyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7282: tataḥ kāko 'py āgacchan nivāryate. śrūyamāṇe 'pi śuni mārjāre vā śvamārjārasaṃbandhasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:7285: na cātra dravyaikatvasaṃbandhavidhāyakaḥ kaścic chabdo 'sti. nanu saṃmārṣṭīti. na hy etad dravyaikatvasaṃbandhasya vidhāyakam. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7288: itarathā vākyena parapadārtho vidhīyate. śrutyasaṃbhave ca vākyaṃ kramate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7290: ekatvaṃ na dvitīyādīn pratiṣeddhum arhati. evaṃ sati na dvitīyādau saṃmārgādi kriyamāṇam [227]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7293: yathaiva hi tad ekasya śrutam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7296: na tad ekatvaṃ dravyasya saṃmārgādau viṣaye niyamyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7303: lakṣaṇatvena coc-cārayitum. prasiddhasaṃbandho hi śaknoti lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7304: na cāvihita evaṃjātīyakaḥ śabdāvagamyaḥ prasiddhasaṃbandho bhavati. vidhīyate ca saṃmārgādiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7307: na dravya ekatvaṃ niyamyata iti śakyam āśrayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7308: athaikatvaṃ saṃmārga ucyate. tatrāpi dvayī gatiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7311: tac cobhayam apy anupapannam. na tāvad ekatvasya saṃmārgaḥ śākyate kartum. na ca
GSP28msbh1-7u:7312: dravye kriyamāṇa ekatvasyopakaroti kenacit prakaraṇam. na caikatvasyopakṛtena kiṃcit prayojanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7313: na hi tad guṇabhūtaṃ śrutam. athaikatvaṃ saṃmārgaṃ prati guṇabhūtam iti. tad api na. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7315: na hi tat saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayati. yady apy anyad amūrtaṃ kriyāṃ niṣpādayati sādhanaṃ viśiṃṣat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7322: 73*} upakarotīti saṃmārgasyopakārakam ekatvaṃ bhavet. na tv etad evam. tasmād ekatvasaṃmārgayor asaṃbandhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7323: nanu pradhānabhutam api grahādi saṃmārgaṃ niṣpādayaty eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7324: atas tatsādhanaṃ tac ca viśiṃṣat tad upakariṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7325: yathā ijyārthe dadhani payasi ca praṇītā dharmāḥ pāka upakurvanti. paridhānārthe ca [228]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7326: 74*} paridau yūpadharmā bandhane. tasmād ayam asamādhir iti. atrocyate - na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7327: atadarthe sādhake na śaknuvanty upakartum iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7333: na tu tadvidhīyate vijñānāya. kim arthaṃ tarhy uccāryate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7335: tad etad grahādi lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgādi vidhīyate. tad yady ekatvasaṃbandho 'paro grahadravye{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7337: 76*} vidhīyeta, dvayoḥ saṃbandhayor vidhānād bhidyeta vākyam. athocyeta - grahādi lakṣayitvā tasyaikatvasaṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7339: tathā ca saṃmārgādīnām adhyayanaṃ pramāda ity abhyupagataṃ syāt. na caitad evam. tasmād ubhābhyām ekavacanasyāsaṃbandha iti. evam etad ekatvaṃ grahasya na kiṃcid upakāraṃ karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7341: evam eva sadanūdyate. tasmān naitat kiṃcid api kartuṃ vivakṣyata iti sarveṣāṃ grahādīnāṃ saṃmārgādi kartavyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7345: nanu bahuṣu vivakṣiteṣu bahuvacanena bhavitavyam. ucyate - na vayam etad vicārayāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7351: tac ca sarveṣv iti sthāpitam. api ca na vibhakter vacanam evaikaṃ prayojanam. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7353: avivakṣita ekatve kārakasaṃbandhārtham asyoccāraṇaṃ bhaviṣyati. tasmān nānarthakam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7354: api ca grahaḥ prātipadikārtha ekatvaṃ vibhaktyarthaḥ. kim ato [229]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7355: 78*} yady evam. etad ato bhavati - prātipadikārthagataṃ hi vibhaktiḥ svam arthaṃ śrutyaiva vadati. athaivaṃ sati kim na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7356: saṃmārgeṇa saṃbhantsyata iti. tena hi saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyena saṃbadhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7358: anyena saṃbadhyamānaṃ vākyenācchidyānyena saṃbandham arhati. asaṃbadhyamānas tv ekatvena saṃmārgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7362: grahādimātrasya ca vidhīyata iti kim iti dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya ca na kriyeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7372: codite tu parārthatvād yathāśruti patīyeta // MS_3,1.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7373: atha yad uktam - yathā paśum ālabhetety eka eva paśuḥ puṃpaśuś cālabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7375: asty atra vaiparītyam iha grahārthaḥ saṃmārgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7376: tatra punar yāgārthaḥ paśuḥ. kim evaṃ sati bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7379: aparicchinnena na śakyo yāgaḥ kartum iti. na tu graheṇa kenacid viśiṣṭena saṃmārgaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7381: paśoś caitad ekatvaṃ yāgaṃ pratyupadiśyate. nanūktam - prātipadikārthagataṃ svam arthaṃ vibhaktiḥ śrutyaivābhivadatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7383: tatra vākyāc chrutir balīyasīty uktam. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7386: 81*} bhavati, tasmād ekaḥ puṃpaśuś cālabhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7387: grahaikatvaṃ na saṃmārgasyopakarotīti na grahaṃ śaknoti viśeṣṭum. tasmād avivakṣitam iti. [230]{*3/82*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7393: saṃskārād vā guṇānām avyavasthā syāt // MS_3,1.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7395: tatra śrūyate - daśāpavitreṇa grahaṃ saṃmārṣṭīti. tatraiṣo 'rtho 'dhigataḥ - sarve grahāḥ saṃmārjitavyā iti. idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ camasāpi saṃmārṣṭavyā uta neti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7397: camasādy api sarvaṃ saṃmārjyam iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7404: te camasānāṃ nirvartakā bhaviṣyanti. ucyate - pradarśanārthaṃ grahagrahaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7408: tat sarvaṃ saṃmārjitavyam. yathā bhojanakālo vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7412: sthālagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇārtham iti gamyate. evam ihāpi draṣṭavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7418: tatra kim arthaṃ śrutau saṃbhavantyāṃ grahaśabdo lakṣaṇayā kalpyate. ucyate - saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmārge puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātum eṣa śabdaḥ śaknoti
GSP28msbh1-7u:7420: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmāl lakṣaṇayā grahaśabdo varṇyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7423: yo yaḥ saṃmārjanasaṃskārārhaḥ sa sa saṃmārjitavyaḥ, neti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7435: utsṛjyamāne śrutir eva bādhyate graham iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7437: na caitan nyāyyam. tasmād grahaśabdena grahaṃ lakṣayitvā tasya saṃmārgasaṃbandho vidhīyate. na cāvidadhat saṃmārgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7439: ato vidadhāty evaiṣa śabdaḥ saṃmārgam. na ca śrutir bādhiṣyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7440: saṃmārṣṭīti saṃmṛjigataṃ puruṣaprayatnaṃ śrutyā śaknoti vidhātum. na{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7443: 88*}, pareṇa vā saṃbadhyamāna iti. tena na grahasaṃbandhe 'pi śrutir bādhitā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7444: ato graheṣv eva saṃmārgo vyavasthātum arhatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7445: nanv apūrvasaṃyogāviśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca camaseṣv api prasajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7446: na graheṣv evāsya vidhānam ity uktam. atrocyate - prakaraṇavadbhir ekavākyatāṃ kṛtvā śaknoti tatra vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7451: na śaknoti vidhātum. tasmād vaiṣamyam asya{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7452: 90*}. yad uktam - yathā sthālāni saṃmṛjyantām iti lakṣaṇā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7463: vājapeye śrūyate - saptadaśāratnir vājapeyasya yūpo bhavatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saptadaśāratnitā vājapeyasyordhvapātre niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7464: uta paśor yūpe niviśata iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7470: tac ca khādiratvād ūrdhvatvāc ca yūpasadṛśam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7471: tatra niveśe sati vājapeyaśabda āñjasyena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7473: 93*} lakṣaṇayā vājapeyaśabdo vṛtta iti gamyate. nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayordhvapātre. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7474: sarvathā vayaṃ lakṣaṇāśabdān na mucyāmahe. matpakṣe tu vājapeyaprakaraṇam anugṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7480: tasya tu paśuṃ bandhuṃ yūpena kāryam. sākṣād vājapeyayūpasya yadi saptadaśāratnitā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7482: tad anarthakaṃ mā bhūd iti yo 'sya paśuyāge yūpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7483: tatra niveśam arhati. ūrdhvapātre ca yūpaśabdo lakṣaṇayā syāt. nanv itarasminn api pakṣe vājapeyaśabdo lakṣaṇayeti. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7488: bhavati sa tasya saṃbaddho mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena. na caikāntaritam iti kṛtvāsaṃbaddho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7491: atha ca devadattena mukhyenaiva saṃbandhena saṃbaddhaḥ. tasmād eṣa eva [233]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7493: na hy etasmin pakṣe kaścid api lakṣaṇaśabdo bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7496: kartṛguṇe tu karmāsamavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7497: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ prayājavākye śrūyate - abhikrāmaṃ juhoty abhijityeti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7498: 95*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim abhikramaṇaṃ prayājeṣv eva niviśata uta kṛtsne prakaraṇa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7501: na tat karma havanaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7502: tasmān na tenaikavākyatāṃ yāti. ataḥ sarvasmin prakaraṇe niviśate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7504: nanv anenaiva hetunānyasminn api na nivekṣyate. ucyate - anyatra puruṣaiḥ saṃbhantsyate. nanu prayājeṣv api puruṣaiḥ saṃbadhyeta. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7505: juhḥtīti havana eṣa śabdaḥ puruṣaprayatnaṃ vidhātuṃ śaknoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7506: na puruṣābhikramaṇāsaṃbandham. nanv anyatrāpi puruṣābhikramaṇasaṃbandhasyāvidhānam. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7507: anyatra prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgabhāve nirjñāte prayogavacano 'sya kartavyatāṃ vakṣyati. tasmāt sarvasmin prakaraṇe 'bhikramaṇasya niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7511: sākāṅkṣaṃ tv ekavākyaṃ syād asamāptaṃ hi pūrveṇa // MS_3,1.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7512: naitad asti - yad uktam abhikramaṇaṃ prakaraṇe niviśata iti. prayā[234]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7515: yataḥ sākāṅkṣam etat pūrveṇa padenāsamāptaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7517: prakaraṇāc ca vākyaṃ balavad iti prayājeṣv evābhikramaṇaṃ niviśate. nanv abhikramaṇam amūrtatvād dhomanirvṛttāv asamartham ity uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7524: samāsīded anvābhikramaṇena. tasmād abhikramaṇam upakaroti homasyety avagamyate. ataḥ prayājeṣv eva niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7526: saṃdigdhe tu vyavāyād vākyabhedaḥ syāt // MS_3,1.21 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7532: ekādaśe ca yajñopavītam āmnātam - upavyayate devalakṣmam eva tat kuruta iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7533: 98*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ sāmidhenīr evānubruvāṇa upavyayeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7534: uta prakaraṇe sarvān eva padārthān anutiṣṭhatā upavyātavyam iti. kutaḥ saṃśayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7536: atha nivṛtte vā tāsāṃ prakaraṇa iti na jñāyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7538: paraprakaraṇe sāmidhenyaḥ śrūyante. satyaṃ paraprakaraṇe śrūyante. tathāpi tāsām avāntaraprakaraṇam aparam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7541: yena tatsaṃnidhāv abhidhīyamānaṃ tasyeti jñāyate. kathaṃ punar nivṛttaṃ tāsāṃ prakaraṇam ity āśaṅkyate? [235]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7542: 99*} nivitpadāni tāsāṃ prakaraṇaṃ vyavadadhatīti. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7547: tenānivṛttaṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇam iti bhavati matiḥ. ataḥ paraprakaraṇe nividaḥ samupanipatitā na vyavadadhati. yathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7548: dvādaśopasattāhīnadharmo jyotiṣṭomaprakaraṇa iti. tena bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7554: kartuś ca vāsovinyāsamātraṃ guṇo bhavaty upavītaṃ nāma. kiṃ kurvatā tat kartavyam iti bhavati tatra padārthākāṅkṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7555: tatra buddhau saṃnihitenāviprakṛṣṭena sāmidhenīvākyenaikavākyatāṃ upagamya sāmidhenīṣūpavītaṃ upavyayata ity eṣa śabdo vidadhātīti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7558: sa nirṇayaḥ. asmin saṃdehe vākyabheda iti nirṇaya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7561: nividāṃ vidhāyakena sāmidhenībhir asaṃbaddhena granthena vyavadhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7562: yasya ca paryavasite 'pi vacane tatsaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7564: āgacchati hi tatsaṃbaddhābhidhāne hṛdayam. yatra tu paryavasite vacane tadasaṃbaddham evārthāntaraṃ prakramante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7565: na tatra buddhau pūrvaḥ padārthaḥ saṃnidhīyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7566: buddhāv asaṃnihitenaikavākyatā bhavati. dvābhyāṃ hi buddhābhyāṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7570: katham ubhābhyāṃ padārthābhyāṃ viśiṣṭāṃ buddhim utpādayeyur iti. [236]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7571: 101*} anantarāv abuddhena saha vākyārthaḥ śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7572: asaṃbaddhapadoccāraṇe ca nānantarāv abuddho bhavati. tasmād vyavahitena saha naikavākyatā bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7574: vākyārthaṃ saṃjanayet. avaidikaḥ sa puruṣabuddhir pūrvako vākyārtho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7577: anyasmāc ca nāmapadaṃ yo vākyārthaḥ saṃjanyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7580: vākyārthaṃ saṃjanayet. tasmān nāsaṃbaddhārthavyavadhānaikavākyatā bhavatīti niścīyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7581: tasmān na sāmidhenībhir ekavākyatopavītasyeti. nanu sāmidhenīkalpānām anantarabuddhānāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:7583: tena sāmidhenībhiḥ saṃbhantsyata iti. neti brūmaḥ - ativṛttam eva hi sāmidhenīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nivitpadair vyavadhānāt. vākyena hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7587: punaḥ kalpavacanena sāmidhenyaḥ prakṛtā bhavanti. na hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7588: tatra tāsāṃ vacanaṃ kartavyā iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7591: na prakaraṇena. tatrāprakṛtāsu samidhenīṣu yasyaikavākyatā guṇasya sāmidhenībhir nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7600: guṇānāṃ ca parārthatvād asaṃbandhaḥ samatvāt syāt // MS_3,1.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7602: 104*} ca śrūyante - tasmād vāraṇo vai yajñāvacaraḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7604: vaikaṅkato yajñāvacaraḥ syāj juhuyād eteneti. na ca vāraṇavaikaṅkatānāṃ pātrāṇām agnyādheyena saṃbandhaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7607: vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā bhavanti. tatraiṣa saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pavam āneṣṭiṣu niviśante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7608: uta darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu sarvayāgeṣv iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7610: uktam etat pradhāne 'saṃbhavan padārthas tadguṇe kalpyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7611: agnyādheyaprakaraṇe ca samāmnānāt pavamānahaviṣāṃ tadguṇatā. tasmāt pavamānahaviḥṣv ity evaṃ prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7613: pavamānahaviṣām agnyādheyasya ca na paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. yathādhānam agner guṇaḥ saṃskārārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7614: evaṃ pavamānahavīṃṣy apy agner eva guṇabhūtāni. kas tatra paraspareṇa saṃbandha iti. yad uktam - ādhānasya prakaraṇe samāmnāyanta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7616: tathāpi prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā vākyenāgner bhavanti. kim iha vākyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7619: nanv āhavanīyo 'tra yāgasyādhikaraṇatvena guṇabhūtaḥ śrūyate. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7622: prayojanavattvād āhavanīyasya niṣprayojanatvāt pavamānahaviṣām. katham eṣāṃ niṣprayojanatā?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7623: phalāśravaṇāt. kalpyaṃ phalam iti cet. satyaṃ kalpyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7626: svarge kalpyamāne dvir adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta, homāc ca [238]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7628: tasya cāhavanīyenāparo 'dṛṣṭaḥ saṃskāra iti. tasmād agnyarthatā pavamānahaviṣām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7629: naiṣām ādhānena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmān nādhāne śrūyamāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7630: pavamānahaviṣāṃ bhavitum arhati. kiṃ tarhi sarvayāgeṣu darśapūrṇamāsaprabhṛtiṣv ādhānasya pradhānabhūteṣu niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7636: 107*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim anuvākyādvitvasya pradhāne niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7640: amāv asyāsamabhivyāhārāc ca. pradhānaṃ paurṇamāsī cāmāv asyā ca nājyabhāgau. tasmāt sākṣād vākyāt pradhānasyeti prāptam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7641: tatra brūmaḥ - mithaḥ saha dvābhyām anuvākyābhyāṃ na pradhānasya kāryam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7643: tatra tayor vārtraghnatā vṛdhanvattā ca vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7645: tatra dvitvaṃ vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ ca vidadhad vākyaṃ bhidyeta. ājyabhāgayos tu dve prāpte āgneyī saumī ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7646: tatra vārtraghnatāṃ vṛdhanvattāṃ kevalāṃ śakṣyati vidhātum. nanu pradhānagāmitve 'pi dvayoḥ pradhānayor dve anuvākye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7652: sā vidhīyamānā saṃbadhyeta na saumī. amāv asyāyāṃ tāvan nāsty eva{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7653: 109*}, paurṇamāsyām apy agnīṣomīya eva kriyamāṇe kriyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7654: tatrāpy ekadevatyā na śaknuyād devatādvitve kāryaṃ kartum. athobha agnīṣomīye prāpte iti. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7655: ekasya yāgasya dvābhyām anuvākyābhyāṃ prayojanam. upādeyatvena hy anuvākyā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7657: tena tatrāpi na dve. tasmād ājyabhāgayor niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7666: ulaparājiṃ stṛṇātīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś cāvedanārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7669: uta prakaraṇe sarvapadārthān kartum iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7676: satyām ākāṅkṣāyām ānantaryeṇa nirākāṅkṣīkaraṇam. tasmād ānantaryād āvedanārtho vāgyamo muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7678: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - sarvaiḥ prakaraṇādhītaiḥ saṃbandha iti. [240]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7681: dīkṣitam āvedayitum ity asminn artha āvedayatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7682: na ca staritum ity asminn arthe stṛṇātīti. staraṇam api vidhīyate 'vanejanaṃ ca. muṣṭīkaraṇaṃ vāgyamaś ca vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7686: padārthākāṅkṣāyāṃ satyām ānantaryam ekavākyatve kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7691: svena svena padasamūhena paripūrṇam ekaṃ vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7693: tathā sarvāṇi yāny udāhṛtāni. tasmād vispaṣṭam arthadvayam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7695: tena vākyabhedaḥ. ataḥ saṃyogato 'viśeṣāt prakaraṇāviśeṣāc ca{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7699: śeṣas tu guṇasaṃyuktaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ pratīyeta mithas teṣām asaṃbandhāt // MS_3,1.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7700: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmnāyate - āgneyaṃ caturdhā karotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim āgneye 'gnīṣomīye aindrāgne{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7713: 114*} bhavati, evam ihāpi. yady āgneyāgnīṣomasya ca puroḍāśasya mithaḥ saṃbandho na bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7717: yathāgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajya prāśitram avadyatīti sarvebhyaḥ prāśitrāv adānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7721: vyavasthā vārthasaṃyogāl liṅgasyārthena saṃbandhāl lakṣaṇārthā guṇaśrutiḥ // MS_3,1.27 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7728: 116*} ceti. kutaḥ? yasya hy agnīṣomau devatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7735: sāpekṣaṃ cāsamartham. tasmān na taddhitāntena nirapekṣāgnidaivatyena{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7738: devatāliṅgasya hi sāmartyena saṃyogo bhavati taddhitārthasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7746: āgneyasya mastakaṃ vibhajyeti. ekaṃ hy etad vākyaṃ prāśitram avadyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7750: anyasmād vety aniyamaḥ. yadi tu tatra kevalāgnidaivatyo{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7759: nātra kiṃcid apekṣyate. sa ca tāvāṃs tatra saṃbandho 'stīti ḍitthasya māteti yuktaṃ vacanam. [243]{*3/126*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:7772: arthabhidhānasāmarthyān mantreṣu śeṣabhāvaḥ syāt tasmād utpattisaṃbandho 'rthena nityasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7773: iha mantrā udāharaṇam - bahirdevasadanaṃ dāmītyevamādayaḥ. kiṃ mukhya evābhidheye mantrāṇāṃ viniyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7774: uta gauṇe 'pīti. kaḥ punar mukhyaḥ ko vā gauṇa iti. ucyate - yaḥ śabdād evāvagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7776: mukham iva bhavatīti mukhya ity ucyate. yas tu khalu pratītād arthāt kenacit saṃbandhena gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7777: sa paścād bhāvāj jaghanam iva bhavatīti jaghanyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7781: yathaiva hy agnir jvalatīty ukte jvalane saṃpratyayaḥ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7782: 127*}, evam evāgnir māṇavaka iti śabda evoccārite māṇavake saṃpratyayaḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7783: yasmin nirupapadāc chabdāt saṃpratyayaḥ sa mukhyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7784: yasmin sopapadāt sa gauṇa iti. naitad yuktam. yasya hi śabdasya rūpaṃ kasyacid arthasya nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7786: nirupapadasyāpi. na ca śakyaṃ nimitte sati naimittikena na bhavitum. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7787: yady evam, idaṃ na śakyate vaditum - upapadād ṛte na so 'rtho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7788: upapade tu saṃjāte so 'rthaḥ saṃjaniṣyata iti. na cāsau samudāyārthaḥ śakyate vijñātum. anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ hi vibhāgo 'vagamyate. atha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7791: 128*} vākyārthaḥ. tad evaṃ dṛśyatām - agniśabda evāyaṃ jvalanavacanaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7792: agniśabda eva māṇavakasyābhidhāteti. tasmān na gauṇo mukhya iti kaścid viśeṣaḥ. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7794: yo manāg iva sa gauṇa iti. idam api nopapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7796: na ca prajñāne kaścid viśeṣo 'sti. athocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7798: alpaśaḥ prayujyamāno gauṇa iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7799: alpaśo 'pi prayujyamāno nāsati sāmarthye pratyāyayet. ataḥ so 'pi śabdāt pratīyata iti mukhya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7802: uktam - anyāyaś cānekārthatvam iti. kathaṃ na viparyayaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7803: ucyate - anādṛtyaiva māṇavakapratyayaṃ jvalanam agniśabdāt pratiyanto dṛśyante. na tv anādṛtya jvalanam{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7806: tatra tatrāgniśabdo niyata iti. ata eva vigatasādṛśyād ayaṃ tu dṛśyate. ato 'gnisādṛśyam
GSP28msbh1-7u:7807: asya pravṛttau nimittaṃ na ca jvalane 'pratīte tatsādrṛśyaṃ pratīyate. tasmāj jvalanasyāgniśabdo nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7808: na māṇavakasya. tasmāj jvalane mukhyo na māṇavake. evam eva tṛṇapratyayasya barhiḥśabdo nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7809: na tṛṇasadṛśapratyayasya. tad evaṃ dvaite sati mukhyaparatā śabdasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7810: uta gauṇaparatāpīti yukto vicāraḥ. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7812: ubhayasya śakyatvād ubhayam api barhiḥśabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7815: tṛṇasadṛśaṃ tṛṇapratyayena. yac ca nāma darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ sādhanabhūtena barhiḥśabdena śakyate pratyāyayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7818: [245]{*3/130*} api caivam āśrīyamāṇe pūṣādyanumantraṇādīni darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ notkṛṣyante{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7820: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - mukhya eva viniyoktavyo mantro na gauṇa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:7822: prakaraṇe hi samāmnānāt pradhānenaikavākyatām upaiti. tatraitad āpatati yac chaknuyād anena mantreṇa sādhayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7823: tathā sādhayed iti. sa cāsāv arthābhidhānasaṃyogāc chaknoty upakartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7826: nanu mukhyapratyayāc chakyate gauṇaḥ pratyāyayitum. satyam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7827: mukhyapratyāyanenaivāsya prayojanavattā nirvṛtteti na gauṇaṃ prati viniyoge kiṃcit pramāṇam asti. mukhye viniyogena tv ānarthakyaṃ parihriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7828: parihṛta ānarthakye na gauṇābhidhānam āpatati. na hy anabhidhāya mukhyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7829: gauṇam abhivadati śabdaḥ. ataḥ pramāṇābhāvān na gauṇe viniyujyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7830: api ca gauṇasya pratyāyane sāmarthyād bahavo 'bhyupāyāḥ prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7831: sāmarthyaṃ ca śabdaikadeśa ity uktam - arthād vā kalpanaikadeśātvād iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7832: 132*}, tatra mantre niyogato gauṇaṃ prati viniyujyamāna upāyāntaram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7833: vinā pramāṇena bādhyeta. mantrāmnānaṃ pramāṇam iti cet. na tasyopāyāntaranivṛttau
GSP28msbh1-7u:7834: sāmarthyam asti. nanu mukhye 'pi viniyujyamānsyaiṣa eva doṣaḥ. nety ucyate - yadi
GSP28msbh1-7u:7836: naiva pradhānasyopakuryāt tatra cāsyotpattir anarthikaiva syāt. tasmād asti gauṇe mukhye ca viśeṣaḥ. api ca yo gauṇe mantraṃ viniyuṅkte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7837: sa vaktavyaḥ - kim arthaṃ mukhyaṃ pratyāyayasi [246]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7838: 133*} iti. sa ced brūyāt - nānyathā gauṇapratyayo 'stīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7839: pratibrūyād enam - anye 'pi gauṇapratyayasyābhyupāyāḥ santīti. atha sa evam abhiyuktaḥ pratibrūyāt -mukhyapratyayo 'pi pākṣiko 'bhyupāya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7840: brūyād enam - na tarhi niyogato gauṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7843: mukhya eva viniyoga iti. arthena ca pratītena prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7846: na sa eva mantra ādartavyaḥ. athāpi mantreṇa pratyāyakena prayojanaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7847: tathāpi mukhyapratyāyanenaiva nirvṛttaṃ prayojanam iti natarāṃ gauṇe viniyujyeta. tasmān mukhyagauṇayor mukhye kāryasaṃpratyaya iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7854: atha yad uktam - pūṣādyanumantraṇādīnām utkarṣo na bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7857: so 'sati saṃskārye 'narthaka iti yatrārthavāṃs tatra nāyayiṣyate. na ca kaścid doṣo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7858: vacanāt tv ayathārtham aindrī syāt // MS_3,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:7859: agnau śrūyate - niveśanaḥ saṃgamano vasūnām ity aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7861: uta gārhapatyasyeti. kutaḥ punar gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata ity evaṃ vispaṣṭe vacane saṃśaya iti. ucyate, [247]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:7865: aindreṇa mantreṇāgner abhidhānaṃ śakyate kartum. ato gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti na gārhapatyārtham upasthānam etad iti jāyeta śaṅkā - gārhapatya upasthānārtho bhaved iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:7867: tṛtīyāntaḥ saptamyanto vā. tasmād vicāraḥ - katham upapannaṃ bhavatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:7870: aśakyatvāc ca gārhaptyopasthānasya. kathaṃ dvitīyā vibhaktir iti cet. avivaksitepsitārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:7871: vā saṃbandhamātrapradhānā. yad vopasthānaviśeṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhād gārhapatyaśabdaḥ. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:7872: gārhapatyaviśiṣṭam upasthānam indrārthaṃ kartavyam iti. gārhapatyaś ca deśena viśiṃṣyān

GSP28msbh1-7u:8253: 181*} lakṣayitavyam. na ca gamyate viśeṣaḥ - ayam asau mantro nāyam asāv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8254: anavagamyamāne viśeṣe sarve talliṅgā grahītavyā iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8256: sa prakaraṇānurodhena bādhyetety anyāyyam. evaṃ sati na dāśataya evopādātavyā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8257: prakṛtam apy upādadīran. nanv etad uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8258: kāryāntare prakṛtasyopadeśo nāsāv arthāntara upadekṣyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8260: sa cānyaś ca sāmānyena liṅgena. naivaṃ sati kiṃcid duṣyati. nanv etad duṣyati - nobhayam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8262: kiṃ tv ananugrāhyam eva prakaraṇaṃ liṅgapratyayaviruddhatvāt. api ca na liṅgaṃ prakaraṇaṃ cānugrahītavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8264: yad avagamyate - etat phalavad iti. tatra pravartate. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8266: na liṅgam anugṛhītaṃ kvacid ity aparasmiṃs tatparicchinne na pravṛttir bhavitum arhati. tasmād dāśatayo grahītavyā iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8282: na jyotiṣṭomaṃ prati mantrasya vyāpāravidhānam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8285: anapekṣya ca prakaraṇaṃ dāśataye vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. upasthānaṃ ca kuryāt. tac caivaṃ liṅgeneti. [261]{*3/183*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8290: nanu ca prakaraṇāj jyotiṣṭomasyopakārakaṃ syāt. yady upasthānajyotiṣṭmasaṃbandho vivakṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8292: prakaraṇāt tenaikavākyatām iyāt. yadā tu khalūpasthānasya mantrasaṃbandho vivakṣyate sarvopasthāneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8294: prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvā. na prakaraṇaṃ viśeṣakaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8295: ubhayasaṃbandhe vākyabhedaḥ. asmatpakṣe na punar ayaṃ doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8298: anyat sarvam anūdyata iti na doṣo bhavati. athavā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8302: 185*} upatiṣṭhata iti samāsīdatīty arthaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtā mantrā evaṃjātīyakā upādātavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8307: yad apy uktam upadiṣṭā hi te prakṛtāḥ kāryantara iti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8308: uktottaram etat. api ca na kenacin nopadiṣṭāḥ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8310: tena na prakṛte kaścid viṣeśaḥ. tasmāt prakṛtasyaiva grahaṇam. [262]{*3/187*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8312: *{3/186: E2: api ca kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8313: E4: api ca na kevalam eta evopadiṣṭāḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8315: bhakṣamantraḥ śrūyate - bhakṣe hi mā viśa dīrghāyutvāya śaṃtanutvāya rāyaspoṣāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8316: varcase suprajāstvāya. ehi vaso purovaso priyo me hṛdo 'sy aśvinos tvā bāhubhyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8317: sadhyāsam. nṛcakṣasaṃ tvā deva soma sucakṣā avakhyeṣam. hinva me gātrā harivo gaṇān me mā vitītṛṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8318: śivo me saptarṣīn upatiṣṭhasva mā me 'vāṅ nābhimatigāḥ mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānaṃ vāg juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8319: vasumad gaṇasya rudramad gaṇasyādityavad gaṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya
GSP28msbh1-7u:8320: mādhyaṃdinasya savanasya tṛtīyasavanasya gāyatracchandasas triṣṭupchandaso jagacchandaso 'gnihuta{*3 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:8321: 188*} indrapītasya narāśaṃsapītasya pitṛpītasya madhumata upahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmītyevamādiḥ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8322: 189*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsna eṣo 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8327: bhakṣayāmīty eṣa śabdo vyaktaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8329: nānyat kiṃcit. anyāni cāsya padāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaṇavacanāny eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8332: nanu ehi vaso ityevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antaṃ grahaṇārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8334: vibhinnaṃ bhakṣaṇavākyāt. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādy avakhyeṣam ity evam antam avekṣaṇavacanam. hinva me gātrā hariva ityevamādi ca [263]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8335: 190*} mā me vāṅ nābhimatigā ity evam antaṃ samyag jaraṇārtham. tad bahutvād arthānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8336: bahūni vākyāni. katham etac chakyaṃ vadituṃ sarvam idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8337: ucyate - sarvāṇy etāni bhakṣaṇaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇānīty uktam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8338: evam api bhidyeta vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāṇāṃ yugapad vacanāsaṃbhavāt. ucyate - na viśeṣaṇāni vivakṣiṣyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8339: viśeṣaṇair grahaṇāvekṣaṇādibhir viśiṣṭa eko 'rtho vivakṣyate. naivaṃ samyag bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8342: lakṣaṇayā tu gamyate. śrutilakṣaṇāviṣaye ca śrutir nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8345: atrocyate - yady apy amī grahaṇādayo bahavo 'rthā gamyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8347: bhakṣaṇam evaikaṃ pratyāyayitavyam. tad dhi śrutam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8351: tāvad ekaṃ vākyam. tasmād viśiṣṭabhakṣaṇārtham etad ekaṃ vākyam iti bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavyam. samākhyānaṃ ca bhavati - bhakṣānuvāka iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8353: nanu ca samākhyā laukikaḥ śabdaḥ kathaṃ vaidikam aṅgaṃ niyaṃsyatīti. yady api laukikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8354: tathāpy anādiḥ tasyānuvākena saṃbandhaḥ. kim ato yady evam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8358: yathā pācako lāvaka iti samabhivyāhārāt saṃbandham anumāsyāmahe. āha nānumānagamya evaṃjātīyakeṣv aṅgabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8361: na ca samākhyā vidhātrī. atrocyate - samākhyā saṃbandhinau buddhau saṃnidhim upaneṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8362: prayogavacano vidhāsyatīti. tasmāt kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyoktavya iti. [264]{*3/191*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8367: naitad evaṃ kṛtsno 'nuvāko bhakṣaṇe viniyujyata iti. rūpād grahaṇavākyaṃ grahaṇe viniyujyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8368: ehītyevamādi sadhyāsam ity evam antam. nṛcakṣasam ityevamādi cāvakhyeṣam ity evam antaṃ darśane. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8373: na kiṃcid asti prayojanam ity uktam. atrocyate - naivaitāni viśeṣaṇāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8374: pṛthag evaitāni grahaṇādīni svaiḥ svair vākyair ucyanta iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8379: tāny avaśyaṃ prakāśayitavyāni. tāni prakāśayiṣyanty etāni vākyāni. rūpaṃ caiṣāṃ tatprakāśanasāmarthyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8380: ato nānārthatvān naikaṃ vākyam ucyate. nanu bhakṣaṇavākyaśeṣī bhavitum apy eṣāṃ rūpam iti. ucyate - bāḍham asti rūpam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8381: na tu tadviśeṣaṇāny etāni kalpyante. kasya hetor adṛṣṭārthāni tathā bhavanti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8382: uktair anuktair vā viśeṣaṇais tāvān eva so 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8384: tathā dṛṣṭārthāni bhaviṣyanti. tasmād rūpopadeśābhyām apakrṣo bhavet keṣāṃcid atreti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8385: guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syāt tayor ekārthasaṃyogāt // MS_3,2.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8386: bhakṣānuvāke śrūyate - mandrābhibhūtiḥ ketur yajñānāṃ vāgju[265]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8387: 192*}ṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu. vasu-mad guṇasya somadevate matividaḥ prātaḥsavanasya gāyatrachandaso 'gnihuta{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8389: 194*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ mandrādiḥ tṛpyatv ity evam anta eko mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8391: uta mandrādir bhakṣayāmy anta eka eva mantra iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8395: tato 'rthabhedād vākyabhedaḥ. tad uktam - tasya rūpopadeśābhyām apakarṣo 'rthasya coditatvād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8396: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8402: tatra dvayoḥ kriyayor asti saṃbandho bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīti. iha punar bhakṣayāmi
GSP28msbh1-7u:8403: tṛpyatv iti nāsti kaścit saṃbandhaḥ. ucyate - na hy ayaṃ vidhau tṛpyatv iti vijñāyate. kva tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8404: prārthanāyāṃ vā prāptakāle vā. yadi bhakṣayāmi vāk tarpsyatīty evam abhisaṃbandhaḥ kriyate. yadi vā bhakṣayāṃi vācas tarptuṃ prāptaḥ kāla iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8405: tena viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvād ekārthatāyām ekavākyatve mantraikyam upapadyate. nanu
GSP28msbh1-7u:8406: nirākāṅkṣa ete vākye bhaṅktvā rūpaṃ sākāṅkṣe kriyete. atrocyate -yady apy ete vākye
GSP28msbh1-7u:8408: tathāpi bhakṣaṇasya prakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ na tarpaṇasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8409: iti kṛtvaikārthyam eva bhavet. kim aṅga punar guṇabhāve gamyamāna evātra. tasmād guṇābhidhānān mandrādir ekamantraḥ syād iti. [266]{*3/196*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:8415: eṣa eva mantra udāharaṇam - iha ca pradānāny aindrāṇy anaindrāṇi ca vidyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8416: teṣāṃ bhakṣaṇāny api santi. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kim aindreṣv anaindreṣu ca mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8418: anaindrāṇām amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8421: teṣv indrapītasyeti mantro 'nindrapītaṃ na śaknoti vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8423: asati vacane 'nyārthānabhidhānāt. tasmād amantrakaṃ bhakṣaṇam evaṃjātīyakeṣv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8424: yathādevataṃ vā tatprakṛtitvaṃ hi darśayati // MS_3,2.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:8426: dhruvacamasā hi prakṛtibhūtāḥ. ke punar dhruvacamasāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8432: anuṣṭupchandasa iti ṣoḍaśiny atirātre bhakṣamantraṃ namatīti. kim atra darśanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8434: nanu vacanam etat syāt. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8435: naitan namatīti śrūyate. kathaṃ tarhi evaṃ namatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8439: ato 'naindreṣv api codakaprāpto mantra ūhitavyo bhavati. ucyate - vikārā eta iti liṅgam apadiṣṭam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8440: nyāyo 'bhidhīyatām iti. ucyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8441: tenaindreṣu somo 'naindreṣu soma eva nāstīti sarve somadharmā aindreṣv eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8442: adharmakā itare sākāṅkṣāḥ. kathaṃ punar jñāyate - aindraḥ somo gṛhyate mīyate ceti?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8444: indrāya tvā vasumata ityevamādir mantra aindraṃ somaṃ vadituṃ śaknoti nānyam. tasmād aindraḥ somaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8447: ato dharmān grahīṣyantīti nyāyaḥ. tasmād yathādevatam ūhitavyo mantra iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8452: santi punarabhyunnītāḥ somāḥ śukrāmanthipracāra eva savanamukhīyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8453: teṣāṃ hotur vaṣatkāre 'nuvaṣatkāre ca caturbhir madhyataḥkāriṇāṃ camasair hutvā hotrakāṇāṃ camasaiḥ sakṛt sakṛd vaṣaṭkāra eva hutvā punaḥ saśeṣeṣv eva pātreṣu somo 'bhyunnītaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8456: hotrakāṇāṃ camasādhvaryavaḥ sakṛd dhutvā śukrasyābhyunnīyopāvartadhvam iti. tatra hotrakā nānādevatā yajanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8466: 203*}. tatra taiś camasaiḥ pūrvasmin vaṣaṭkāra indra iṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8468: śeṣas tatrendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ ca. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ prasthitadevatāyāś cendrasya mitrāvaruṇādīnāṃ copalakṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8475: tac cheṣas tatpīta ity uktam. ihāpi tadvad eva vaditavyam. tasmāc camase camase dvayor upalakṣaṇam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8486: tad yathācāryaśeṣaṃ devadatto bhuñjāno yadi śeṣaṃ pūrṇakāya prayacchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8489: nācāryaśeṣam. tasmān na prasthitadevatā indra upalakṣayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8493: tasyāpi hy asau śeṣaḥ pratyakṣam avagamyate. nanv apanīta iti. ucyate - nāsāv apanīyate. sakṛd dhutāṃś camasānabhidroṇakalaśād gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8495: 206*} camasastho hotum unnetavyaḥ preṣito vā. yat tu yakṣyamāṇā devatāḥ praty āśrā[269]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8496: 207*}vita iti. ucyate - āśrāvyate tatra devatābhyo na tv idaṃ vā tad veti. tena{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8497: 208*} yad dhotuṃ gṛhītaṃ tad āśrāvitam iti gamyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8502: 209*} ca. ataḥ sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam iti. kṛtvācintaiṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8515: tataḥ pātnīvato gṛhyate. atha hute pātnīvate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8516: tac cheṣe bhakṣyamāṇe bhavati saṃdehaḥ - kim indravāyvādaya upalakṣayitavyā na veti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8517: upalakṣayitavyāḥ. teṣām api hy asau śeṣo yathā prasthitadevatāyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8521: tatra hi pātralakṣaṇatvena saṃkīrtyate na somo grāhyatvena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8524: yakṣyamāṇadevatāṃ prati. nanu sthālyām āgrayaṇo nāgrayaṇaś{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8525: 210*} ca, tatra yas tasmād āgrayaṇād gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8527: yas tu saṃpātānn āsau pātnīvata iti. ucyate - āgrayaṇo 'pādānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8531: [270]{*3/212*} nanv anāgrayaṇād apy apetaḥ. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8533: tenāsau pūrvadevatābhiḥ pīta iti na śakyate vaktum. yo hīndrārthasya somasyāvayavaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:8534: śeṣaḥ sa indrapīta iti prakṛtāv ucyate. ihāpi tadvad eva pūrvadevatārthasyāvayavo
GSP28msbh1-7u:8537: na hi hutasyāvayavo dṛśyate. nanu prakṛtāv api hutasyāvayavo na dṛśyate. ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:8538: hutāhutasya samudāyasya tatrāvayava upalakṣyate taddevatasya. nanv ihāpi samudāya evāsīt taddevatyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8543: āha pūrvadevatāpītasyāsāv avayava āsīt tena bhūtapūrvagatyā bhaviṣyati. ucyate - prakṛtau na bhūtapūrvagatyābhidhānaṃ kṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8544: ihāpi tadvad eva na kartavyam iti. api cendradevatyas tatrendrapīta ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8546: asya punaḥ pūrvadevatāsaṃbandho 'pagataḥ. tasmān nātra pūrvadevatopalakṣaṇīyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8553: agnā i patnīvan sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ pibeti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8554: 213*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ tvaṣṭopalakṣayitavyo na veti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8556: pānāt, pānaṃ śrūyate - sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā [271]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8557: 214*} somaṃ pibeti. tenāyam agnaye patnīvate saha tvaṣṭrā dīyata iti gamyate. yasmai ca yena saha dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8560: yathā devadattāya yajñadattena saha śataṃ dīyatām ity ukte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8561: tatrobhābhyām api dīyate. tasmāt tvāṣṭro 'py asau soma iti tvaṣṭopalakṣayitavyaḥ. asāv apīndra iva{*3/215*} pibatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8570: śabdaś cāgneḥ patnīvataḥ pānam āha tvaṣṭuḥ sahabhāvamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8571: na hy ananuṣṭhīyamāne sahabhāvaḥ sidhyatīti tvaṣṭari pānam anumīyate. nanu tvaṣṭre pānaṃ coditam. satyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8573: na codanayā. codanā hi pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8574: loke tu kāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā coditam acoditam apy anuṣṭhīyata{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8579: *{3/216: E2,4, E1 (v.l.): coditam acoditam apy anuṣṭhīyata}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:8581: tasminn eva pātnīvate mantraḥ - aibhir agne sarathaṃ yāhy arvāṅ nānārathaṃ vā vibhavo hy aśvāḥ. patnīvatas triṃśataṃ trīṃś ca devān anuṣvadham ā vaha mādayasveti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:8586: dīyate hi somas trayastriṃśate devebhyaḥ. evaṃ hy agnim agnīd adhīcchati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8588: trayastriṃśatā devaiḥ saha samānaṃ ratham adhiṣṭhāya nānārathair vā vibhavanti hi
GSP28msbh1-7u:8589: te 'śvāḥ. tad idam anuṣvadham āvaha trayastriṃśataṃ patnīvato devān āgamaya tarpaya

GSP28msbh1-7u:8604: na ca parakīyasya dānam avakalpate. tasmāt tvam amūbhyas trayastriṃśad devatābhyo dehīty asamañjasaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8605: agnaye tv anena dānam uktaṃ bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:8607: tad iha vilaṃbhanaṃ saṃkīrtayan tvam asya īśāna iti pratyāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8609: na vilaṃbhayeti. ucyate - na hi mādyanti devatāḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8614: tasmād agner aiśvaryakaraṇam etad vākyaṃ lakṣayatīti nyāyyam. api ca pātnīvate somaś codyate - pātnīvataṃ gṛhṇātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:8615: nanūktam, māntravarṇikaṃ ca pratiṣedhati codaneti. ucyate - tad api māntravarṇikaṃ nāstīty uktam. api ca sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhatīti gamyate. na hi sāpekṣaḥ patnīvac chabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8617: tasmāt kevalaḥ patnīvān devateti. etac codanāvaśena mantro varṇanīyaḥ. tasmād yathaivāsmābhir varṇito mantraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:8619: patnīvāṃś cāgnir agne patnīvann iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnir upalakṣayitavyo na trayastriṃśad devatā iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:8837: 248*} guṇārtham uta viparītam iti. yatarac cāmnānaṃ kriyārthaṃ taddharmā bhaviṣyanti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?

GSP28msbh1-7u:8855: yat tena codyate. acoditaṃ na śakyate kartum iti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:8882: kiṃ ca prayojanam iti. darśapūrṇamāsau prakṛtya śrūyate - samidho yajati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8941: atra cintyate - kim indrasya gārhapatyasya vopasthānaṃ kartavyam ity aniyamaḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8953: 271*}, ubhayatrāpi saṃhatyārtham abhidadhati padāni. tena vākyasya vākyasya caiṣā saṃpradhāraṇā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8964: naitat kasyacic chabdasya śravaṇād evāvagamyate. nāpi śabdāntarasya samīpa uccāritasya sāmarthyam asti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:8998: 275*}. na hi vijñānasya vijñānasya ca kaścid viśeṣa upalabhyate rūpaṃ prati,
