GSP28msbh1-7u:9009: samartham etad imam artham abhinirvartayitum iti liṅgād etāvad avagamyate. na ca yad yasya nirvartanāyālam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9010: tad asaty eva vacane tan nirvartayitum arhati. tasmān na liṅgaṃ viniyojakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9011: atrābhidhīyate - prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāne yam artham āmananti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9012: sa tasya sādhanabhūta ity eva gamyate. kathaṃ khalūpakariṣyatīti saṃdihyamāne bhavati sāmarthyāt pariniścayaḥ. yatrāyaṃ samarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9014: tasmād bhavati liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. na ca liṅgaprāmāṇye vinigamanāyāṃ hetur asti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9017: śruter gārhapatya iti. avirodhāt khalv apīmam evārthaṃ pratipadyāmahe. balīyān api hetur virudhyamānm abalīyāṃsaṃ bādhitum arhati nāviruddham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9021: nanv ayam eva virodhaḥ - sakṛd upasthānaṃ coditam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9022: asakṛd abhinirvartyata iti. upastheyabhedāt pratipradhānam āvartante guṇā iti nyāya
GSP28msbh1-7u:9023: evaiṣa na virodhaḥ. ayaṃ tarhi virodhaḥ - gārhapatya upasthīyamāne 'gnivacana indraśabdo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9024: guṇaṃ kriyāyogaṃ vāpekṣamāṇo bhavitum arhati. indre tūpasthātavye nirapekṣa indra[288]{*3 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:9025: 278*}vacana eva, gauṇamukhyayoś ca mukhye saṃpratyaya iti. neti brūmaḥ - virodhe mukhyena gauṇo bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9027: yugapad abhhidhāne hi virudhyeyātām. iha cānyasmin prayoge 'gnivacano 'nyasminn indravacanaḥ. atas tulyabale ete kāraṇe iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9028: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasī. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9031: śrutyārthaḥ. gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9034: 279*} anena mantreṇendra upasthātavya iti na śrūyate. saty apīndrābhidhānasāmarthye vacanābhāvād anupasthānīya indra ity eva gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9035: nanv idam uktam - prakaraṇāmnānād aṅgam ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9037: uktam evaitat - dharmasya śabdamūlatvād aśabdam anapekṣaṃ syād iti. yad etat prakaraṇaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9038: liṅgaṃ cobhayam apy etad śabdam. na cātikrāntapratyakṣaviṣaya evaṃlakṣaṇake 'rthe
GSP28msbh1-7u:9039: śabdam antareṇa paricchedo 'vakalpate. ato manyāmahe - viprakṛṣṭaṃ śrutyarthāl liṅgam
GSP28msbh1-7u:9040: iti. yady evaṃ śrutir yatra virodhinī na vidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9041: tatrāpi na liṅgād arthaparicchedaḥ. tatraitad eva nāsti liṅgaṃ pramāṇam iti. kuta
GSP28msbh1-7u:9042: evaitena śrutir virotsyata iti. tatra śrutiliṅgayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇaiva
GSP28msbh1-7u:9044: atrocyate - itikartavyathārthinaḥ prakaraṇavato 'rthasya saṃnidhāv upanipatito mantra
GSP28msbh1-7u:9045: āmnānasāmarthyād itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vākyaśeṣatām abhyupetyaitena mantreṇa yajeteti. kim uktaṃ bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9047: na cāntareṇendrābhidhānam ayaṃ mantra upakartuṃ śaknoti, [289]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9049: anenendro 'bhidhātavya iti. ataḥ śrutimūla evāyam arthaḥ. yadi śrutimūlaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9050: na śrutyantareṇa bādhituṃ śakyaḥ. tad etal liṅgaṃ yadi vā naiva pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9051: yadi vā śrutyā vikalpitum arhatīti. nāpy apramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9054: tasmān nāpramāṇam. yatas tu khalv ānumānikīm ekavākyatāṃ liṅgasāmarthyaṃ cāpekṣya śrauto 'yam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9061: anena mantreṇa gārhapatya upastheya iti. tatra vijñātam etad evam ayam upakaroti mantra ity etasmiṃś ca nirjñāte kṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor naitad evaṃ kalpayituṃ śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9062: indropasthānaṃ śabdenābhihitam iti. tasmād arthaviprakarṣāc chrutyā liṅgaṃ bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9064: anyāyyaś ca vikalpaḥ. tatra hy abhāvaḥ pakṣe nityavac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9065: aindryā gārhapatyam upatiṣṭhata iti śrūyamāne yad abhāvaḥ pakṣe parikalpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9067: śrutaṃ ca hīyate. yāvāṃś ca śrutasyārthasyotsarge doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9069: ubhayatra hi prasiddhir bādhyate. tasmād anyāyyatvād vikalpasya śrutiliṅgayoḥ śrutibalīyasīty avagacchāmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9070: atha yad uktam - sati virodhe nyāyyo bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9073: yad akṛtasāmarthyayor vākyaprakaraṇayor indropasthānavācinī śrutir bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9076: 281*} akṛtasāmarthyābhyāṃ ca śakyaṃ bhavitum. tasmād virodhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9079: syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomi ghṛtasya dhārayā suṣevaṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9080: 282*} kalpayāmi. tasmin sīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamāna iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9081: 283*}. atra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kṛtsno mantra upastaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9083: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ puroḍāśāsādana iti. yadi vākyaṃ balīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9086: tasmin sīdetyevamādiḥ pūrveṇaikavākyatām upaiti - yat kalpayāmi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9090: 285*}, sadanakaraṇam abhivaditum alam iti. tasmin sīdety ayam api puroḍāśaṃ sādayitum iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9094: yathā liṅgaṃ prati śruter balīyastvam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9095: na tathā vākyaṃ prati liṅgasyocyate. athavā vākyam eva liṅgād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9097: na ca balīyaḥ kāraṇaṃ śakyate bādhitum. tenāsya bhaṅguratām adhyavasyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9100: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - liṅgavākyayor liṅgaṃ balīya iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9102: prakaraṇavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnānād darśapūrṇamāsāṅgam ayaṃ mantra ity avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9103: tasmin sīdeti puroḍāśāsādanābhidhānasāmarthyāt sādane viniyujyamāne kṛtasāmarthyaṃ mantrāmnānam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9104: nāsti pramāṇaṃ yenopastaraṇe 'pi viniyujyeta. tathā syonaṃ te sadanaṃ kṛṇomīty{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9106: 287*} sāmarthyād evopastaraṇe viniyogāt kṛtaprayojane na puroḍāśāsādane viniyogam arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9107: na hy asmin viniyuj-yamānasya kiṃcid api prayojanam asti. evam upastaraṇe tasmin sīdety asya nāsti sāmarthyam. pūroḍāśāsādane 'pi syonaṃ ta
GSP28msbh1-7u:9113: tan mukhyam. tasmin sīdety asya punaḥ pūrveṇa sahaikavākyatām upagatasya bhavati jaghanyam. tad atra pūrvasya mantrasyābhidhānasāmarthyād upastaraṇe viniyoga ukto bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9115: uttarasya tūpajanite 'bhidhānasāmarthye tataḥ śrutyartha iti liṅgāntarito viprakṛṣṭo
GSP28msbh1-7u:9116: bhavati. evam uttarasya sādane saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ pūrvasya ca liṅgāntaritaḥ. tasmād arthaviprakṛṣṭāl
GSP28msbh1-7u:9119: 290*} eṣa śabdo yady apy uttareṇākāṅkśita iti sādane 'pi prayogam arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9120: tathāpi bhitvā vākyam upastaraṇa eva viniyoktavyaḥ. tasmin sīdety eṣa ca sādane.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9124: sāmarthyaṃ ca liṅgam ity ucyate. tasmād bhidyamāne vākye liṅgam eva bādhitaṃ bhavatīti. satyam evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9126: liṅgam api khalv etad evaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ viprakṛṣṭārtham eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9128: tasmād abhidhānasāmarthyam. tataḥ śrutyartha iti viprakṛṣṭārthatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9129: viprakṛṣṭārthatā ca bādhane hetubhūtā. tasmān na [292]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9130: 292*} uttaraṇaikavākyatāṃ yāsyatīti. evaṃ tasmin sīdety uttaraṃ na pūrveṇāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9131: api cottareṇaikavākyatām upagatasya na kiṃcid api dṛṣṭam asti kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9133: śrutatvād upastaraṇasya sādanasya ca. evam uttarasya sādanapratyāyanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9134: na tu pūrveṇaikavākyatāyām. na caitau pūrvottarābhyām ekavākyatām antareṇa pṛthag yathāyathaṃ kārye na kurutaḥ. tasmāt pūrvaḥ pūrvatra viniyojanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9136: atha yad uktam - śrutyāpi tad bādhitam iti vākyenāpi tad bādhitavyam iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9137: na hi bādhitasyānyenāpi bādhanam eva nyāyyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9142: atha vākyaprakaraṇayor virodhe katham iti. kiṃ punaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9143: kartavyasyetikartavyatākāṅkṣasya vacanaṃ prakaraṇam. prārambho hi sa tasyā vacanakriyāyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9144: na eṣa vidhyādir vidhyantāpekṣaḥ. vākyaṃ tūktam eva. tayor virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9145: sūktavākanigadaḥ. tatra hi paurṇamāsīdevatā amāvāsyādevatāś cāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9146: tāḥ paraspareṇaikavākyatāṃ nābhyupayanti. tatra liṅgasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīprayogād indrāgniśabda utkraṣṭavyo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayoktavyaḥ. athedānīṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:9149: 294*}, sa kiṃ yāvat kṛtvaḥ sūktavāke samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9150: tāvat kṛtva ubhayoḥ paurṇamāsyam āvāsyayoḥ prayoktavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9154: vākyaṃ balavattaram iti. evaṃ sarveṣu saṃśayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9160: tasmāt tulyabala iti. athavā vākyaṃ durbalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9162: ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9164: vākya ekaikaṃ padaṃ vibhajyamānaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9168: itikartavyatākāṅkṣasya samīpa upanipatitaṃ pūrṇam iti tasya prakṛtasya sākāṅkṣatvam avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9169: naikavākyabhūtam ity anumīyate. ekavākyatayā cābhidhānasāmarthyam avakalpyābhihito 'yam evaṃ bhavatīti parikalpanā. eṣo 'trārthaviprakarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9172: 296*} praharatīti paurṇamāsīdevatāvācinām amāv āsyā devatāvācināṃ ca niṣkṛṣya prayoge tac cheṣāṇām api niṣkṛṣya prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9173: tena yady api prakaraṇasāmarthyāt paurṇamāsīdevatāpadaśeṣāṇām amāv āsyā devatāvācibhiḥ sahaikavākyatānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9174: pratyakṣā tv amāv āsyā devatāpadaiḥ saha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9175: na ca pratyakṣavirodhe 'numānaṃ saṃbhavati. arthavati ca prakaraṇe saṃjāte na nirākāṅkṣāṇām ākāṅkṣā śakyopapādayitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9176: atha yad uktam - liṅgenāpi hi tad bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9179: tad bhaṅguram anyatrāpīty avagantavyam. atha bhaṅguram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9180: pramāṇam eva nābhaviṣyat. kiṃcit tu prati kasyacit prabhāvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9181: vākyasya prakaraṇaṃ prati bādhakaśaktir na tu liṅgaṃ prati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9182: liṅgaṃ prati viprakṛṣṭārtham etat prakaraṇaṃ prati saṃnikṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9184: [294]{*3/297*} atha prakaraṇasya kramasya ca virodhe kim udāharaṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9192: yenāvagacchāma idaṃ balīya iti. tasmāt tulyabale ete kāraṇa iti. api ca prakaraṇaṃ vākyena bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9194: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - prakaraṇaṃ kramād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9199: anekasyāmnāyamānasya saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānamātraṃ hi kramaḥ. tatra saṃnidhiviśeṣāmnānasāmarthyāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:9200: kramavataḥ saṃnidhāv āmnātasyānupalabhyamānam evākāṅkṣāvattvam astīty avagantavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9202: na ca prakaraṇavatā kramavatā ca yaugapadyenaikavākyatā saṃbhavaty āmnātasyeti virodhaḥ. tatra prakaraṇe pratyakṣaṃ sākāṅkṣatvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9205: sāmarthyāc chrutyartha iti saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasya śrutyarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9206: viprakṛṣṭaḥ kramasya. tasmāt krama karaṇayoḥ prakaraṇaṃ balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9207: atha yad uktam - vākyenāpi hi tad bādhitam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9213: kiṃ balavattaram iti. pauroḍāśikam iti samākhyāte kāṇḍe sāṃnāyyakrame śundhadhvaṃ daivyāya kramaṇa iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9214: 299*} śundhanārtho mantraḥ samāmnātaḥ. tatra saṃdihyate - kiṃ samākhyānasya balīyastvāt puroḍāśa[295]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9216: uta kramasya balīyastvāt sāṃnāyyapātrāṇām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9221: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - kramo balīyān. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9223: nirjñāte prakaraṇena kenāpi sahaikavākyatve yat saṃnidhāv āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9226: laukikaś ca śabdaḥ samākhyā. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9227: loka evaṃvidheṣv artheṣu pramāṇam. tasmāt kramo balīyān iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9228: yady evaṃ bhavaty evaṃlakṣaṇakeṣu krameṇa viniyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9229: na tv arthāviprakarṣāt kramo balīyān. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9230: dvayor hi pramāṇayor balīyastvaṃ prati saṃpradhāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9236: ity etad atra puruṣapramāṇakam. bhavati cāsminn arthe puruṣaḥ pramāṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9239: vedaśabdaś cāyam iti. na hy ete 'nindriyaviṣayā arthā upapadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9241: ye tv anindriyaviṣayās teṣv abhiyuktā na pramāṇam. tasmāt samākhyā kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9242: kāraṇatve ca sati balīyastvaṃ parīkṣyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9243: ucyate 'rthaviprakarṣas tarhi vaktavyaḥ samākhyāyāḥ. ayam arthaviprakarṣaḥ. upadiśyate hi krame samāmnānāt sāṃnāyyasaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9245: śabdam uccāryamāṇam upalabhyārthāpattyā nūnam astīti kalpyate. tasmāt pūrvavedārthaviprakarṣāt krameṇa samākhyā bādhyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9246: atha yat tatra tatrocyate - idam anena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9254: prāptaṃ bādhakaviṣayaṃ pūrvavijñānam iti brūmaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9255: sāmānyasya kāraṇasya vidyamānatvāt. atha kathaṃ nivartate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9259: na tan mithyā. tad eteṣāṃ śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ yat kāraṇaṃ tat paraṃ paraṃ prati balīyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9260: naitasyotpannasya vimṛṣyamāṇasya bādhakaṃ vijñānāntaram asti. tasmāt teṣāṃ samavāye virodhe{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9287: *{3/303: E2,4: naiva hi tannivartate. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9292: jyotiṣṭomaṃ prakṛtya samāmananti - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9293: 306*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ dvādaśopasattā jyotiṣṭoma utāhīna iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9296: evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati. nanu vākyena bādhyate. na bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9299: dakṣiṇayā kratukaraṇair vā phalena vā na hīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9303: asaṃyogāt tu mukhyasya tasmād apakṛṣyeta{*3/308*} // MS_3,3.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9306: ahīnenaikavākyatvasya pratyakṣatvāt. nanu jyotiṣṭoma eva gauṇo 'hīnaḥ. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9307: na hi mukhyasaṃbhave gauṇagrahaṇam arhati. nanu nañsamāso bhaviṣyati. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9310: 309*}. tasmāt prakaraṇaṃ bādhitvāhīnasya dharmaḥ. api ca vyapadeśo bhavati - tisra eva sāhnasyopasado dvādaśāhīnasyeti. yady anyaḥ sāhno 'nyaś
GSP28msbh1-7u:9319: jyotiṣṭome śrūyate - yuvaṃ hi sthaḥ svaḥpatī{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9323: 315*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - jyotiṣṭoma eva niviśete pratipādāu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9324: uta dviyajñaṃ kiṃcit kulāyādiṃ bahuyajñaṃ ca dvirātrādim utkraṣṭavya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9340: iti cet paśyasi - partipadāv utkraṣṭavya iti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9341: prakaraṇaṃ hi bādhyeta. bādhyatām asaṃyogād dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānair jyotiṣṭomasyeti cet. asaty api vacane 'rthād dvau yajamānau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9345: tathā yaṣṭavyam iti bādhitvāpi kāṃcit prāptiṃ yajamānaḥ sahāyam upādāsyate. evaṃ prakaraṇe pratipadau bhaviṣyataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9350: na kutaścic codakena prāpyante. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9351: yady evam, pratyakṣaśrutā na śakyā bādhitum. vikṛtau tu codakaprāptāḥ santa ānumānikā bādhyerann iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9352: vivakṣitaṃ hi jyotiṣṭome kartur ekatvaṃ pratyakṣaśrutaṃ na sāmarthyena bādhyate. yatrāpi hy avaśyakartavyatā śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9353: tatrāpy eka eva yajamānaḥ śrūyate - vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeteti. tasmāj jyotiṣṭomād utkraṣṭavya ete pratipādāv iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9354: atha kasmāt patnyabhiprāyam etan na bhavati?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9357: dvayor bahuṣu vā patnīṣv ete 'sṛgram indava iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9358: yathā kṣaume vasānāv agnimādadhīyātām iti kṣaumavasānaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9359: evam ihāpi pratipad vidhānaparam. ucyate - asaṃbhavāt tatra mukhyasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9362: iha tu dviyajñe bahuyajñe ca saṃbhavati na lakṣaṇāśabdo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9363: bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti. yad apy etad dvivacanaṃ dvayor yajamānayor iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9366: pumān striyety asāv api lakṣaṇāśabda eva. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9367: upāsmai gāyatā nara iti pratipador niravakāśatvam eva syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavye ete pratipadāv iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9370: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - jāghanyā patnīḥ saṃyājayantīti. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim etad vidhānaṃ darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9372: kathaṃ ca paśāv iti. yadi jāghanyāṃ patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante tata utkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9373: atha patnīsaṃyājeṣu jāghanī vidhīyate tato darśapūrṇamāsayor eva. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9379: nanu patnīsaṃyājā vihitā eva. satyaṃ vihitāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9381: sā tatsaṃbaddhā kartavyety ucyate. evaṃ sati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ patnīsaṃyājā vināpi jāghanyā na viguṇāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9382: jāghanī tu tatra pratipādyate. tasmād yatra jāghanī prayojanavatī tatra tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9385: 320*}māsayoḥ. ekadeśaś ca jāghanī pratipādyamānā na paśuṃ prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9389: jāghanī vā patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena vidhīyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9390: apūrvatāt, aprāptā jāghanī patnīsaṃyājānāṃ guṇatvena. tatra svaśabdena patnīsaṃyājā vihitā jāghanīsaṃbandhas teṣām avihitaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9393: saṃbandho nāntarīyakaḥ. yad vā saṃbandhasya vidhānaṃ nāntarīyakau saṃbandhinau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9400: kaścid eva tu lakṣyate yasya patnyaḥ sādhanatvena.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9401: atha kasmān na jāghanīṃ lakṣayitvā patnīsaṃyājā vidhīyante?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9403: jāghanyāṃ tu lakṣyamāṇāyāṃ yāge sapatnīke vidhīyamāne vākyaṃ bhidyeta. asti tv atra vihitaḥ sapatnīko yāgo ya patnībhir lakṣyate. tasmād yāgaṃ lakṣayitvā jāghanī vidhīyate. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9405: tad iha yāgavidhānaṃ na saṃbhavatīty uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9406: vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt. tasmāj jāghanīvidhānam. evaṃ ced darśapūrṇamāsayor vinā jāghanyā viguṇaḥ patnīsaṃyājayāgaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9409: atha yad uktam - ekadeśo jāghanī na paśuṃ prayokṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9413: na prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayor jāghanī śāstrenocyate. evaṃ paśor niṣpannayā jāghanyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:9414: patnīsaṃyājā yaṣṭavyā iti. aviśiṣṭā jāghanī vidhīyate. sā saṃbhavati darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ krītyāpy ānīyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9416: saṃtardanaṃ prakṛtau krayaṇavad anarthalopāt syāt // MS_3,3.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9418: 322*} prakṛtya śrūyate - dīrghasome saṃtṛdyād dhṛtyā iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9419: 323*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭoma eva,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9420: āhosvid dīrghakāleṣu someṣv iti. ucyate - naital luptārthaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9421: tasmān notkṛṣyeteti. āha nanv asaṃtardanam api śrūyate - asaṃtṛṇe{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9424: 326*}, yathā hiraṇyena krīṇāti gavā krīṇātītyevamādīnāṃ vikalpaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9425: evam atrāpi vikalpo bhaviṣyati - saṃtardanam asaṃtardanaṃ vā bhaviṣyatīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9437: 327*} saṃtṛdyād iti. jyotiṣṭomam apekṣya satrāṇi kālato dīrghāṇi bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9440: notkṛṣyeta vā saṃtardanaṃ jyotiṣṭomāt. evaṃ prakaraṇam anugṛhītaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9444: na caitad asti - jyotiṣṭome saṃniveśa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9451: dīrghakāle some punaḥ punar grāvabhir abhihanyamāne somābhiṣavaṇaphalakayor dāraṇaśaṅkāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9456: atha kim arthaṃ saṃsthāsu na niveśaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9458: dīrghasomaśabdaś ca. dīrghakālo hy agniṣṭomam apekṣyokthyādiṣu saṃsthāsu soma iti. ucyate - na saṃsthāsu dīrghakālatve 'pi some 'rthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9459: tāvān eva hi tatra somo daśa muṣṭīr mimīta iti vacanāt. tatra dhāraṇe na viśeṣaḥ kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9467: pradānāni hi vivardhante. tāny avivṛddhe pradeye na śakyāni vivardhayitum. pūrṇe grahe grahaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9468: tena na śakyāni nyūnāni pātrāṇi grahītum. tasmād dāraṇāśaṅkāyāṃ dhāraṇam āśaṃsitavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9471: iti cet paśyasi - saṃsthāsv apy arthavādo 'vakalpate pradeyavivṛddhyeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9477: ukthyādiṣv api daśamuṣṭir eva somo grahītavyaḥ. nanv arthāt pradeyaṃ vivartsyatīti. daśamuṣṭiḥ sa kathaṃ śakyeta vivardhayitum?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9478: triparveti ca parvasaṃkhyāniyamān na śakyo bahuparvā grahītum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9484: prakaraṇānugrahāt. arthāc ca pradeyavivṛddhyā dāraṇaśaṅkāyām arthavāda upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9486: viprakṛṣṭaparvā somo grahīṣyate. api ca tṛtīye savana 'śur eko 'bhiṣūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9487: tasya pramāṇaṃ ca nāmnātam. tam anekaparvāṇaṃ sthūlaparvāṇaṃ ca grahīṣyati, [304]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9493: jyotiṣṭome pravargyaṃ prakṛtya samāmnāyate - na prathamayajñe pravṛñjyād dvitīye tṛtīye vā pravṛñjyād iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ jyotiṣṭome sarveṣv eva prayogeṣu na pravarjitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9494: uta prathame prayoge pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9497: prathamaśabdena yajño 'bhidhīyate jyotiṣṭomaḥ. tasya hi prathamasaṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9498: evaṃ samāmnāyate - eṣa vāva prathamo yajñānāṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9499: 330*} yaj jyotiṣṭomo ya etenānṣṭvāthānyena yajeteti. yajñānāṃ prathama iti kṛtvā prathamaśabdena jyotiṣṭomo 'bhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9501: yadi krator eṣa vādaḥ. tasmāt saṃkhyāyuktaḥ pratiṣedho jyotiṣṭomasya pravargyaṃ pratiṣedhed iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9504: naimittikaṃ vā kartṛsaṃyogāl liṅgasya tannimittatvā // MS_3,3.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9505: na caitad asti - yajñasyaiṣa vāda iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9510: kartṛsaṃyogāt. pūrvasya dvitīyādīn apekṣya prathamaśabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9514: śrutiś ca balīyasī na lakṣaṇā. tasmāt prathame prayoge na pravarjitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9515: atha yad uktam - jyotiṣṭomena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tad vacana iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9516: laksaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti tat parihṛtam. yat tu prathamayajña iti yajñaśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9520: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau pratīyetācodanāt prakṛtau // MS_3,3.34 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9521: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ samāmananti - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hi sa iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9522: 333*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9525: prakaraṇāt. nanu prakṛtau pūṣaṇaṃ na kasyacid dhaviṣo devatāṃ samāmanantīti. ucyate - prākṛtīṃ kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9526: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yatra pauṣṇaṃ havir asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9529: tasmād utkraṣṭavyaṃ peṣaṇam iti. yad uktam - kāṃcid devatāṃ pūṣaśabdo vakṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9531: yady anyatrāpi mukhyaḥ pūṣā na syāt. nanv anyatra kriyamāṇe prakaraṇam uparudhyeta. uparudhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9532: vākyaṃ hy asyoparodhakam. athavā naivātra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9533: evam eva prāptam ucyate - pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau na prakṛtāv iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9542: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ prakṛtau śrūyamāṇaṃ vikṛtāv ity uktam. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ carau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9545: uta carāv eveti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9546: tat sarvatra syāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9549: carau vā, arthoktaṃ puroḍāśe 'rthavipratiṣedhāt paśau na syāt // MS_3,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9550: carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ viniyujyeta. puroḍāśe tāvat peṣaṇam arthād eva prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9552: tad arthaṃ tāvan na vacanam. paśau ca na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9553: hṛdayādiṣu piṣyamāṇeṣu teṣām ākāravināśaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9556: tathānyad apy avadānaṃ na yathāśrutād avadāsyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9557: nanu śakyate piṣṭebhyo 'pi hṛdayādibhyo 'vadātum. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9563: tasmāc carau pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīty evam arthaṃ vacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9568: iti cet paśyati bhavān - arthavipratiṣedhān na paśvartham [307]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9571: piṣyamāṇo hi piṣṭakaṃ yavāgūrvā syāt khalir vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9574: atrocyate - satyaṃ viśadasiddha odane caruśabdaḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9576: na tv asya viśadasiddhir nimittam. yadi viśadasiddhir nimittaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9577: na piṣṭasiddhe prayujyeta. tatrāpi hi prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9581: tad etad ucyate - na paktināmatvād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9585: carur iti. anavasrāvitāntaruṣmapākenābhinirvartyasya bhavati caruśabdo vācakaḥ. tena piṣṭa odane viśadaudane ca prayoktāro bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9590: pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ vikṛtau bhavati carāv evety uktam. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kim ekadevatye pauṣṇa etad bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9592: rājasūya uttare trisaṃyukte saumāpauṣṇe ekādaśakapāle aindrāpauṣṇaś caruḥ śyāvo dakṣiṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9603: apiṣṭa itarasya syāt. tatra viṣamaḥ pāko bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9604: pākanimittaś ca caruśabdaḥ sa vipratiṣidhyeta. athāvirodhaṃ manyamānā aparasyāpi bhāgaṃ piṃṣyuḥ. bhāgasaṃmohaḥ syāt. tatra ko doṣaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9607: api vā sadvitīye syād devatānimittatvāt // MS_3,3.41 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9608: devatānimittam etat peṣaṇaṃ śrūyate - pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kartavya iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9609: sa ca dvidevatye 'pi bhāge piṣyamāṇe prapiṣṭabhāgaḥ kṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9611: tatra hi tad dhito nirapekṣasya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9614: na sadvitīyasya. iha tu prapiṣṭaśabdasya bhāgaśabdena sahānyapadārtho bahuvrīhiḥ samāsaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9616: na tv atra dvidevatye kaścid evaṃjātīyako doṣaḥ. tasmād ekadevatye dvidevatye 'pi vā carāv asya bhāgaḥ peṣṭavya eva.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9618: liṅgam apy evaṃ bhavati - tasmāt pūṣā prapiṣṭabhāgo 'dantako hīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9619: 340*}, devatānimittaṃ peṣaṇam iti stutir darśayati. tathā saumāpauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapen nemapiṣṭaṃ paśukāma iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9620: 341*} nemapiṣṭatāṃ darśayati. tathārdhaṃ piṣṭam ardham apiṣṭaṃ bhavati dvidevatyatvāyeti devatānimittam eva peṣaṇaṃ darśayati. [309]{*3/342*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:9624: vacanāt sarvapeṣaṇaṃ taṃ prati śāstravattvād arthābhāvād dvicarāv{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9627: nemapiṣṭaṃ bhavatīti kasmād etan na vacanam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9629: yadi vacanam etad bhavet saumāpauṣṇamātram anūdya sarvatra peṣaṇaṃ vidadhyāc carau paśau puroḍāśe ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9631: 344*} carusaṃbandhe nemapiṣṭasaṃbandhe cobhayasmin vidhīyamāne vākyam bhidyeta. tasmād yo yaḥ saumāpauṣṇas tatra tatra nemapiṣṭatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9634: puroḍāśe 'rthāt sarvapeṣaṇe prāpte 'rthābhāvāc ca paśau carau vāpeṣaṇe prāpte vacanam idaṃ bhavet. tatra caruśabdo na vivakṣitasvārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9637: tasmād bhavaty eva liṅgam. nanv aṅganāśabhayāt paśor apeṣaṇam. neti brūmaḥ - ardhapeṣaṇe nāṅganāśo 'piṣṭād avadāsyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9642: *{3/345: E1 gibt saumāpauṣṇamātraṃ prati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:9643: ekasmin vārthadharmatvād aindrāgnavad ubhayor na syād acoditatvāt // MS_3,3.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:9644: ekadevatye vā pauṣṇaṃ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9647: pūṣṇo bhāgaḥ piṣṭa upayoktavya iti. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9650: na devatādharma iti. ucyate - na hi tasyā bhāgo 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9652: tat tasyā bhāgo bhavati. ucyate - etad dhi devatām uddiśya tyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9653: na ca tyāgamātreṇa devatāsvatvaṃ bhavati. parigrahaṇena hi svasvāmisaṃbandha āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9654: na ca parigṛhītaṃ devatayeti kiṃcana pramāṇam asti. yaś{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:9660: tathāpi na devatāyā dharmaḥ peṣaṇaṃ bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9661: niṣprayojano hi tathā syād ayāgadharmatvāt. kathaṃ tarhi prakaraṇāntare samāmnāto yāgadharmo bhaviṣyatīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9662: vākyasaṃyogāt. nanu ca devatayaiṣa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate na yāgeneti. ucyate - bhāgābhāvād anarthakatvāc ca na devatāsaṃyoga ity uktam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:9664: tathā vaktavyam. tad ucyate - ayam atra pūṣṇo bhāgo yaḥ pūṣaṇam uddiśya tyajyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9667: na sa caruḥ pūṣṇaḥ svatvena saṃbadhyate. tasmād aindrāpauṣṇe na kaścid asti pūṣṇaś caruṇā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9668: kevale tu pūṣaṇi devatābhūte tasmai saṃkalpito bhāgo bhavati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:9669: yam uddiśya saṃkalpo bhavati sa tasya bhāga iti prasiddhir eṣā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9670: tena yady api pūṣā svenoccāraṇenendrāpūṣṇor upakārakam uccāraṇaṃ kurvann upakārako bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9671: tathāpi na tasya dvidevatyo bhāga ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9672: asaṃkalpanāt. kevale pūṣaṇi devatāyāṃ caroḥ peṣaṇaṃ kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:9678: 348*} devatādharmaṃ darśayatīti. arthavāda eṣa itarasminn api pakṣa upapadyate.

GSP28msbh1-7u:9801: tasya kartavyatāvidhāyakam iti cet. naitad evam, [316]{*3/

GSP28msbh1-7u:10066: vacanam idaṃ bhavati - kiṃ me prajāyā iti te 'bruvan yo brāhmaṇāyāvaguret taṃ śatena yātayād yo nihanat taṃ sahasreṇa yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10067: yo lohitaṃ karavat yāvataḥ praskandya pāṃsūn saṃgṛhaṇāt tāvataḥ saṃvatsarān pitṛlokaṃ na prajānīyād iti. tasmān na brāhmaṇāyāvaguren na hanyān na lohitaṃ kuryād iti{*3/406*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10070: prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsayor avagoraṇādipratiṣedhaḥ. na darśapūrṇamāsyor brāhmaṇasyāvagoritavyaṃ vadho vā kāryo lohitaṃ vā praskandanīyam. anya upāya āsthātavya ānataye,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10072: 407*} iti prakaraṇāt prāpnoti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - śaṃyau ca prakaraṇād utkarṣaḥ. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10075: na darśapūrṇamāsagatenaiva nāvagoraṇādi kartavyam iti. nanu prakaraṇād darśapūrṇamāsadharmo 'yam. satyaṃ prakaraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10078: nanu jañjabhyamānasyeva prakaraṇe niveśo bhavet. nety ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10080: iha kḷptam. asti hy atra vidhāyakavibhaktiḥ - śatena yātayāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10087: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - malavad vāsasā na saṃvadet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10089: 408*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ malavad vāsasā saha darśapūrṇamāsāṅgasya saṃvādasya pratiṣedhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10090: uta puruṣasya sarvatra pratiṣedha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10092: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - malavad vāsasā saha saṃvāda utkṛṣyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10094: prāgaparodhāt. evaṃ śrūyate - yasya vratye 'hani patny anālambhukā syāt tām aparudhya yajeteti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10095: 409*}. patnyā ca saha saṃvādo 'dhvaryor darśapūrṇamāsayor asti - patni patny eṣa te loka iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10100: yataḥ pratiṣedham arhet. tasmād utkṛṣyeta malavad vāsasā saha saṃvādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10106: annapratiṣedhaś ca bhavati - nāsyā annam adyād abhyañjanaṃ vai striyā annam ity{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10108: 413*} vidhīyate, sa ca prakaraṇe na prasakta iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10113: aprakaraṇe tu taddharmas tato viśeṣāt // MS_3,4.20 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10114: anārabhya śrūyate - tasmāt suvarṇaṃ hiraṇyaṃ bhāryaṃ durvarṇo 'sya bhrātṛvyo bhavatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10115: 414*}. suvāsasā bhavitavyaṃ rūpam eva bibhartīti. tatra kiṃ prakaraṇadharma uta puruṣadharma iti saṃśayaḥ. atrocyate - aprakaraṇe tu tad dharmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10119: 415*} viśeṣo 'sya, nāyaṃ prakaraṇādhītaḥ. yady aprakaraṇe samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10120: sarvaprakaraṇadharmaḥ syāt. aprakaraṇe samāmnānaṃ na kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ kuryāt. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10129: 416*} chravaṇāt, bhāryaṃ yaṣṭavyam iti parikalpyeta. asati tu dravyadevatāsaṃbandhe vibhartir ayaṃ dhāraṇāvacanaḥ saṃskāravācī, [327]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10131: tasmāt karmaṇām agnihotrādīnāṃ śeṣaḥ. evaṃ suvāsasā bhavitavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10138: darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ hi karmaṇāṃ sāṅgānām aṅgānām ardhvayuḥ kartā. tasmād api karmadharmā evaṃjātīyakā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10140: dravyaparaś cātra bhavati nirdeśaḥ - suvarṇaṃ bhāryam iti dvitīyārthasaṃyogāt. dravyasaṃskāraś ca karmaśeṣapakṣe prayojanavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10142: syād vāsya saṃyogavat phalena saṃbandhas tasmāt karmaitiśāyanaḥ // MS_3,4.24 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10143: syād vā phalenaivaṃjātīyakānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ puruṣadharma ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10144: suvarṇasya vāsaso vā dharmo bhavan niṣprayojanaḥ syāt. nanu saṃskṛtena suvarṇena vāsasā ca karma setsyati. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10145: suvarṇasyāṅgaṃ na karmaṇa upakuryāt. śrutyādīnām abhāvān na karmāṅgam. tasmāt durvarṇo 'sya bhātṛvyo bhavatītyevamādinā evaṃjātīyakānāṃ phalena
GSP28msbh1-7u:10147: ānarthakyaparihārāya phalacodanayā saṃbandha eṣi-tavyo bhavati. anyasmāc caiṣitavyād ekavākyagatasya vipariṇāmo{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10152: saṃbandhasya ca tātparyādhyavasānam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ pradhānakarmopadeśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10153: yathā prajāpativratānāṃ phalena saṃbandhaḥ. etāvatā hainasāviyukto bhavatīti. evam atrāpi draṣṭavyam. tasmād evaṃjātīyakaḥ puruṣadharma iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10157: iha karmasaṃyuktā homā jayādaya udāharaṇam. yena karmaṇetsat{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10162: uta vaidikānām agnihotrādinām iti. śeṣatvaṃ tu nirjñātakarmasaṃbandhāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10171: na caitad asti - sarvakarmaṇāṃ karṣaṇādīnām apy aṅgabhūtā iti. homā ete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10173: āhavanīyasaṃyogo bhavati homeṣu. yadāhavanīye juhoti tena so 'syābhīṣṭaḥ prīto bhavatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10176: 423*} ca kṛṣyādīny āhavanīye vartante. na caiṣāṃ gārhapatyo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10177: yataḥ praṇīta āhavanīyaḥ syāt. tasmān na karmaṇādīnāṃ jayādayaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10181: itaś ca paśyāmo vaidikānāṃ śeṣabhūtā iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10183: ādhvaryavam iti hi samākhyāte vede jayādayaḥ samāmnātāḥ santo 'dhvaryuṇā kariṣyante. karṣaṇādiṣv adhvaryor abhāvād anadhvaryuṇāpi kriyamāṇāḥ samākhyāṃ bādheran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10185: doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāc chāstrād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.28 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10186: asty aśvapratigraheṣṭiḥ - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10191: atha vaidika iti. kaḥ punar laukiko 'śvapratigrahaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10192: ko vā vaidika iti. loke bhikṣamāṇo vābhikṣamāṇo vā yatrāśvaṃ labhate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10193: tatra laukikāśvapratigrahaḥ. vaidiko 'pi pauṇḍarīke 'śvasahasraṃ dakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭome gauś cāśvaś ceti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10195: 425*} ucyate - doṣāt tviṣṭir laukike syāt. doṣo hi śrūyate - varuṇo vā etaṃ gṛhṇāti yo 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇātīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10198: sa ca laukike 'śvapratigrahe śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ kṛto bhavatīty upapadyate. doṣasaṃyogāl laukika iti gamyate. āha na doṣasaṃkīrtanaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:10199: kiṃ tu prāyaścitta-stutyarthena. ucyate - doṣanirdhātārthe saty evaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10202: loke varuṇagrahaṇasya vidyamānatvāt. vaidike tv aśvapratigrahe tan na syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10204: 426*} tasya kartavyatāvagamyate. yadi ca tataḥ pāpaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10207: nanu vaidike 'pi pratigrahe 'pratigrāhyāt pratigṛhṇataḥ pāpam asti. ucyate - bhaved evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10217: yad uktam - yaḥ śūdrād anyasmād vā pāpakṛto loke 'śvaṃ pratigṛhṇīyāt sa etām iṣṭiṃ nirvapet. sa hi varuṇagṛhīta ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10219: yasyodaraṃ jalavṛddhyā śvayati. jalodaram ity eva loke tat prasiddham. na ca tasyāśvapratigraho laukiko nidānam iti prati[331]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10220: 427*}jñāyate. na cānena vidhīyate. tasmān nāśvapratigrahāj jalodaropapātaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10222: vṛṇīta ity eṣo 'bhiprāya iti. tadā prasiddhau tyaktāyāṃ kleśamātram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10225: rakṣaṇapoṣaṇavicikitsādinā kleśena naiṣa pakṣo vyavatiṣṭheta - laukike 'śvapratigraha iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10226: prasiddhiś ca bādhyeta. tasmād arthavāda eṣaḥ, yāvad{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10228: tāvad etety upamānenaiṣā stutiḥ. yo 'sya pratigrahaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10234: tasmād yajñe pratīyeta. laukike hi phalaṃ kalpanīyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10236: tasyāṅgabhūtā bhaviṣyati. tatra prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatā saṃbandhād avakalpyamānā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10237: parokṣāyāḥ phalavacanena sahaikavākyatāyā laghīyasīti yuktam iṣṭir vaidike dāna iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10243: 429*}. tatraitat samadhigatam - vaidike 'śvapratigraha iṣṭir iti. athedānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ pratigrahakartrā kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10250: 430*} pratigṛhṇīyāt tāvataś catuṣkapālān vāruṇān nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10258: pūrvapadānām uttaraiḥ padair yathārtham abhisaṃbandhaḥ. idaṃ śrūyate - prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anyad iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10261: sa svāṃ devatām ārcchad iti. sa iti sāpekṣaṃ pūrvaprakṛtaṃ vākyaśeṣam apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10262: sa iti prajāpatiṃ pratinirdiśatīti tena sahaikyavākyatāṃ yāti. sāmānādhikaraṇyāc ca prajāpater eva pratinirdeśo 'vakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10264: vaiyadhikaraṇyāt. sa paryadīryata ity eṣo 'pi prajāpatim eva pratinirdiśati pūrvaprakṛtam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10265: tena ca sahaikavākyatāṃ yāti. sa evaitaṃ vāruṇaṃ catuṣkapālam apaśyad iti prajāpatir eveti, niravapat{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10267: tato vai sa varuṇapāśād amucyata prajāpatiḥ. varuṇa etaṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10269: yasmād eva prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvaṃ dattvā paridīrṇaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10272: sa paridīryata iti. yatas tu vāruṇena pratimuktaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10273: tasmād anyenāpy aśvaṃ prayacchatā vāruṇo nirvaptavya ity aśvasya dātur vāruṇīṣṭiḥ praśasyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10274: kartavyānenākhyātena. tasmād aśvaṃ dattvā vāruṇīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10275: āha, nanu yo 'svaṃ pratigṛhṇāti sa nirvaped ity ucyate. evaṃ saty anyathopakrānte vākye 'nyathopasaṃhṛta upakramo 'py anarthakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10276: upasaṃhāro 'pi. tasmād upakrame vā śabdārtha upasaṃhāravaśena kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10279: varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād ity upasaṃhārānurodhena kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10282: yo 'śvaṃ pratigrāhayatīti. tatra - mukhyaṃ vā pūrvaṃ codanāl lokavad iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10283: 436*} prathamam anugrahītavyaṃ virodhābhāvāt. paścāt tanaṃ tu virodhāl lakṣaṇayā kalpanīyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10284: api ca, prajāpatir varuṇāyāśvam anayad iti varuṇād aśvaṃ pratyagṛhṇād iti bahvasamañjasaṃ kalpayitavyam. pratigṛhṇātīty eṣa śabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10285: pratigrāhayatīty etam arthaṃ śaknoti yayā kayācic chaktyā vaktum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10286: yo hi tad ācarati, yena ca{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10288: sa tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ karteti śakyate vaditum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10289: yathā ṣaḍbhir halaiḥ karṣatīti saṃvidhānaṃ kurvan vilekhanam akurvann apy ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10290: tatsamartham ācaratīti. evam ihāpi sa pratigrahasamartham ācarati yo dadāti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10291: 438*}. tasmād dadat pratigṛhṇātīti śakyate vaditum. tasmād adhyavadhāryedam avakḷptam. dadat pratigṛhṇātīty ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10300: *{3/438: E1 gibt yo dadāti in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:10302: idaṃ samāmananti - somendraṃ caruṃ nirvapec chyāmākaṃ somavāmina iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10303: 439*}. tatra saṃdehaḥ - laukikasya somapānasya vamane saumendraś{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10304: 440*} caruḥ, uta vaidikasyeti. kiṃ laukikaṃ somapānam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10306: ucyate - vaidikaṃ somapānaṃ jyotiṣṭome tadvikṛtiṣu ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10317: indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ pibatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10318: 443*} loke dhātusāmyārtham āsevite vamanena vinaṣte dhātusāmyavyāpadā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10320: śās-trād dhi vaidike na doṣaḥ syāt. tatra śeṣaḥ pātavya iti śabdāc codite nirvṛtte nāsti doṣaḥ. yady api vamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10322: kṛto vacanārtha iti na doṣaḥ syāt. tasmāl laukikasya somapānasya vyāpadi saumendraḥ{*3/444*} syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10330: doṣāt tu vaidike syād arthād dhi laukike na doṣaḥ syāt // MS_3,4.33 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10333: doṣāt, doṣasaṃbandho 'tra śrūyate - indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyata iti. laukike punar dhātusāmyādyarthaṃ kriyamāṇe na kiṃcid duṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10334: vamanāyaiva hi taṃ pibanti loke. athāpy ayam arthavādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10335: tathāpi phalakalpanāparīhārāya vaidika eveti kalpanā nyāyyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10352: 448*} karma. tad api tad artham eva. idaṃ hi somavāmina upakārāya śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10355: na hi tad ṛtvig arthaṃ karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10356: yatra somo vamyate. athocyate - somavāmino 'dhvaryor hotur vātmīyā ṛtvijaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10357: tadīyeṣv agniṣu nirvartayiṣyantīti. tathā sati yadi vā vyṛddhasomasya karmaṇo nāṅgam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10359: tatrātyantaguṇabhūtā adhvaryvādayaḥ svair ṛtvigbhiḥ kārayanto na phalaṃ prāpnuvanti. tad arthaṃ ca kriyamāṇaṃ na yajamānasyopakāre vartata iti na ṛtvijo vamane kriyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10367: somapīthena vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. yajamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10368: somasaṃskāre vinaṣṭe viguṇam asya karmeti vyṛdhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10369: na kathaṃcid ṛtvijo vyṛddhiḥ. ṛtvijo yasya somaṃ vamantīti vamanena saṃbandhaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10370: na yaḥ somaṃ vamatīti. tasmād api paśyāmo yajamānasya vamane saumendram{*3/450*} iti. [336]{*3/451*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:10375: tatra sāmāmnāyate - yad āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māv āsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatīti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10381: tadarthatvāt. puroḍāśa āgneyaḥ kartavya iti vacanam. tasmāt sarvaṃ pradātavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10385: niṣkṛṣyāvadānaṃ niravadānam. tad dhi śrūyate - dvir haviṣo 'vadyatīti. aparam api vacanam - dvyavadānaṃ juhotīti, tena{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10391: na caitad asti - dvyavadānamātraṃ hotavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10396: kṛtsnaṃ ca hotavyam iti tad evaṃ nyāyyam, nānyathā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:10397: kṛtatvāt tu karmaṇaḥ sakṛtsyād dravyasya guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_3,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:10398: ucyate - yadā dvir avakhaṇḍanaviṣiṣṭaṃ home śrutam, tadā sakṛd [337]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10401: tadā nāparaṃ dravyam astīti punar yāgo nāvartitavyaḥ. kathaṃ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:10403: na dravyaṃ yāgena saṃbandhayitavyam iti. yadi hi yāgena haviḥ saṃbandhayitavyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10406: tatsaṃbandhārthaṃ punar yāga āvarteta. na tu yāgo dravyasaṃbandhārthaḥ. kiṃ tarhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10408: yāgaḥ kathaṃ nirvṛttim upeyād iti dravyam upādīyate. tena nirvṛtte yāge siddhe ca puruṣārthe{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:10411: yenāvṛttir ta bhavet. yato yāgāt phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10412: bhūtabhavyasamuccāraṇe bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. na ca yāgena dravyasyopakāro nirvartyate pratyakṣaḥ kaścit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10413: tasmād dvyavadānaṃ hutvā śeṣayitavyam iti. yat tūktam - āgneyaṃ havir itivacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:10416: iha tu pratyakṣo dvir avadāne. api cākṛtsnasaṃbandhe 'pi tad dhitasyopapattiḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:13007: tā upāṃśu kartavyā iti. atra saṃśayaḥ - kim aṅgapradhānārtham upāṃśutvam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13014: pradhānārtho vā eṣa vikṛtiṣu syāt. evam idaṃ sarvārtham ucyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13016: tad evedānīṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣitam - kāmyā iṣṭaya iti. kāmyāś ca pradhānayāgāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13018: tasmād aṅgacoditam. yat kāmena phalavac codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13024: 774*} ājyam iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ navanītaṃ pradhānasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13027: tasya hi prakaraṇam iti vacanaprāmāṇyān navanītena pradhānaṃ nirvartayitavyam iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - asaṃbhava etasmiṃs tadaṅgānāṃ śyenāṅgānāṃ{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13029: somadravyakatvāt pradhānasya. nanu vacanān navanītaṃ bhaviṣyati. na śyene navanītaṃ bhavatīty eṣa vākyārthaḥ. kas tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13030: śyene navanītam ājyaṃ bhavatīti navanītājyasaṃbandho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13039: evaṃ ced dṛśyate - śyenāṅgānāṃ navanītam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13040: ādhāne 'pi pavamāneṣṭiṣu syāt. tā api hi śyenasyopakurvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13043: na śyenasya prakaraṇe pavamāneṣṭayo 'gnyādhānaṃ vā śrūyate. kim ataḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13044: yady evam, ādhānasya ca śyenasya ca na kaścid asti [432]{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13048: tasmān na pavamānahaviḥṣu navanītam. naitac chyenāṅgatve nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13049: yad ādhānam agnīnām upakaroti. yadi prakaraṇādīnām anyatamad{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13050: 777*} asti, tan nimittaṃ bhavet. tasmān na śyenāgnyādhānayoḥ saṃbandho 'stīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13054: idam idānīṃ saṃdihyate - kiṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ navanītam uta sarveṣāṃ iti. sutyākālānāṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13055: liṅgadarśanāt. idaṃ śrūyate - saha paśūn ālabhata iti. tatra punar vacanam - agnīṣomīyasya sthāne 'gnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13058: 779*} darśayati, tenāvagamyate śyenasya vacanaṃ sutyākālānām aṅgānāṃ viśeṣaṃ vidadhātīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13063: sarveṣām eva cāṅgānāṃ navanītaṃ syāt. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13064: aviśeṣāt, asati viśeṣe sarveṣām apy aṅgānām iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13070: tad apramāṇamūlatvān mithyādarśanaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāvat. kathaṃ tu madhye paśūnām ālambha iti. nyāyāt. ko nyāyaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13077: śākyānām ayanaṃ ṣaṭtriṃśatsaṃvatsaram. tatredaṃ samāmananti - saṃsthite saṃsthite 'hāni gṛhapatir mṛgayāṃ yāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13079: teṣāṃ tarasāḥ puruḍāśāḥ savanīyā bhavantīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ savanīyānām anyeṣāṃ ca saṃbhavatāṃ puroḍāśānāṃ sthāne tarasā uta savanīyānām eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13081: na śakyate puroḍāśānāṃ ca māṃsamayatā vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13083: bhidyeta hi tathā vākyam. tasmāt sarvapuroḍāśānāṃ māṃsamayateti. iti{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13084: 783*} prāpte ucyate - māṃsaṃ tu savanīyānāṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13085: tarasāḥ savanīyā bhavantīty ayaṃ tv anūdyate. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13087: puroḍāśaśabdas tu savanīyeṣv avakalpate. tasmāt puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvāda iti. tasmāt savanīyānāṃ dhānādīnāṃ sthāne māṃsaṃ codanāśeṣād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13091: iti cet paśyasi - savanīyeṣu puroḍāśaśabdo 'nuvādo bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13096: prakṛtau jyotiṣṭome dhānādiṣv ayaṃ puroḍāśaśabdo bhāktaḥ, saṃnihite{*3/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13097: 785*} prayuktaḥ, ihāpi bhākta eva prayokṣyate. atrāpi hi savanīyaśabdena te saṃnihitāḥ. prakṛtau liṅgasamavāyāc chabdapravṛttir vikṛtāv api
GSP28msbh1-7u:13100: ekaviṃśaḥ poḍaśī vairājasāmā iti prakṛtiliṅgena sāmaśabdena vairūpapṛṣṭho vairājapṛṣṭha iti gamyate. evam ihāpi savanīyānāṃ māṃsamayateti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13106: tṛtīye 'dhyāye śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānaiḥ śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam uktam. ihedānīṃ kratvarthapuruṣārthau jijñāsyete,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13113: arthavādaḥ kratvarthaḥ. prayojakaḥ kaścit puruṣārtho 'prayojakaḥ kratvarthaḥ. tasmāt
GSP28msbh1-7u:13114: kratvarthapuruṣārthayor jijñāseti sūtritam. tatrāthātaḥ śabdau prathama evādhyāye
GSP28msbh1-7u:13116: 2*} śeṣaviniyogalakṣaṇam apekṣate. ata iti kratvarthapuruṣārthajijñāsāviśeṣaṃ prakurute. kratave yaḥ sa kratvarthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13117: puruṣāya yaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. jijñāsāśabdo 'pi tatraiva samadhigataḥ - jñātum icchā jijñāseti. tad etat pratijñāsūtram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13121: yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇāvibhaktavāt // MS_4,1.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13125: pṛṣṭākoṭenopadeśe garīyasī. tad ucyate - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13126: yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya prītir bhavati{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13131: nānyathā. avibhakto hi puruṣārthaḥ prītyā. yo yaḥ prītisādhanaḥ sa puruṣārthaḥ. puruṣārthe lakṣite tadviparītaḥ kratvartha iti kratvarthasya lakṣaṇaṃ siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13132: evaṃ vā sūtraṃ varṇyate - darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - anatidṛśyaṃ stṛṇāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13136: godohanena paśukāmasya praṇayed ityevamādīni. tatra saṃśayaḥ - kim evaṃjātīyakāḥ kratvarthā uta puruṣārthā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13142: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - yasmin prītiḥ puruṣasya sa puruṣārtha eveti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13144: tasmād ete puruṣārthā iti. nanu pratyakṣa upakāraḥ krator dṛśyata ity uktam. ucyate - satyaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13148: ya upakaroti sa śeṣaḥ. yas tu yadarthaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13151: evaṃ vā, dravyārjanam udāharaṇam. iha dravyārjanaṃ tais tair niyamaiḥ [437]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13154: vaiśyasya kṛṣyādinā. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvartho dravyaparigraha uta puruṣārtha iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13155: kratvartho niyamāt. yady eṣa puruṣārthaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13157: niyamād aniyamāc cārjitaṃ dravyaṃ puruṣaṃ prīṇayatīti. tasmāt kratvarthaḥ. kāmaśrutibhiś cāsya sahaikavākyatā dṛṣṭā. itarathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13158: anumeyena phalavākyena sahaikavākyatāṃ yāyāt. liṅgaṃ cāpi bhavati - agnaye kṣāmavate puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13163: tata etad api sati saṃbandhe karmārtham ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13165: phalaṃ cāsya kalpyeta. tasmād yajatiśrutigṛhītaṃ dravyārjanaṃ yena vinā yogo na nirvartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13166: sa yāgasya śrutyā parigṛhīta iti gamyate. tasmāt kratvartha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13167: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣārtha iti. etasmin kṛte padārthe prītiḥ puruṣasya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13172: tasmād vidyamānadravyasya viniyoga ucyate. na dravyārjanaṃ śrutigṛhītam{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13176: api ca, yadi śāstrāt karmārthaṃ dravyārjanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13180: tatraitan nopapadyate. api vā eṣa suvargāl{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13186: 20*} etad aṅgaṃ sad anupakārakaṃ syāt. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13192: naitāvatā puruṣārthatā vyāvartate. pratyakṣā hi sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13195: parokṣaṃ pratyakṣasya bādhakaṃ bhavati. tasmān niyamavacanāt kāmam aparam adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13196: na tu dṛṣṭahānam. tasmād yat puruṣasya prayojanaṃ prītiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13197: tad arthaṃ dhanasyārjanam ity evaṃ ca sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13199: prītyartham arjitena vā kratvartham arjitena vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13208: asmatpakṣe tu dṛṣṭena prayogavacaneneti. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13211: niyamād adṛṣṭaṃ bhavatīti gamyate. yathaiva bhavadīye pakṣe. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13218: atha yal liṅgam uktam - gṛhadāhādiṣu karma śrūyata iti. tatrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13220: tathāpi dāhe nimitte phalāya vā karmāṅgabhāvāya vā jāmavatyādīnāṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13221: 24*} vidhānam upapadyata eva. tasmāt puruṣārthaṃ dravyārjanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13226: yasmin kṛte padārthe puruṣasya pratītir bhavati in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13227: *{4/6: E2: tasya lipsārthalakṣaṇā. tasya lipsārthenaiva bhavati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13240: *{4/21: E2: eva, karmārtham upārjito 'pi vrīhivrīhir eva, tasmān}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:13247: iha prajāpativratāny udāharaṇam - nodyantam ādityam īkṣeta nāstaṃyantam ityādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ - kiṃ kratvarthāni prajāpativratāny uta puruṣārthānīti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13249: evaṃ hi, phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti. nanu śrūyata evaiteṣāṃ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13250: etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti. ucyate - naitat phalaparaṃ vacanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13251: vartamānāpadeśa evaiṣa śabda iti. tena yatrāditya īkṣitavyaḥ prāptaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13252: tatrāyaṃ pratiṣedha udyato 'staṃyataś ca niyamo vā syāt kaścit karmāṅgabhūtaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13253: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - tad utsarge prītyutsargo 'pi{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13256: na karmaṇaḥ. arthaprāptena kartrā saṃbandho yaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13258: na karmasaṃbandho 'vidyamāna eva. śāstraṃ cānatiśaṅkyaṃ pitṛmātṛvacanād api pramāṇataram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13260: indriyasthānīyaṃ hi tat. na caivam ādibhir dravyasya kaścid dṛṣṭa upakāraḥ sādhyate. tasmāt tena puruṣārthenābhisaṃyogāt kriyāyām evaṃjātīyakāyāṃ puruṣaḥ śrūyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13261: api ca, puruṣaprayatnaḥ padārthavidhimātraṃ lakṣayitum uccāryeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13267: 29*} itarathā niyamo lakṣyeteti. kiṃ tv iha niyamaḥ śabdena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13270: nodyann āditya īkṣitavya iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13271: etāvatā hainasāyukto bhavatīti puruṣasaṃbaddho doṣaḥ kīrtyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13272: na karmasaṃbaddhaḥ. tasmāt puruṣārthāni prajāpativratānīti. golakṣaṇāny apy evam eva kartarīkarṇyaḥ kartavyā ityevamādīni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13277: aviśeṣāt tu śāstrasya yathāśrutiphalāni syuḥ // MS_4,1.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13279: imāny api puruṣārthāni syuḥ - samidho yajati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13287: api vā kāraṇāgrahaṇe tadartham arthasyānabhisaṃbandhāt // MS_4,1.5 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:13290: kāraṇāgrahaṇe puruṣārthāni prajāpativratāni bhaveyuḥ. na tatra śrutyādikaṃ kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13293: 33*} nābhisaṃbandhaḥ prajāpativrataiḥ. iha tu samidādīnāṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāma kāraṇaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13302: loke 'pi, niṣpannakāryādiṣu prayojanavatsu yad asaṃyuktaṃ phalena śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13303: tat tadaṅgaṃ vijñāyata iti manyamānā upavāsaṃ japaṃ vā [441]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13307: tathā cāpare 'pi manyamānā na duruktaṃ manyante. tasmāt samidādīni karmāṅgāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13312: tatrāmnāyate - sphyaś ca kapālāni cāgnihotrahavaṇī ca śūrpaṃ ca kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca śamyā colūkhalaṃ ca musalaṃ ca dṛṣac copalā caitāni vai daśa yajñāyudhānīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13313: 36*}. tatra saṃśayaḥ. kim etāni dravyāṇi pradātavyāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13316: kim eṣa vidhir utānuvāda iti. vidhau sati pradānam anuvāde sati yathārthasaṃbandhaḥ. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13317: vidhir iti, tathā hi pravṛttau viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13318: itarathā vādamātram anarthakam. pradāne caiṣāṃ yajñāyudhaśabdo 'nugṛhītaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13320: yajñasya sādhanānīti. itarathoddhananādīnām āyudhāni bhaveyuḥ śravaṇena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13323: itarathā nānārthasaṃbandhād daśeti saṃkhyā nāvakalpate. tasmāt pradīyeran,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13324: aviśeṣeṇa vihitaṃ prakaraṇena pradhānasya bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13327: svena tv arthena saṃbandho dravyāṇāṃ pṛthagarthatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13337: prokṣitābhyāṃ dṛṣadupalābhyāṃ pinaṣṭīty evaṃ svena svena vākyenoddhananādiṣu prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13338: prāptānāṃ vacanam anuvādaḥ. prakaraṇam api vākyena bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13343: vispaṣṭaṃ caitad uddhananādibhiḥ sphyādīni prayuktānīti. bhavati hi tatra vidhiḥ - sphyenoddhantītyevamādiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13344: na tu yajñāyudhāni kartavyānīti. tasmād uddhananādiṣu vākyena prāptānām anuvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13353: tāny api vikalperan. tatra pakṣe bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13355: sphyādīnāṃ ca. evaṃ vā codyante cārthakarmasu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13357: paridhānīye karmaṇi - āhitāgnim agnibhir dahanti yajñapātraiś ceti. yadi pradīyeraṃs tatra na bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13360: liṅgadarśanena ca - caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo hūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13361: trayodaśām āvāsyāyām iti. tasmād apy anuvāda iti. [443]{*4/42*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:13364: asti jyotiṣṭome paśur agnīṣomīyaḥ - yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśuṃ ālabhata iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13371: utāvivakṣitam iti. tatraikatvam ayajñāṅgabhūtaṃ na vivakṣitam ity arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13373: nālambhasya guṇabhūtā saṃkhyā niyojanasya vā. kasya tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13374: paśor anaḍuhoḥ kapiñjalānāṃ ca. vibhaktir hi śrutyā prātipadikārthagataṃ saṃkhyārthaṃ brūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13376: vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasī. tasmān na yajñāṅgaṃ vivakṣitam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13378: paśvadīnām aṅgaṃ vivakṣitaṃ tathāpīti. ucyate, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13379: paśvādīnām aṅgenoktenānuktena vā kiṃcit prayojanam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13380: yajñāṅgena hy avipannena prayojanam. vipanne 'pi hi paśvādyaṅge 'viguṇa eva kratur bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13381: yajñāc ca phalaṃ na paśvādeḥ. tasmāt paśvāder guṇenājñātena jñātena vā na kiṃcit prayojanam astīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13383: yad dhi prayojanavat tad vivakṣitam ity ucyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13389: yena vijñāyate na tad vivakṣitam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13390: yadi somam apahareyur ekāṃ gāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dadyād iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13415: na ca śabdād gamyamānam ṛte kāraṇāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13420: na tv ayaṃ śabdārtho vyāmohādoṣā pratītiḥ. kuta etat?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13422: vākyaṃ ca śrutyā bādhyate. tasmād aśabdārtho 'yaṃ yajña ekatvād iti. śabdārtho 'pi hi pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13424: pūrvo dhāvatīti. sa pūrva ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13427: aparo gamyate. na tv aparo dhāvatīti śravaṇāt pratīyate. evam ihāpi paśum ity ekatvaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13428: na tu yajñe. yathaiva hi pūrvam ity ukte 'paro gamyata eva kevalaṃ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13429: na tu sa vidhīyate kasmiṃścid arthe. evam ihāpi saṃkhyā pratīyate eva kevalam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:13933: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - atihāyeḍo barhiḥ prati samānayatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13934: kiṃ samānayanam ājyasya dharmāṇāṃ ca prayojakam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13938: pūrveṇa nyāyenāprayojakatā prāptā. tad ucyate - mukhyaṃ samānayanaṃ liṅgadarśanāt. kiṃ liṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13940: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīty ātithyāyāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13942: tatas tatraikaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ samānīyate. ekam apy anuyājānāṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13943: tataś cātithyeḍāṃ tā saṃtiṣṭhata ity anuyājābhāva upabhṛti samānayanārtham ekaṃ caturgṛhītaṃ grāhyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13944: na tv anuyājārtham. tatra bahūnāṃ caturgṛhītānāṃ darśanam upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13945: itarathā hy anuyājābhāve naivopabhṛti catur gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13946: tatra caturgṛhītānīti bahuvacanaṃ nopapadyate. tasmāt prayojakaṃ samānayanam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13948: ucyate - dṛṣṭaṃ tatra prayojanaṃ prayājau dvau yaṣṭavyau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13949: tatra juhvām ājyena prayojanaṃ nopabhṛti riktāyām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13950: upabhṛto recanam adṛṣṭārthaṃ juhvāṃ nidhānaṃ dṛṣṭārtham eva. tena prayājahomārtham ājyasamānayanam aupabhṛtam ājyaṃ [461]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13951: 124*} prayojayati. tad api hi prayājārtham anuyājārthaṃ ceti vakṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13957: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti. yadā samānayanaṃ na prayājārtham iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13961: na hy atrānuyājān yakṣyan bhavatīti hetuvan nigado nopapadyeta. tasmāt prayājārthaṃ samānayanaṃ prayojakam aupabhṛtasyājyasya. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13965: aprayojanakatve na niyogato 'rdhaṃ yāvat tādvat vā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13967: darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ śrūyate - caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāty aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:13973: athavā aupabhṛtaṃ prayājebhyo 'nuyājebhyaś ceti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:13984: ṛtavo vai prayājā iti jauhavavacanam anuyājapratiṣedhārthaṃ prayājān saṃkīrtayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:13988: nāsty asyānuyājapratiṣedhe sāmarthyam iti. ucyate - na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13989: pratiṣedhakam etad iti. kiṃ tūtpattivākya ājyānāṃ naiva prayojanābhisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:13991: anuyājaprayojanatāsya vacanābhāvād eva na gamyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14000: na tv aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. tad api tathā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14003: yad upabhṛti gṛhṇāty anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇāti chandāṃsi hy anuyājā iti. anuyājārthatāsyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14007: evaṃ hi śrūyate - yad aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇāti prayājānuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14008: 128*}. nanūktam, anuyājebhyas tad gṛhṇātīty anuyājārthatāsyeti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14009: juhūpratiṣedhān nityānuvādaḥ. ubhayasminn aupabhṛte jauhave ca{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14016: tasmād aupabhṛtam ubhayārtham. samānayanaṃ ca tato juhvāṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14017: tasmād api prayājārthatā na śakyā bādhitum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14020: *{4/129: E1 gibt aupabhṛte jauhave ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14024: kiṃ tad aupabhṛtam ājyam aṣṭasaṃkhyena grahaṇena saṃskriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14025: uta catuḥsaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā dvayor grahaṇayor iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14035: anugrahavādaś ca bhavati - caturgṛhītaṃ vā etad abhūt tasyāghāram āghārya triritaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14036: 133*} prayājān yajati samānayate caturgṛhītatvāyeti caturgṛhītānugrahaḥ kathaṃ syād iti. kiṃ caturgṛhītaṃ bhavati samānayanena?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14040: yad avaśiṣṭaṃ catuḥsaṃkhyam eva tasya grahaṇam āsīt. kiṃ tarhi caturgṛhītatvāyeti. caturgṛhītasyānugrahārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14042: tat paryāptaṃ kathaṃ syād iti. evaṃ caturgṛhītaśabdenālpam iti lakṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14043: alpatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ kasyacid apekṣya bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14044: yadi hy aupabhṛtam aṣṭasaṃkhyam evaṃ caturgṛhītam [464]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14046: 135*} caturgṛhītaśabdena alpatā śakyate lakṣayitum. tasmād api paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14051: *{4/135: E2 om. caturgṛhītam alpaṃ bhavati, tatra}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14052: dvayos tu hetusāmarthyaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca samānayane // MS_4,1.48 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14058: 136*}, asatsv apy anuyājeṣv etad aṣṭagṛhītam evaupabhṛtaṃ bhavet. yadāṣṭasaṃkhyā guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14059: na tadā dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoś caturgṛhītān{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14060: 137*} ājyānīti bahuvacanam ājyeṣūpapadyate. tasmāc caturgṛhīte dve iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14061: āha, liṅgam etat prāptir ucyatām iti. tad abhidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14064: tena prayājānuyājeṣv api na tad aṣṭagṛhītena śakyate bādhitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14070: tad etad ihāṣṭatvam grahaṇe bhavati. kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte home sampādayet?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14072: aṣṭagṛhīte gṛhyamāṇe gṛhyete. caturgṛhīte dve nāgṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14073: 138*} kaścit sampādayet. tasmād dve ete caturgṛhīte iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14078: kathaṃ dve caturgṛhīte syātām iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14079: aṣṭāv upabhṛti gṛhṇātīty upabhṛti samānīte dve caturgṛhīte kathaṃ syātām iti. itarathāsaty aṣṭaśabde nānāpātrayor gṛhyeyātām. tasmād aṣṭaśabdaśravaṇam
GSP28msbh1-7u:14083: dvayoś caturgṛhītayoḥ satoḥ samānayane 'rdhaṃ samānetavyaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14084: aṣṭagṛhīte sati na niyogato 'rdham. tathā yatrānuyājārthaṃ na grahaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14086: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā ca siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14091: *{4/138: E2: na hi dve caturgṛhīte agṛhītvāṣṭagṛhītaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14094: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14097: rohite badhnātīti. tat saṃnidhāv idam aparam āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14098: svaruṇā paśum anakti yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14101: uta yūpaṃ kriyamāṇam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. tatredaṃ tāvan naḥ parīkṣyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14104: bhedena yūpān niṣpādyeta. na cet prayojakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14105: yūpaṃ niṣpadyamānam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahīṣyata iti. sa kathaṃ prayojakaḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14106: kathaṃ vā na prayojaka iti. yady eṣā vacanavyaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14112: svaruṇā paśum anaktīty anavagataḥ svaruḥ. etāvad asya{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14115: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti yūpaikadeśaṃ svarukārye 'ñjane viniyuṅkta iti tato 'prayojakaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14121: svakarmaśabdatvāt. svo hy asya karmaśabdaḥ svarutāyā vidhāyako bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14122: svaruṃ karotīti. evaṃ ca yūpakāṣṭāvayavasya svarutvaṃ kriyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14126: svaruṃ karotīti svarum utpādayatīti. yūpāvayavopādānaṃ vākyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14127: vākyāc ca śrutir balīyasīti. tasmād evaṃ sati na niyogato yūpakāṣṭhād eva svarur utpādayitavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14128: nirapekṣād anyasmād api vṛkṣāt kartavyo bhedeneti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14134: itaś ca nirapekṣasya svaror utpattir iti gamyate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14139: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na hi yūpam anuniṣpannasya garhaṇe jātyantarāśaṅkāvakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14140: yūpaśakalo hi svarukārye tadānīṃ viniyujyate. tasmād api bhedena yūpāt svarur utpādayitavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14143: tad ekadeśo vā svarutvasya tannimittatvāt // MS_4,2.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14144: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. yūpaikadeśo hi yūpam anuniṣpannaḥ śakalo grahītavya iti. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14145: evam āmnāyate - yady anyasya vṛkṣasya svaruṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14147: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti. na cātrāyam artho vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14173: yūpasyeti tu śabdo 'vivakṣitārtho bhavati. tatra śrutir api bādhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14174: vākyam api. na tv asmatpakṣe kiṃcid avivakṣitārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14176: yūpaśakalo vidhāyiṣyate. svaruśabdaś cāñjanārthena śakale upacarita iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14177: avayavaprasiddhiś caitam arthaṃ gamayiṣyati. bhavati hi brāhmaṇam - atha kasmāt svarur nāma?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14186: itaś ca yūpam anuniṣpannasya grahaṇam. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14190: sa svaruḥ kārya iti. śakalaś caikadeśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14192: saṃbandhiśabdatvāt. tāvatā ca vyavahārāt samudāyāpekṣiṇaḥ. tatra prakaraṇād anyārthena khadirādinā joṣaṇādikarmaviśiṣṭena yāgārthena prakṛtenāsyaikavākyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14195: takṣati ca. tatra yaḥ śakalaḥ prathamaḥ parāptitas taṃ ca svarum añjanārthaṃ karotīti. svaruśabdaṃ ca tatrānuvadann evopacarati. tasmān naitad
GSP28msbh1-7u:14197: 148*} yenānyasmād api vṛkṣād iti śaṅkyate. tasmāj jātyantarāśaṅkāvacanaṃ nityānuvādo yūpaśakalastutyarthaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14200: itaś ca na pṛthaṅniṣpattiḥ svaruḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14206: 150*} svaṃ svaṃ yūpaśakalam upagūhatīti svarubahutvaṃ darśayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14208: eka evaikādaśinyāṃ tantreṇa kāryaṃ sādhayet. yūpam anuniṣpannasya tu grahaṇe prakṛtau
GSP28msbh1-7u:14209: svayūpaśakalenāñjanaṃ kṛtam ity ekādaśinyām api codakaḥ svayūpaśakalam eva prāpayatīti
GSP28msbh1-7u:14210: bahutvam upapannaṃ bhavati. svayūpaśakalagrahaṇaṃ ca prākṛtasya grahaṇād adhyavasīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14213: na viśiṣṭa iti. tasmāt svarur utpatter na prayojaka iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14216: *{4/150: So E1,6, E2 (Fn.); E2 om. sve sve}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:14224: svarum ādatta iti. yathā kāṣṭhāni karoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14228: *{4/151: Die Ausgaben wiederholen zwischen MS 4.2.6 und 4.2.7 noch einmal MS 4.2.1-6 mit kürzerer,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14233: prācīm āharaty udīcīm āharati prāgudīcīm āharatīti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14235: uta śākhāvāda iti. digvāda iti prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14237: śākhāvāde lakṣaṇeti. tasmād digvāda iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14244: vākye śākhāśabdasyābhāvād anupapanno 'yaṃ saṃbandhaḥ. atha prakṛtā śākheti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14245: tataḥ prācīśabdena tasyā evābhisaṃbandho nyāyyaḥ. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14247: prakaraṇāc chākhāśabdena bhavet. ubhayathātra prācīśabdo lakṣaṇayā prakṛtāṃ vā śākhāṃ lakṣayet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14255: sarvasyaiva deśasya kutaścit prāgbhāvāt. tathā śākhāśabdo 'pi saṃbandhiśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14256: vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate. yadā vṛkṣasyety etad apekṣate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14260: tathā ca saṃvyavahāro 'vakalpate. yat tu śākhāvāde [473]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14262: bhavati lakṣaṇayāpi śabdārthaḥ. tasmāc chākhāvāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14268: śākhāyāṃ tatpradhānatvād upaveṣeṇa vibhāgaḥ syād vaiṣamyaṃ tat // MS_4,2.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14270: mūlataḥ śākhāṃ parivāsyopaveṣaṃ karotīti. tatrāyam arthaḥ sāṃśayikaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14278: ubhayaṃ ca prayojanavat. agreṇa vatsāpākaraṇādi kariṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14284: 156*} upaveṣeṇa vibhāgo bhavet. śākhām anuniṣpanno gṛhyate. kathaṃ tatprādhānyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14285: śākhāṃ parivāsyeti dvitīyānirdeśāt. nanūpaveṣaṃ karotīty api dvitīyā. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14286: nāsau parivāsayateḥ karma. kasya tarhi? karoteḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14287: āha, kasmād evam abhisaṃbandho na bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14289: śākhāśabdaś ca yathaivāgre tathā mūle 'pi. tatrāyam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14298: nanu prakṛtatvān mūlam upaveṣaśabdena saṃbadhyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14299: ubhayasaṃbandhe virodhaḥ. virodhe ca prakaraṇād vākyaṃ balīyaḥ. atha saṃnihitena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14302: 160*} na prayojayati chedanam iti. etad atra vaiṣamyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14313: 162*}evamādiṣu śākhāgrahaṇeṣu nopaveṣasya vyāpāras tataḥ śākhāśabdo 'paiti. na hi tanmūlaṃ śākhety ācakṣate. kim ataḥ? yatraivaṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14318: amūlaparivāsitatvāt. yac caivaṃ saṃskṛtayā śākhayā kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14319: tadarthaṃ chedanam. na copadhānaṃ mūlaparivāsitayā kriyate. tasmān na tadarthaṃ chedanam. kiṃ bhavati prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14327: haraṇe tu juhotir yogasāmānyād dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvāt // MS_4,2.10 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14328: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmananti - saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14335: saha śākhayā prastaraṃ praharatīti. sahayoge yatra tṛtīyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14337: yatra dvitīyā tasya prādhānyam. prastare ca vispaṣṭo yajiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14338: śākhāpi tasminn eva yajau prastarasya viśeṣaṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14340: āha, nanu tatra tatra guṇabhūtā śākhā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14343: dravyāṇāṃ cārthaśeṣatvād utpattyā cikīrṣitasya śeṣabhūtāny eva dravyāṇy upadiśyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14344: bhūtaṃ bhavyāyopadiśyata iti. tasmād anekaguṇataiva dravyānāṃ nyāyyeti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14355: yadi śākhāpi prahriyate. tena tulyayoge sahaśabdo 'yam. yadi prastaraḥ praharaṇe pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14363: dṛṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ hitvādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. kṛtaprayojanāyāḥ śākhāyā apanayanena vedivivecanāt sukhapracāro dṛṣṭaṃ kāryam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14364: na tu prahareṇa kiṃcit sūkṣmam api dṛṣṭam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14366: [476]{*4/167*} āha, nanu tṛtīyāśravaṇāt parārthena śākhoccāraṇena bhavituṃ nyāyyam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14369: tataḥ prastarasya kālaparicchedāya kīrtyamānā parārthā uccāryeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14371: nirjñātakālaḥ prastaro 'nirjñātakālā śākhā. tasmāt saty api tṛtīyāśravaṇe prastara eva śākhāyāḥ kālaṃ paricchetsyati. yathā dvitīyānirdiṣṭaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:14374: 169*}, tathā prastaraḥ. sāmarthyaṃ hi balavattaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:14386: na, tasyānadhikārād arthasya ca kṛtatvāt // MS_4,2.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14389: iha ca śākhayānyasyārthasya kṛtatvād vatsāpākaraṇādeḥ. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14390: nanu punaruktam etat saktvādīnāṃ pradarśanaṃ samādhiś ceti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:14395: 174*} punar abhidhīyamānaṃ bahu manyanta eva. kiṃ cintāyāḥ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:14403: utpattyasaṃyogāt praṇītānām ājyavad vibhāgaḥ syāt // MS_4,2.14 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:14404: darśapūrṇamāsayor āmnāyate - apaḥ praṇayaty āpo vai śraddhā śraddhām evālabhya yajata iti{*4/
