GSP28msbh1-7u:16031: tathā na kartavya iti. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16032: ādhānaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ced vṛtte darśe kariṣyate/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16039: paśvaṅgaṃ raśanā syāt tadāgame vidhānāt // MS_4,4.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16041: āśvinaṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyāgneyaṃ savanīyaṃ paśum upākarotīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16046: paśvāgame hi vidhīyate. paśunāsyāḥ saṃbandha utpattivākye śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16047: parivyāṇaṃ kṛtvopākaroti paśuṃ nānyatheti. evaṃ śrutir bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16052: raśanā hi yā ca yāvatīṃ ca draḍhimno mātrāṃ yūpasya saṃjanayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16053: draḍhimnā ca prayojanaṃ yūpasya. tasmād yūpasyaiva draḍhimne raśanā syāt. dvitīyā ca vibhaktis tatprādhānya eva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16054: raśanāyāṃ ca tṛtīyā. tṛtīyā ca guṇatve tasyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16059: 413*}, dvitīyā ca vibhaktiḥ śrutiḥ pratyakṣaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16060: vākyaṃ bādheyātām iti. yat tu lakṣaṇeti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16066: yuvā suvāsāḥ parivīta āgāt sa u śreyān bhavati jāyamānaḥ. taṃ dhīrāsaḥ kavaya unnayanti svādhyo manasā devayanta iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16070: ekayūpa ekādaśa paśavo niyojyā iti. pratipaśu raśanā kāryā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16071: yadi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. siddhānte dvairaśanyam eva. ślokam apy udāharanti -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16080: yo dīkṣito yad agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhata iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16082: svaruṇā svadhitinā vā paśum anaktīti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16087: yūpasya svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16092: *{4/416: E1 gibt svaruṃ karotīti svarum antaṃ yūpaṃ kuryād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16095: apaśyan ha sma vai purā ṛṣayo ye yūpaṃ prāpayanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16100: niṣkrayaśravaṇāt tadaṅgatā vijñāyate. tasmād yūpāṅgam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16103: tasya hy añjanārthena svaruṇā prayojanam. tathā hi śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16104: svaruṇā paśum anaktīti. tad añjanaṃ paśoḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16105: svaror utpattiṃ prayojayati. yadi tadartha eṣaḥ svaruḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16115: 419*} yūpaḥ prakṣipyata iti sa eṣa niṣkaya iva bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16120: pūrvasmin pakṣe. sarveṣāṃ siddhānte. ślokaś ca bhavati -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16121: svarur yūpāṅgam iti ced ekasmaiva samañjanam/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16136: uta kecid guṇabhūtā iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16137: darśapūrṇamāsayor yāvatya ijyās tāḥ sarvāḥ pradhānabhūtā iti. yajeta svargakāma ity aviśeṣeṇa yāgebhyaḥ phalaṃ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16139: sarve cāmī yāgāḥ. tasmāt sarve pradhānabhūtā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16140: api vāṅgāni kānicid yeṣv aṅgatvena saṃstutiḥ sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavaḥ{*4/421*} // MS_4,4.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16141: api vā kānicid aṅgāni bhaveyuḥ. kāni punas tāni?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16144: abhīṣū vā etau yajñasya yad āghārau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16146: 422*}, yat prayājānuyājāś cejyante varma vā etad yajñasya kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16150: varma varmavataḥ. sāmānyo hy abhisaṃstavo yuktaḥ. yadi cāṅgāni tāni saṃstutāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16151: tataḥ saṃstavo 'rthavān bhavati. tasmād aṅgasaṃstutāny aṅgānīti. [531]{*4/424*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16163: aviśiṣṭaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ pradhāneṣu guṇasya vidyamānatvāt // MS_4,4.32 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16171: pādau pādāvata iti sarvasyaivāṅgatvena saṃstutir iti sarvam evāṅgaṃ prāpnoti. tat{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16172: 426*} pradhānaṃ na syāt. asati pradhāne kasyāṅgam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16179: na tat sādhakaṃ bhavati. parārthaṃ hi tad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16180: na dṛśyamānasya prayājādeḥ prāpaṇārtham. tasmād anyad asya pramāṇam anveṣṭavyaṃ śrutyantaraṃ nyāyo vā. tasminn asati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16198: āgneyādīni tāni. nanv amāvāsyāśabdakānāṃ naiva phalaṃ śrūyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16204: kathaṃ paurṇamāsy amāvāsyeti ca dviśabdaḥ śrūyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16205: dvyarthavad vyapadeśāc ca. kathaṃ tad vyapadeśaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16210: pūrṇamāsa uttaras tayor atha yat pūrṇamāsaṃ pūrvam ārabhate tad ayathāpūrvaṃ prakriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16213: pūrṇamāsaḥ sarasvān. ubhāv etau yathāpūrvaṃ kalpayitvārabhata ṛddhyai ṛdhnoty evārtho mithunatvāyeti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16214: 429*}. tatra darśaśabdena prakṛtyāmāvāsyāśabdena bruvann ekārthatāṃ darśayati. śakyate ca candrasyādarśanenāmāvāsyā darśa iti lakṣayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16215: yathā cakṣuṣor abhāve sati cakṣuṣmān iti cakṣurbhyāṃ lakṣyate. [533]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16216: 430*} etasmād vyapadeśāc ca śrutitaś ca loke śravaṇād{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16222: itikartavyatāviśeṣaṇatvena paripūraṇasamarthaṃ tadaṅgaṃ bhavitum arhati. akalpyamāne vākyaśeṣe phalaṃ kalpayitavyaṃ syād iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16225: kiṃ tu darśapūrṇamāsavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣam eva syāt. anyāsyetikartavyatāśrutā kalpyeta. eṣām api prayājādīnām anyā kalpyeta. etad itikartavyatāvagamyamānotsṛjyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16227: kāraṇaṃ bhāgīti. eṣāṃ anyena phalena saṃbandho 'śrutaḥ. tasmān na sarvāṇi samapradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16232: *{4/431: E1 gibt loke śravaṇād in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16233: guṇāś ca nāmasaṃyuktā vidhīyante nāṅgeṣūpapadyante // MS_4,4.35 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16239: asmin pañcahotreti vibhāgāvijñānāc cedaṃ nopapadyeta. bhavati caivaṃlakṣaṇakaṃ guṇavidhānam. tasmād asmatpakṣa eveti. api cāṅgatvenādhārādīnāṃ saṃstutir upapannā bhaviṣyati. [534]{*4/433*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16242: tulyā ca kāraṇaśrutir anyair aṅgāṅgisaṃbandhaḥ // MS_4,4.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16244: āgneyādīnām apy aṅgatvena saṃstutir aṅgatvaṃ khyāpayed iti. tat parihartavyam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16245: utpattāv abhisaṃbandhas tasmād aṅgopadeśaḥ syāt // MS_4,4.37 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16254: agnīṣomīyaḥ paścād iti. etasmāt sāmānyādoṣā stutir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16263: itarathā na caturdaśa paurṇamāsyām āhutayo bhaveyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16264: na vāmāvāsyāyāṃ trayodaśeti. tasmād āgneyādīni pradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16266: jyotiṣṭome tulyāny aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_4,4.39 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16277: phalavac ca pradhānam. tasmāj jyotiṣṭome sarve yāgāḥ pradhānam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16279: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandhāt kāraṇaśrutis tasmāt somaḥ pradhānaṃ syāt // MS_4,4.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:16280: guṇānāṃ tūtpattivākyena saṃbandho bhavati. keṣāṃ guṇānām?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16284: na yāgamātrāt. yatra ca jyotīṃṣi stomāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16289: trivṛt pañcadaśasaptadaśaikaviṃśā etāni vā jyotīṃṣi. tāny etasya stomā iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16292: grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16297: sa jyotiṣṭoma iti. yaś ca jyotiṣṭomas tataḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16298: yataś ca phalaṃ tad eva pradhānam iti. kathaṃ punas trivṛdādayo jyotīṃṣi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16303: viśeṣato lakṣaṇāyām. api ca dyotater vā dīptikarmaṇo jyotayater vā{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16307: 444*}. tasmāt somayāgo jyotiṣṭomaḥ. sa ca pradhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16316: śiro vā etad yajñasya yad dīkṣaṇīyetyevamādi ca liṅgaṃ dṛśyate. tathā guṇāś ca jyotiṣṭomavikāre dīkṣaṇīyādayo dṛśyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16319: tulyatve na pravartayiṣyante dīkṣaṇīyādayaḥ. tasmād api somayāgaḥ pradhānam iti. [537]{*4/445*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16323: tan na prasmartavyam. ihedānīṃ kramaniyamalakṣaṇam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16325: śrutyādīnāṃ ca balābalam. āditas tu śrutikramaś cintyate. kiṃ yathāśruti padārthānāṃ krama āstheyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16329: avaśyaṃ bhāvini krame lāghavāt prayogaprāśubhāvāc cāniyama ity evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16330: śrutilakṣaṇam ānupūrvyaṃ tatpramāṇatvād iti. śrutir grahaṇam{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16332: sa sādhuḥ kramaḥ. śrutipramāṇakā hi vaidikā arthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16355: brahmacārī vācāryapreṣita iti. aniyamena kramaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16356: yathā pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. yathā tarhi siddhāntaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16358: tatrāha, anyāyyaṃ śrutivacanam iti. ucyate, kim ayaṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16360: na sādhur iti brūmaḥ. nyāyyaṃ tarhi. na brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16361: na sādhuḥ krama iti. kiṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16363: sādhor vacanaṃ bahuśo 'py ucyamānaṃ nyāyyam eva. asādhos tu sakṛd apy anyāyyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16364: sakṛdvacanena jñātasya punarvacane na prayojanam astīti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16366: 454*} api prayojanam ity uktam. vṛttikāreṇa tat kāryam iti cet. sūtrakārasyāpy aviśeṣo vṛttikāreṇa.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16368: tatra hy anya eva saṃśayo vicāro nirṇayaś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16370: anyapramāṇaka iti saṃśayaḥ. pratyakṣādīnām adhigamya nimittatvān na tatpramāṇakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16371: atīndriyatvāc codanālakṣaṇa iti vicāraḥ. codanālakṣaṇa eveti nirṇayaḥ. iha tu siddhe tatprāmāṇye vyavahārakramasya{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16375: kiṃ vā kramo vidhīyata iti. anekārthavidhānānupapatteḥ krame{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16380: tasmān na kramo vidhīyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. nanv avadānavākyeṣu kramo vidhīyate. satyaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16386: kramavidhānārthā śrutir iti siddhāntaḥ. tasmād apunaruktam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16391: *{4/449: E2: ye yajamānās ta ṛtvija ity}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16403: kim eṣa evotsargaḥ sarvatra śrutivaśenaiva bhavitum arhatīti. uktaṃ hi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16410: sa tasya guṇabhūtaḥ. yasmiṃś cāśrīyamāṇe padārtha eva na saṃpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16413: na vaiguṇyam. evaṃ pratyakṣaḥ kramasya guṇabhāvo yatra,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16420: tato varo deya iti. tathā vimokaḥ pūrvam āmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16422: arthād viparītaḥ kāryaḥ. yājyānuvākye tu viparyayeṇāmnāte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16425: pradānārthā yājyā. agnihotraṃ juhotīti pūrvam āmnātam. odanaṃ pacatīti paścāt. asaṃbhavāt pūrvam odanaḥ paktavyaḥ. praiṣapraiṣārtho tu viparyayeṇāmnātau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16429: *{4/462: E1 gibt sāmarthyāc ca in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:16434: yathā darśapūrṇamāsayor yājamānānāṃ prayājānumantraṇādīnāṃ nānāśākhāntarasamāmnātānāṃ vasantam ṛtūnāṃ prīṇāmītyevamādīnām{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16448: uta yaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ sa eva niyamyeteti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16460: evaṃ kṛte devas tuṣyatīti. tam anyaḥ pratibrūte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16464: dhūpadānasya prāthamyam anenoktam iti. tasmād vācanika eṣām eṣa krama iti. [541]{*4/468*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16477: ity uktaṃ tadbhūtānāṃ kriyārthena samāmnāya ity{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16478: 470*} atra. tasmāt kramasya vācakaśabdābhāvād vyāmoha eṣa kramo 'vagamyate. evaṃ cāpūrvāsattir anugrahīṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16479: itarathā sāpi viprakṛṣyeta ghaṭīyantra iva. darśayiṣyati ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16482: atha vakṣasa iti. yadi niyāmakaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16484: niyāmake hi pāṭhakrame pāṭhakramād eva prāpnuyāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16489: kratvekatve parārthatvāt svena tv arthena saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16495: parārtho hi vedo yad yad anena śakyate kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16496: tasmai tasmai prayojanāyaiṣa samāmnāyate. śakyate cānena padārtho vidhātum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16497: śakyate ca kriyākāle pratipattum. tasmād vedaḥ padārthāṃś ca vidhātum upādeyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16500: na pratipattum iti. agamyamāne viśeṣa ubhayārtham upādīyata [542]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16501: 472*} iti gamyate. pratipattuṃ cānena krameṇa śakyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16502: nānyena. ata eva ca kṛtvā pāṭhakramāpacāre,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16505: tasmin nirvartamāna eva kiṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt. adṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16506: tac cānyāyyaṃ dṛṣṭe sati. tasmāt svaśabdaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16516: taṃ tṛtīyaṃ juhotīti. yady aniyamenopadhānaṃ śaṃsanaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16517: vyatyastavacanam anarthakaṃ syāt. na hi kathaṃcid avyatyāsa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16526: pratilomadarśanaṃ nopapadyeta. tathā caturthottamayoḥ pratisamānayatīty ukte sati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16536: vājapeye saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti śrūyate. teṣu paśuṣu codakaprāptāḥ prokṣaṇādayo dharmāḥ. tatra [543]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16538: dvitīyādiṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ tata eva dvitīyo 'pi padārtha ārabdhavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16539: uta dvitīyādiṣv aniyama iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16546: sarve hi padārthāḥ pradhānakālān na viprakraṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16552: tathāpi tu yāvadbhir nāvyavahitaḥ śakyaḥ padārthaḥ kartum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16555: 480*} na vyavadhātavyam iti. yadi dvitīyaṃ padārtham anyata ārabheta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16557: tathā prayogavacanaṃ bādheta. nanu tathā sati kaścid alpair vyavahito bhaviṣyati. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16558: anumatānāṃ vyavadhāyakānāṃ tyāgena kaścid abhyadhiko guṇo bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16578: yo niyamyeta. aṅgāśrayo hi niyamo bhavitum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16585: 484*} ityevamādi śrūyate. tatrāgamena saṃkhyāpūraṇam iti vakṣyate{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16593: tatraitāsāṃ prāpnuvatīnāṃ pāṭhakramo nāstīti. evaṃ prāpta ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16595: tenaitā atra niyamyante. yāḥ pūrvaṃ samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16596: tāḥ pūrvam eva prayoktavyāḥ. ānupūrvyasya hi dṛṣṭam etat prayojanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16601: samāmnāyapāṭhakramād evātra niyama iti punaruktatā gamyata ity anyathā varṇyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16612: saha paśūn ālabhata iti. tatraiṣo 'rthaḥ samadhigataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16613: savanīyakāle trayāṇām ālambha iti. athātra pāṭhakramāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16615: uta sthānakramāt pūrvaṃ savanīya iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16620: savanīyasthānaṃ vyāhanyeta. āśvinaṃ gṛhītvā trivṛtā yūpaṃ parivīyeti. nanv itaratrāpi pāṭhakramo bādhyeta. bādhyatām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16631: uta puṃdevatyasyeti. niyamakāriṇaḥ śāstrasyābhāvād aniyamaḥ. iti prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16637: tasmāt strīdevatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ. tathā hi pradhānakālatā bhavaty aṅgānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16649: uta yathāpāṭham iti. mukhyakramānugraheṇājyasya pūrvām. iti prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16652: so 'nyathā kriyamāṇe bādhitaḥ syāt. sahatvasya punarupasaṃgrāhakaḥ prayogavacanaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16653: svakrameṇa padārthe saṃnikṛṣyamāṇe na bādhito bhaviṣyati. api ca pāṭhakrame svaśabdaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16658: mantratas tu virodhe syāt prayogarūpasāmarthyāt tasmād utpattideśaḥ saḥ//5.1.16//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16667: prayogarūpasāmarthyāt. prayogāya mantrasya rūpasāmarthyam. tad asya sāmarthyaṃ yena mantraḥ prayujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16668: tasya ca prayujyamānasya kramo dṛṣṭāya bhavati{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16669: 499*}. nanu ca brāhmaṇapāṭhasyāpi tad eva prayojanam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16671: aparam api tasya prayojanaṃ karmotpattyarthaṃ bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16678: sarasvaty ājyabhāgo syād bārhaspatyaś carur iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16680: kim āgneyavikārasya bārhaspatyasya pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ kāryāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16686: tadvacanāt. teṣāṃ sākṣād vacanakramo vikṛtau. tena saṃnihitānām upasaṃhārakaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16689: codakena hi sa prāptaḥ. tasmāt pratyakṣaḥ prayogavacano balavattaraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16700: mukhyakrameṇa kriyamāṇā na prakṛtivat kṛtāḥ syuḥ. codako hi prayoga[548]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16702: sa hy utpādayati prāpayati ca. prāpitān abhisamīkṣya prayogavacana upasaṃharati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16707: yathāprāptān evopasaṃhariṣyati. tasmāt pūrvaṃ bārhaspatyasya dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16716: marudbhyo gṛhamedhibhyaḥ sarvāsāṃ dugdhe sāyamodanam iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16723: tathā vikṛtiḥ syāt. prakṛtidharmā hi sā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16730: api vā kramakālasaṃyuktā sadyaḥ kriyeta tatra vidher anumānāt prakṛtidharmalopaḥ syāt//5.1.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16736: 506*} modakān bhakṣayatīty ekasminn ahanīti gamyate. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaṃjātīyakā vikṛtayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16745: yathaiteṣu kāleṣu sāṅgam. na ca dvyahakālatāyā bādhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16749: aparedyur madhyaṃdine yakṣyate. tathā gṛhamedhīye sāyam upakramaṇaṃ pūrvedyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16750: sāyaṃ yāgo 'paredyur iti. nanu vākyād ekam ahar gamyata ity uktam. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16751: padārthasāmarthyajanito hi vākyārtho bhavati. na cātra padārthasāmarthyam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16758: ekakālasaṃbaddhāni pradhānāny aṅgaiḥ saha śrūyante. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16760: tathā madhyaṃdine sāyaṃ ca. nāṅgāni prātaḥkālādiṣu. tatrānyakāleṣv aṅgeṣv anyakāleṣu ca pradhāneṣu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16761: na sāṅgaṃ teṣu kāleṣu kṛtaṃ syāt. tasmāt sadyaskālā evaitā vikṛtaya iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16762: dvy ahaṃ sākamedhair iti śrūyate. tat sadyaskālāsūpapadyate. [550]{*4/509*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:16769: tiṣṭhantaṃ paśuṃ prayajantīty apakarṣaḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16773: apakarṣe ca prayājāntam iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16776: aṅgānāṃ mukhyakālatvāt. evam anyeṣāṃ pradhānakālatā bhaviṣyatīti. tatra sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16783: 511*} prayogavacanena prāptaṃ bādhitvā pāṭhasāmarthyād anuyājebhyaḥ parastāt kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16785: sa tataḥ parastāt. evam eka utkṛṣyamāṇaḥ sarvaṃ guṇakāṇḍam utkarṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16793: 512*} nirvapasveti preṣyatīti savanīyānāṃ nirvāpakālaḥ. asti ca bahiṣpavamāne stute,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16797: kiṃ prātaranuvākakāle savanīyān nirūpya pracaraṇīhomādayaḥ saumikāḥ padārthāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16804: prayujyamānam eva hi pūrvapadārtham abhiniyacchati. sa tasya parastāt samāmnātaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16805: parastāt kartavyaḥ. saumikasya tu padārthasya pracaraṇīhomasya vacanāt kramo bādhitaḥ. alaṃkaraṇaṃ ca bahiṣpavamānasya parastāt samāmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16806: tasmāt tasya pūrvaḥ padārtho nirvapaṇādīnām antaḥ. tata uttare saumikāḥ padārthāḥ kartavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16811: alaṃkurv ity uktaḥ prokṣaṇādīn pratipadyeta. asmatpakṣe tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16812: alaṃkurv ity ukte 'laṃkaraṇam eva pratipatsyate. tatrālaṃkaraṇe prāptakāle prāptakālavacano loḍanto 'nugrahīṣyate. tasmād atra prāvṛttikaḥ krama
GSP28msbh1-7u:16813: asaṃyogāt tu vaikṛtaṃ tad eva pratikṛṣyeta//5.1.27//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16814: asti darśapūrṇamāsaprakṛtike paśāv agnīṣomīye vaikṛtaṃ yūpakarma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16816: dīkṣāsu yūpaṃ chinattīti. tat pratikṛṣyamāṇam arvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni prati[552]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16822: tat pratikṛṣyamāṇaṃ tato 'rvācīnāny apy agnīṣomapraṇayanādīni na pratikraṣṭum arhati. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16824: tataḥ prācīnaṃ saumikam. na tayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandhaḥ. na saumikaḥ padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16825: pāśukasyopakārakaḥ paśor vā. yadi hi tayor upakārakaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16826: tatas tasyopakurvataḥ kramo 'py asya sāhāyyaṃ kurvan guṇabhūtaḥ syāt. na tv etad asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16827: tasmān naiṣāṃ paraspareṇa krame niyamaḥ. ato yūpamātraṃ pratikṛṣyate. api ca yūpamātraṃ pratikṛsya kṛtārthe śabde saumikānāṃ svakramabādho na
GSP28msbh1-7u:16832: āgnimārutād ūrdhvam anuyājaiś carantīti. anuyājā utkṛṣyamāṇā dākṣiṇāgnikau homāv utkarṣanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16839: teṣām artho nirvartita iti. padārthānāṃ ca kramo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16841: yaugapadyena hi padārthā upakurvantīti vakṣyāmaḥ. padārthānāṃ cotpattiḥ kramavatī,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16844: yugapat prayogavacanenābhihitatvāt. ato 'nuyājotpatter utkarṣikāyā abhāvād dākṣiṇāgnikau
GSP28msbh1-7u:16845: homau notkṛṣyeyātām iti. api cānuyājamātram utkṛṣya [553] kṛtārthe śabde dākṣiṇāgnikayor
GSP28msbh1-7u:16853: pūrvedyur amāvāsyāyāṃ vediṃ karotīti. sā tv apakṛṣyamāṇā tato 'rvācīnān padārthān apakarṣati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16858: aprakṛtir pūrvikāyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vedikaraṇaṃ pūrvedyur āmnātam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16859: ubhayor api śvobhūte havir abhivāsanam. abhivāsanaṃ kṛtvāmāvāsyāyāṃ vediḥ kartavyeti na śrutyādīnām anyatamat{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16860: 519*} kāraṇam asti. tasmān nābhivāsanāntāḥ pratikraṣṭavyā iti. abhivāsane cāpakṛṣyamāṇe havīṃṣi bhasmībhaveyuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16872: 523*} uddhṛte 'gnāv agnihotraṃ viguṇaṃ syāt. tasmād utkraṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16874: yathā prātaḥsavanaṃ daivān mānuṣād vā pratibandhād{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16883: evaṃ sāṃtapanīyam agnihotreṇa na vyavahitaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16884: tatra kramo 'nugrahīṣyate. kramabhede ca doṣaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16886: 525*}, yad anyasya tantre vitate 'nyasya tantraṃ pratīyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16891: na sāṃtapanīyāyā vāgnihotram. tena nāsāv agnihotrasya purastāt kartavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16905: 527*}, utkarṣe 'pi vaiguṇyaṃ kālānyatvāt. aṅgāprāpter jaghanyaḥ kālavidhir bādhyatām iti cet. na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16909: 529*}, anupādeyatvena śravaṇāt. saptamī hy ādhārādiṣv asaṃbhavān nimittasaptamī draṣṭavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16910: atha yad uktam - savanavad utkraṣṭavyam iti{*4/530*}. tad ucyate -
GSP28msbh1-7u:16929: evaṃ stotraṃ svasmin kāle ṣoḍaśinaḥ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16939: stotrakramam anurudhyamānasya pradhānakramo virudhyeta. tasmān na stotrakramo 'nuroddhavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16941: 538*}, grahaṃ vā gṛhītvā camasaṃ vonnīya stotram upākarotīti [556]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16952: saṃnipāte pradhānānām ekaikasya guṇānāṃ sarvakarma syāt//5.2.1//
GSP28msbh1-7u:16953: vājapeye, saptadaśa prājāpatyān paśūn ālabhata iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:16954: 540*} śrūyate, agnīṣomīye ca paśau paśudharmāḥ samāmnātāś codakena prāptāḥ. teṣu saṃśayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16955: kim ekasyāder ārabhya dharmān sarvān kṛtvā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16961: itarathā pradhānāsattir viprakṛṣyeta. yathā bahuṣv aśveṣu pratigṛhīteṣu ye puroḍāśāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16972: nanv evaṃ sati pūrvasya padārthasyottaraḥ padārthaḥ paśvantaravyāpāreṇa vyavadhīyate. naiṣa doṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16973: evam api kṛtam evānupūrvyam. yo 'sau paśvantare vyāpāraḥ sa evāsau,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16983: ekajātīyānusamaye hi kriyamāṇe sahasrasyādhiśrayaṇe kṛte prathamaḥ śuṣyet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:16984: tasya ca prathamaṃ na śakyeta kartum.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16989: anekasahasrāśvapratigrahe tantrānuṣṭhānam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ. kāṇḍānusamayo 'bhyupetavya iti siddhāntaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:16993: uta caturbhir muṣṭibhir iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:16999: na kiṃcin niruptam iti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17001: na ca muṣṭimātreṇa niruptena na prayojanam. na hy [559]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17018: muṣṭisaṃbandhe sati vākyabhedaḥ prasajyeta. anirvāpāṅgaṃ ca syāt. tathopadhānādiṣv api,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17019: aṣṭākapālam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvapatīti nirdeśāt. dvir avadyati{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17022: 546*} saṃkhyādīnāṃ kriyāguṇatvaṃ bhavati. tasmāt samudāyenānusamaya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17026: saṃyukte tu prakramāt tadaṅgaṃ syād itarasya tadarthatvāt//5.2.6//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17041: 548*} syāt. saṃkhyāviśeṣavidhānārthaṃ ca punarvacanam. tasmāt padārthāvayavo 'vadānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17054: añjanādi yajamāno yūpaṃ nāvamṛjed āparivyāṇād iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17062: sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyata iti padārthenānusamayaḥ. anavasargaś ca prakṛtāv arthāt kṛtaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17065: arthāt kṛtaṃ codakaḥ prāpayati. tasmād yūpāntareṇocchrayitavyena{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17067: yathā pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīty arthāt tasya dhāraṇārthaṃ pātraṃ bhidyate. [561]{*4/552*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17070: na vā śabdakṛtatvān nyāyamātram itarad arthāt pātravivṛddhiḥ{*4/553*}//5.2.9//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17072: parivyāṇāntena padārthakāṇḍenānusamayaḥ syāt. śabdakṛtaṃ hi prakṛtāv anavasarjanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17074: adhvaryur yūpam ucchrayitum. saukaryam iti cet. vidhiśabdo bādhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17078: codakas tato balīyān. pātravivṛddhis tv arthāt kartavyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17083: kim ekaikasya paśor daivatāny avadāya tataḥ sauviṣṭakṛtāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17084: tata aiḍāni. atha daivatair devatānām anusamayaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17086: aiḍair aiḍānām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17089: etat kṛtaṃ prājāpatyeṣv api codakenaiva prāpnoti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17096: yac ca vacanāt prakṛtau kṛtsnāvadānam iti, daivatāny [562]{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17098: sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadeyāni. sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya na tāvaty eva hotavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17099: aiḍāny avadeyānīti prakṛtau śrūyate. tad iha daivatair daivatānām anusamayaṃ kurvan nainaṃ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17100: 555*} prākṛtaṃ dharmaṃ bādheta. daivatāny avadāya naiva juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17101: sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadyatīti. atha sauviṣṭakṛtāny avadāya naiva juhoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17108: itarathā paryāyeṇaiva syāt. tasmād daivatair daivatānāṃ sauviṣṭakṛtaiḥ sauviṣṭakṛtānām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17117: 558*}. asti tu tatra prākṛto 'vahantiḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17121: tato bhedaḥ. atha kṛṣṇājināstaraṇādis taṇḍulanirvṛttyanta ekaḥ padārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17122: tatas tantram iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17124: paryāyeṇa vibhavāt. ekasyopādānena siddher dvitīyasyopādānam anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt tantram iti. [563]{*4/559*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17130: niyataṃ hy ānupūrvyaṃ pāṭhakṛtaṃ sahatve saty upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17133: 560*} ca padair abhidhānāt. tasmād vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17139: staraṇādir hanter upakramaḥ phalīkaraṇāntaś ca tasyaiva śeṣaḥ{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17140: 561*}, yato hantis taṇḍulaniṣpattyarthaḥ. evaṃ staraṇādīnāṃ hanteś ca nādṛṣṭārthatā bhaviṣyati. tasmāt tantram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17148: kiṃ prayājānuyājānām ekaṃ pātram ājyasya pṛṣadājyasya ca dhāraṇārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17161: śuddhe 'nuyājānām. na caikasmin pātre viviktaṃ śakyaṃ kartum. maryādāyām api kriyamāṇāyāṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17162: pradīyamānaṃ saṃsṛjyeta. api cākārabhedād upabhṛta upabhṛttvaṃ vihanyeta. prāṇimātrapuṣkarā{*4 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:17164: athocyeta, pṛṣadājyam apy ājyam eveti na miśratvaṃ doṣāyeti. naitad evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17166: yad ājyasyāpareṇa dravyeṇāsaṃsargaḥ. evaṃ ced anupapannam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17167: yat prayājā pṛṣadājyenejyerann iti. api ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17168: evaṃ saty avaśyaṃ haviṣaḥ kācin mātrāpanīyate. na ca śakyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17170: prakṛtāv ekakālaṃ grahaṇam. ihāpy ekakālam eva kartavyam. tasmāt pātrabheda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17174: prakṛte pūrvoktatvād apūrvam ante syān na hy acoditasya śeṣāmnānam//5.2.17//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17175: 566*} śrūyate, agnaye kṛttikābhyaḥ puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17179: 568*} homāḥ samāmnātāḥ. santi tu prakṛtau nāriṣṭahomāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17191: mukhyānantaryam ātreyas tena tulyaśrutitvād aśabdatvāt prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ syāt//5.2.18//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17194: paścāt tu prākṛtaṃ prayujyeta. pradhānānantaraṃ vaikṛtasya pāṭhaḥ pratyakṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17195: tasmāt pūrvam upahomās tato nāriṣṭhahomā iti. prākṛtānāṃ vyavāyaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17204: so 'tra juhoty agnaye svāhā kṛttikābhyaḥ svāhetyevamādi. tasmāt pratyakṣād eva kramān nāriṣṭahomebhyaḥ parāṃ copahomā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17207: adhvarasya pūrvam athāgner upapraity etat karma,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17208: yad agnikarmeti. paścāt samāmnātasya paścāt prayogaṃ darśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17209: kṛtadeśāt tu pūrveṣāṃ sa deśaḥ syāt tena pratyakṣasaṃyogān nyāyamātram itarat//5.2.21//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17217: ante tu bādarāyaṇa ity ante prayogaḥ kartavya iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17220: māhendrasya stotraṃ pratyabhiṣicyata iti pratyakṣānugrahāyābhiṣekāt pūrvaṃ prayoktavyam. nyāyamātram itarat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17227: asti agniḥ, ya evaṃ vidvān agniṃ cinuta iti{*4/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17230: iṣṭakāḥ paśuś cety etad āmnātam. kiṃ tad eva pūrvaṃ kartavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17233: ante tu bādarāyaṇa iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17240: iṣṭakāḥ paśur ukhāsaṃbharaṇaṃ ca. tasmāt teṣāṃ pūrvaṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17245: 574*} tasminn eva krame codakena dīkṣitasaṃskārāḥ prāptāḥ. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17256: tathobhaye 'pi parastād dīkṣaṇīyāyāḥ kāryāḥ. yas teṣāṃ parasparāpekṣaḥ kramaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17257: tatra na kaścid ukhāsaṃbharaṇasyeva pratyakṣaḥ pāṭhakramaḥ pūrvatvaṃ sādhayati. asti tu saṃskāraṇāṃ prakṛtau pūrvaṃ pāṭhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17260: ante vaikṛtam iti. atha kim arthaṃ saṃnipāta āśaṅkyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17261: nanv ayaṃ saṃnipāta eva vyaktaḥ. asaṃdigdhe saṃdigdhavacanam etat. yathā -
GSP28msbh1-7u:17269: vivṛddhiḥ karmabhedāt pṛṣadājyavat tasya tasyopadiśyeta{*5/2*} // MS_5,3.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17279: kiṃ prati prayājam ekādaśasaṃkhyā praty anuyājaṃ ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17286: saṃkhyā śrūyate. pradhānasaṃnidhau ca guṇaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ pratidhānaṃ bhidyate, yathā{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17287: 9*} pṛṣadājyenānuyājān yajatīti pratyanuyājaṃ pṛṣattā guṇo bhidyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17298: api vā sarvasaṃkhyatvād vikāraḥ pratīyeta // MS_5,3.2 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17311: tantreṇa tūpakaroti saṃkhyā. itarāpekṣā hi sā bhavati. evaṃ sati sahatvasya prāpakaḥ prayogavacano 'nugrahīṣyata iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17318: uta svasthānād vivardhanta iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17320: yad uta daṇḍakalitavat. yo hy ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17322: sa ādita ārabhya parisamāpya punar ādita ārabhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17329: tata uttameti. tatra yadi daṇḍakalitavad āvṛttiḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17330: uttamāṃ kṛtvā punarādyāyā abhyāse kriyamāṇe 'sthāne sā vivṛddhiḥ kṛtā bhavati. svasthānavivṛddhau naiṣa doṣaḥ. tasmāt svasthāne vivṛddhir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17333: samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhāyyāḥ syur dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt // MS_5,3.4 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17341: 19*} cāntareṇa niveśa iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17344: 20*}, ity anena nyāyeneti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17345: samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa niveśa iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17346: dyāvāpṛthivyor antarāle samarhaṇāt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17351: 25*} antarāle vidhīyante. tasmān nānte syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17359: *{5/21: E1 gibt saṃstavād ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17366: tās tatra bhavitum arhanti. tena hi śabdena tatra saṃstavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17369: 26*} dhāyye, uṣṇikkakubhau dhyāyye iti. kāḥ punar etā dhāyyā iti{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17370: 27*} nāma? nāsya śabdasya prasiddhim upalabhāmahe. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17372: evaṃ hi bhagavataḥ pāṇiner vacanam - pāyyasāṃnāyyanikāyyadhāyyā mānahavirnivāsasāmidhenīṣv{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17373: 28*} iti, asmād vacanāc chrutim anumimīmahe. katamāsu sāmidhenīṣv iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17374: aviśeṣāt sarvāsvati gamyate. iha tu samidhyamānavatīṃ samiddhavatīṃ cāntareṇa dhyāyyāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17375: syur iti. sarvāsu sāmidhenīṣu satīsu dhyāyyāvacanād viśiṣṭānāṃ sāmidhenīnāṃ dhāyyāśabda iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17376: nanu pāṇinivacanād viśeṣeṇa sarvā dhāyyāḥ. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17377: viśiṣṭāsv api vacanam upapadyata eva. yadi viśiṣṭāḥ, tataḥ [571]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17380: tās tāvad dhāyyāḥ. tāsu ca dhāyyāsu satīṣu vacanam arthavad bhavati. arthavati ca sati vacane nānyā dhāyyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17390: atha yat triṣṭubhā paridadhāti nāntaṃ gacchatīti. nanu triṣṭub atrānte dṛśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17392: triṣṭubham evāyam uṣṇikkakumāv iti brūte. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17394: 31*} saṃstuteḥ, triṣṭubho vā etad vīryaṃ yad uṣṇikkakubhāv iti kāraṇe kāryavad upacāraḥ kṛtaḥ//
GSP28msbh1-7u:17396: *{5/30: E2 om. uṣṇikkakubhoḥ ca ante prayogo dṛśyatem yaj jagatyā paridadhyād antaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17398: stomavivṛddhau bahiṣpavamāne purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ syus tathā hi iṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe // MS_5,3.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17403: 34*}. atha bahiṣpavamāne vaikṛteṣv ānīyamāneṣu bhavati saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ vaikṛtānām ante niveśaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17404: uta prāk paryāsād iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17405: purastāt paryāsād āgantavaḥ syuḥ. tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ dvādaśāhe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17407: vṛṣaṇvantastṛcā bhavanti. tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17417: nadīparyāsa iti. evaṃ paryāso 'nte kṛto bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17429: stotrīyānurūpau tṛcau bhavataḥ vṛṣaṇvantas tṛcā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17430: tṛca uttamaḥ paryāsa iti. na hi vacanasyātibhāro 'sti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17460: vacanāt, trīṇi ha vai yajñasyodarāṇi gāyatrībṛhatyanuṣṭub iti. atra hy evāvapanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17461: ata evodvapantīti vacanenāsty upālambhaḥ. tasmān naiṣām ante niveśa iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17463: aupānuvākye kāṇḍe grahā iṣṭakāś ca samāmnātāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17464: eṣa vai haviṣā havir yajate, yo dābhyaṃ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17466: 44*}. tathā, parā vā etasyāyuḥ prāṇa eti yo 'śuṃ gṛhṇātīti. tatheṣṭakāś citriṇīr upadadhāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17470: kiṃ graheṣṭakamaupānuvākyaṃ savanaśeṣaś citiśeṣaś ca. atha kiṃ kratuśeṣo 'gniśeṣaś ceti. [574]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17475: yac ca yenārabhyate tat tad aṅgam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17488: agnim iti dvitīyānirdeśāt. tathā, yo dābhyaṃ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17489: 50*} gṛhītvā somāya yajata ity adābhyasya yajatinā saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17490: tathāṃśoḥ. tasmāt sakṛd yāgasaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtārthaḥ śabdo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17491: śrutaṃ saṃbandham abhinirvartya. tathā sakṛd agnisaṃbandhaṃ kṛtvā kṛtī manyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17494: parārthaṃ hi tayoḥ śravaṇam. kiṃ prayojanam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17514: āvapanaṃ vottamā citiḥ. anyā iṣṭakā upadadhātīti. [575]{*5/52*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17520: tāsāṃ madhyamā citir āmnāyate. yāṃ vai kāṃcid brāhmaṇavatīm iṣṭakām abhijānīyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17521: tāṃ madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadadhyād iti. nanu sarvā eveṣṭakā brāhmaṇavatyaḥ. nety āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17522: aparā liṅgakramāt samākhyānāc ca. tasmād etā nānte syur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17529: madhyamāyāṃ citāv upadheyā iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17555: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭayaḥ. santi ca niyatāni karmāṇi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17560: āhitamātreṣv asāv agniṣu karmāṇi kartuṃ samartho bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17562: āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād iti. darśayati{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17563: 62*} ca, agniṃ vai sṛṣṭam agnihotreṇānudravantīty āhitamātreṣv agnihotraṃ darśayati. tasmān na pavamāneṣṭayaḥ pratīkṣitavyā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17565: pavamāneṣṭibhiḥ saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇi varteran. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17569: āhavanīyādiṣu pratipattiḥ syāt. tasmāt saṃskṛteṣv agniṣu karmāṇīti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17571: *{5/62: E2: klinnaṃ dārvabhyādadhyād ityevamādīny āhitāgnivratābhyāhitamātreṣv eva bhavantīti darśayati}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17573: yat tu, āhitāgnir na klinnaṃ dārvā dadhyād{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17576: āhitamātreṣv āhitāgniḥ saṃvṛttaḥ. tasmād anantaraṃ vrataṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17585: tasya kaḥ parihāra ity ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram. [577]{*5/66*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17590: arthasya vidyamānatvāt. vidyamāno hi tatrānya evāgnihotrahomaḥ. kathaṃ hotavyam agnihotraṃ na hotavyam iti mīmāṃsante brahmavādinaḥ. yad yajuṣā juhuyād ayathāpūrvam āhutī juhuyāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17591: yadi na juhuyād agniḥ parāpatet. tūṣṇīm eva hotavyam iti. tasya tūṣṇīṃ homasya praśaṃsārtho 'yam arthavādaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17593: nyāyavipratiṣedhaś ca bhavet. yady anantaram agnihotrādayaḥ syuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17596: na vā tāsāṃ tadarthatvād iti. tasmāt saṃskṛte karmāṇi bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17599: saṃcite tv agnicid yuktaṃ prāpaṇān nimittasya // MS_5,3.26 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17602: tasmād agnicitā pakṣiṇo nāśitavyā ityevamādayaḥ padārthāḥ śrūyante. teṣu saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17603: kiṃ saṃcitamātre pratipattavyā uta kratvanta iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17604: saṃcitamātra eveti. agniṃ yaś citavān so 'gnicid iti tasya śrūyamāṇāś citavato 'nantaram eva prāpnuvanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17605: prāpte nimitte naimittikaṃ kartavyam. tasmād anantaram eva. [578]{*5/68*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17608: prayogavacano hy atra tān padārthān prāpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17609: yeṣāṃ kratvarthatvam. na caiṣāṃ kratvarthatvam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17613: na striyam upeyād ityevamādi. na ca kratvarthā ete prasaktāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17615: nanu puruṣārthā api citavataḥ śravaṇāc cayanānantaraṃ prāptāḥ. neti brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17618: yad agneḥ svaṃ kāryaṃ kurvataḥ sāhāyye vartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17619: tat tadartham. kaś ca tasya svārthaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17621: siddhe ca yāge cayanenopakṛtaṃ bhavati. tasmāt siddhe yāge 'gnicit,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17625: pareṇāvedanād dīkṣitaḥ syāt sarvair dīkṣābhisaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.29 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17633: atha veṣṭyante dīkṣita iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17640: 74*} katham asya daṇḍena dīkṣāṃ kuryāt. teneṣṭyā na dīkṣitaḥ. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17643: tasmān na tāvati dīkṣitaḥ syāt. na ca saṃbhavati sam-uccaye vikalpo nyāyyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17644: pakṣe bādhaḥ syāt. tatra prayogavacano bādhyeta. tasmād bhinneṣv api dīkṣāsaṃbandhavākyeṣu prayogavacanena sahaikavākyatety āvedanakāle dīkṣitaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:17649: *{5/73: E1 gibt dīkṣām asya karotīty arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17650: iṣṭyante vā tadarthā hy aviśeṣārthasaṃbandhāt // MS_5,3.30 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17655: evaṃ sā dīkṣiṣyamāṇasya. tasmād vākyād avagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17657: dīkṣākāraṇe padārthe nirvṛtte kim iti na dīkṣitaḥ syāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17658: vākyaṃ hi nirapekṣaṃ dīkṣita iti jñāpayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17659: yat tu, dīkṣāsaṃbandho daṇḍena dīkṣayatīti. kathaṃ sa dīkṣitatve syād iti daṇḍenaivaṃ dīkṣitaṃ saṃpādayatīty{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17661: anantaraṃ dīkṣitaśabdo nāstīti. na śabdasyāprayogo 'rthābhāve hetuḥ. saty apy arthe tadavasarābhāvān na prayujyate śabdaḥ. anyena ca dīkṣita ity avagamyate vākyena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17662: āgnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped dīkṣyamāṇa iti. yac ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17663: āvedanakāle dīkṣitaśabda iti. iṣṭyante 'pi dīkṣitasyāsāv aviruddhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17674: samākhyānaṃ ca tadvad iti yadvan nyāya upadiṣṭaḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17676: yathā snānīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ceti. tasmāc ca paśyāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17680: iha kāmyā iṣṭaya udāharaṇam. aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17690: tad eva prayoge bhavitum arhati. evaṃ pāṭhakramo 'nugṛhīto bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17696: na vā, ayaṃ{*5/79*} kramo niyamyeta. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17697: asaṃbandhāt. pṛthak pṛthag eṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ prayogavacanāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17698: tāni svapadārthānām upasaṃhārakāṇi. yo yasya nopakārakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17701: tasyopakurvataḥ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. na caitāni karmāṇy anyonyasyopakurvanti. tasmān naiṣāṃ kramaḥ sāhāyye vartate. tasmād asaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17710: tad eva punar ucyate parihartum. evaṃ krameṇa pāṭho 'rthavān bhaviṣyatīti. etad ābhāṣāntaṃ sūtram.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17711: syād vidyārthatvād yathā pareṣu sarvasvārāt // MS_5,3.36 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17715: karmāvabodhanārthāyāṃ vidyāyāṃ kramaniyamādṛṣṭaṃ tadāśrayam eva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17720: tasyāpi sarvasvārāt pareṣāṃ sarvasvāreṇa yaḥ kramas tasyādṛṣṭārthatāvaśyaṃ kalpanīyā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17725: ya etenāniṣṭvāthānyena yajeta gartapatyam eva taj jāyate pra vā mīyata iti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17726: ya eteneti kasya [582] ayaṃ vāda iti praśnenaivopakramaḥ. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17729: tasya hi prakaraṇe bhavaty etad vacanam. prakṛtavācīni ca sarvanāmāni bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17736: 83*} iti, agniṣṭomasya hi bhavanti navatiśataṃ stotrīyāḥ. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17739: tāni catvāri. sā ekonasaptatiḥ. pañcadaśo mādhyaṃdinaḥ pavamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17742: caturaśītyā saha dvipañcāśac chatam. saptadaśa ārbhavaḥ pavamānaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17743: tena ṣaṣṭyadhikaṃ śataṃ nava ca. ekaviṃśaṃ yajñāyajñīyam iti tad etan navatiśatam agniṣṭomasya,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17750: atha jyotiṣṭomavikārāṇām evaikāhādīnām iti. kiṃ tāvat prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17755: tatprakṛter vāpattivihārau hi na tulyeṣūpapadyete // MS_5,3.40 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17763: na hi śabdasyārthaḥ samīpagatena kṛtaprayojanenaikadeśe 'vasthāpayitavyo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17764: na hi vākyena śrutir bādhyate. atha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17766: tato natarāṃ saṃsthāvādaḥ. kathaṃ punar āpattivihārau?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17768: sa uttarān ekāhān asṛjata te sṛṣṭvā abruvan{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17769: 85*}, na vai svenātmanā prabhavāma iti. tebhyaḥ svātantryaṃ prāyacchat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17771: yathā vā idam agner jātād adhyagnayo{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17774: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17781: sa tam ityevam āhur eko yajña iti. ete vai sarve jyotiṣṭomāḥ bhavantīti. evaṃ vaikṛtānāṃ saṃkīrtanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17782: teṣām eva vāda iti gamyate. katham?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17793: yady evaṃ na tarhi tadvikārāṇāṃ vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17802: vidhipratyayād vā na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt // MS_5,3.42 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17803: atrocyate, yady apy āpattivihārau na vidhīyete, te{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17804: 90*} tathāpi codakena vidhīyete. ye prakṛtau kartavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17805: te codakavacanād vikṛtāv api kartavyā gamyante. tadāpattivihārāv iva yatra bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17806: tenānyeneti gamyate. na hy akasmāt praśaṃsā syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17808: sa katham anayā praśaṃsayā lakṣyetetyevamarthā praśaṃsā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17820: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17824: 94*}, sa tam. trivṛdādaya ekastomakāḥ. tasmāt teṣāṃ vāda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17826: *{5/91: E2: kim ekastomakasya. krator eṣa vāda utaikastomakasyānekastomakasya ceti. kiṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17830: sarveṣāṃ vā codanāviśeṣāt praśaṃsā stomānām // MS_5,3.44 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17833: aviśeṣavacanād anyaśabdasya. nanv ekastomakāḥ kratavaḥ saṃkīrtyante. satyaṃ saṃkīrtyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17836: yo vai trivṛd anyaṃ yajñakratum āpadyate sa taṃ dīpayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17841: kramako yo 'rthaśabdābhyāṃ śrutiviśeṣād arthaparatvāc ca // MS_5,4.1 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17842: iha pāṭhakramasya śrutyarthakramābhyāṃ saha bādhāṃ prati vicāraṇam{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17846: pāṭho 'pi hi kāraṇaṃ śrutyarthāv api. na ca prāmāṇye kaścid viśeṣo 'sti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17847: tasmād aniyama iti. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17855: evam abhinirvartayitavyam ity avagamyate. tasyārthavattvenaikayopapattyā tasyaivānuṣṭhānam{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17861: 100*}, pradhānam abhinirvartayatīti sarvaṃ kriyate. tasmāt pāṭhas tābhyāṃ bādhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17869: yadi pāṭho balavān. siddhānte śrapaṇaṃ pūrvam, tato homaḥ. [587]{*5/102*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17881: uta mukhyakrameṇa pūrvam āgneyasyeti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17883: avadānādiṣu prāvṛttikena pūrvaṃ dadhna iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17884: evam anujñātebhyo vyavadhāyakebhyo nābhyadhiko 'nyo vā vyavadhāyakaḥ kalpito bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17885: darśayati ca dadhnaḥ pūrvam eva deyam{*5/103*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17895: 105*} ity uktam. abhighāraṇam avadānaṃ ca tasya pradānacikīrṣayaiva kriyate. āsādanam api pradānārtham evāsann akaraṇam{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17896: 106*}, evaṃ dṛṣṭārthatā bhavati. tasmān mukhyakrameṇāṅgānāṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17897: yat tu, dadhnaḥ pūrvaṃ pravṛttir iti. arthāt pūrvaṃ pravṛttiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17898: na pāṭhāt. prāvṛttikāc ca mukhyakramo balīyān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17899: mukhyakrame gṛhyamāṇe prathama ekaḥ padārtho viprakṛṣṭakālaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17900: prāvṛttike punar gṛhyamāṇe sarveṣāṃ viprakarṣaḥ. tasmān mukhyakramo balīyān iti. atha yal liṅgam uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17907: *{5/106: E1 gibt āsann akaraṇam in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:17912: tato hi prathamāv ājyabhāgau yakṣyan bhavatīti. tasmād api mukhyakrameṇa niyama iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17927: somaś caikeṣām agnyādheyasyartunakṣatrātikramavacanāt tadantenānarthakaṃ hi syāt // MS_5,4.6 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17931: agnyādheyasyartunakṣatrātikramavacanāt. yaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇo 'gnīn ādadhīta, nartuṃ sa{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17932: 113*} pratīkṣen na nakṣatram iti. yaḥ somayāgaṃ kartum ādadhīt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17933: sa na pratīkṣeta nakṣatraṃ nāpy ṛtuṃ tāvaty evādadhītety ānantaryam ucyate. itarathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17935: 114*}, ānantarye 'napekṣyamāṇe yasyaivartunakṣatre ukte tasyaiva tayor anādaraḥ kīrtitaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17936: tasmād asti somādhānayor ānantaryam iti. api ca vispaṣṭā cādyatanī vibhaktiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17941: tatrāyaṃ śabdo vipratiṣidhyeta. tasmād ānantaryavivakṣety avagamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17950: yaḥ somena yajeta sa agnim ādadhīteti ca. sarvair apy asau yakṣyamāṇo 'gnim ādhatte somenāgnihotrādibhiś ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17951: nāsati somasya viśeṣe somārthatā syāt. ayam asau viśeṣaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17953: ayakṣyamāṇasya ca pavamānahaviṣāṃ kālanirdeśād ānantaryād viśaṅkā syāt // MS_5,4.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:17956: sa purā saṃvatsarād dhavīṃṣi nirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17958: sarvasya vihitatvāt. tasmād anantaram ayakṣyamāṇa iti gamyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17961: idaṃ prayojanasūtraṃ varṇyate. kṣīṇam adhikaraṇam. kiṃ prayojanaṃ cintāyāḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17962: iṣṭir ayakṣyamāṇasya somena nirabhisaṃdhika ādhāne. tadarthatve tu somapūrvatvam{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17970: kiṃ trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17973: brāhmaṇasyobhau kalpāv iti. atha vā karmāntaram idam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17976: brāhmaṇasyobhāv eva kalpāv iti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17977: trayāṇāṃ varṇānām iṣṭipūrvatvaṃ somapūrvatvaṃ vā. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:17978: aviṣeśāt. na kiṃcid viśeṣam avagacchāmaḥ. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17982: sa someneṣṭvāgnīsomīyo bhavati. yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ haviḥ, tatra hy{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:17984: tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. kim iva hi vacanaṃ na kuryāt. tasmād brāhmaṇasya somapūrvatvam eveti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:17991: aviśeṣāt, na hi kalpayor brāhmaṇasya kaścid viśeṣa āmnāyate. nanv idānīm evoktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:17996: tatra na nyāyaḥ kramate. tulyayor ekadeśa utkṛṣṭe nūnam aparo 'py ekadeśa utkṛṣyata iti. [591]{*5/119*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:17999: yad ucyate, kevalā paurṇamāsy utkṛṣyata iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18002: itarathā na syāt phalam. ekadeśatvāt paurṇamāsyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18003: kevalāyām utkṛṣyamāṇāyām avaśiṣṭasya pūrvatra kriyamāṇasya na phalaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18005: aphalatvāc coktam api na kriyeta. samudāye cotkṛṣyamāṇe bhavati phalam. tasmād arthāt samudāyasyotkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18010: 120*}, yad evaṃ samudāyasyāsati vacana utkarṣaḥ parikalpyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18012: ūrdhvaṃ somāt syāt. evam ekadeśasyāśrutaṃ phalaṃ na kalpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati. nāmadheyaṃ tu dvayoḥ karmaṇor ekam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18013: akṣāḥ pādāḥ māṣā iti yathā. paurṇamāsadharmakaṃ vā karmāntaraṃ codyata iti karmavidhānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18015: tad vākyasya bādhakam. tasmāt karmāntaram iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18019: karmāntarasyaitadvācakam iti pramāṇābhāvaḥ. prakṛtasya karmaṇo vācakam iti pratyakṣam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18022: anyāyaś cānekārthatvam. dharmagrahaṇe lakṣaṇāśabdaḥ śrutisaṃbhave kalpyaḥ syāt. api cāsya rūpaṃ na gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18023: rūpāvacanān na karmāntaram. tasmāt prasiddhena nāmnā prakṛtasya karmaṇo grahaṇaṃ kālavidhānārthaṃ syāt. phalavattvāc ca kṛtsnasyotkarṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18029: vākyārtho 'pi tāvat tatra gṛhyate. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18030: iha phalasya śravaṇam asti. kalpyaṃ phalam iti yad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18033: tena ca sahaikavākyatā. kālavacanena tu saha pratyakṣeṇaikavākyateti. tasmān na karmāntaram. sthitaṃ tāvad aparyavasitam adhikaraṇam{*5/123*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18038: yaḥ somena yakṣyamāṇo 'gnim ādadhīta, nartuṃ sa{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18047: na pradhānasya. aṅgaguṇavirodhe ca tādarthyād iti vakṣyate{*5/126*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18060: yat pratiṣidhyate. tasmāt somasya kālabādha iti. [593]{*5/130*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:18065: paurṇamāsy ūrdhvaṃ somād brāhmaṇasya vacanāt // MS_5,4.17 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:18071: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18072: nāsti vacanasyātibhāraḥ. tasmāt paurṇamāsīmātram utkṛṣyeta. yat tu phalaṃ nāstīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18082: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havir iti śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18085: nānyad api. prāk somāt kṛtsnaṃ vidhīyate. tato yad vacanenotkṛṣyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18088: tat prāg bhavitum arhati. tasmād ekaṃ havir utkraṣṭavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18092: puroḍāśas tv anirdeśe tadyukte devatābhāvāt // MS_5,4.19 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:18096: yad evādaḥ paurṇamāsaṃ havis tat tarhy anunirvapet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18097: tarhy ubhayadevatyo bhavatīti. yasmāt tasmin kāle so [594]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18099: na prācīne kāle tasmād ado havir anunirvaped iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18100: agnīṣomīyatvaṃ vidhāya dvidevatākatvaṃ hetutvena nirdiśyate. tasmād agnīṣomīyaṃ havir hetumat syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18103: na prāk sāsya devateti bhavati puruṣasyāpi yaṣṭur devatābhisaṃbandhaḥ. tasmāt puroḍāśo 'gnīṣomīyo nānyad dhavir iti siddham.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18106: iti cet paśyasy agnīṣomīyatvāt puroḍāśa iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18107: ājyam api hy agnīṣomīyam. tasmāt tad apy utkṛṣyeta.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18112: vaiṣṇavam iti ca. puroḍāśas tv agnīṣomīya eva. na tv atra miśradevatasya vādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18113: miśradevatasya hi prāg api bhāvo 'vakalpyate. yad api tadānīṃ yajamāno nāgniṣomīyas taddevatārhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18116: viṣṇuṃ vā. tasmāt tasyordhvabhāve na eṣa hetur agnīṣomīyatvaṃ nāma. yathā caturdhākaraṇaṃ miśradevatatvād aindrāgnena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18119: tad dhitaḥ sākāṅkṣān notpadyata iti. evam ihāgnīṣomīyaśabdena na śakyam ājyaṃ vaditum agnīṣomīyo hi asau{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18120: 134*}. tasmāc chakyaṃ prāg yajamānena kartum iti. tasmān na tasyotkarṣe 'gnīṣomīyatā yajamānasya hetur iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18126: vikṛteḥ prakṛtikālatvāt sadyaskālottarā vikṛtis tayoḥ pratyakṣaśiṣṭatvāt // MS_5,4.22 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:18128: aindrāgnam ekādaśakapālaṃ nirvaped ityevamādīni. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18133: paurṇamāsī cānyaḥ kālaḥ. sa yadi vā prakṛtyā gṛhyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18137: na pratyakṣaśrutaḥ prākṛtasyeti nyāyyam. tasmāt sadyaskālā etā vikṛtayo bhaveyur iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18140: tasmād dvaiyahakālyaṃ syāt. codakas tathānugṛhīto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18143: uttaram ahar devatāṃ yajatīti. tasmād dvyahakālam ekam abhinirvartyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18150: 137*} paśunā somenāgrayaṇena vā yakṣyamāṇaḥ sa paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18163: kim ete prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18169: codakena ebhir api ūrdhvaṃ somāt bhavitavyam. sānnāyyasya ūrdhvaṃ somāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18172: āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devatayā sa someneṣṭvā bhavati{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18176: tadvikṛtir api somād ūrdhvaṃ bhavitum arhati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18185: kiṃ darśapūrṇamāsāt prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca prayoktavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18187: aniyamaḥ, aviśeṣāt. evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ, tathā [597]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18192: 144*}. codakenaiṣa dharmo gavādiṣv apy ekāheṣu prāpnoti. tasmāt te 'pi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ūrdhvaṃ kartavyā iti. [598]{*5/145*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:18197: jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyevamādi samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18203: yajetety api. atra svargakāmayāgayoḥ saṃbandho gamyate. tasmiṃś ca saṃbandhe kiṃ yāgaḥ sādhanatvena saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18205: tatra yadi svargakāmasya puruṣasya yāgaḥ kartavyatayā codyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18207: svargecchāviśiṣṭasya sa sidhyatīti gamyate. svargecchā tatra puruṣasya yāgaṃ pratyupadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18208: tena tasya sa sidhyati nānyasyeti. yaḥ svargakāmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18211: tato yāgaviśiṣṭā kartavyateti yāgaḥ sādhako 'bhyupagamyate. sa cāyam ubhayor apy artha ekasmād uccaritād vākyād gamyate{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18212: 146*}, yāgo vā kartavyaḥ kāmo veti. na caitad yaugapadyena saṃbhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18218: [599]{*5/147*} tathedam aparaṃ saṃdigdham. kiṃ prītiḥ svargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18219: uta dravyam iti. yadi dravyaṃ svargaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18224: nāsty atra kāmasya guṇatvena prādhānyena vā śrutiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18233: sarveṣām eva śabdānām arthajñāne laukikaḥ prayogo 'bhyupāyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18234: tasmiṃś ca laukike prayoge dravyavacanaḥ svargaśabdo lakṣyate, kauśikāni{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18237: dvyaṣṭavarṣāḥ striyaḥ svarga iti. yad yat prītimad dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18238: tat tat svargaśabdenocyate. tena sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prītimad dravyaṃ svarga iti mānyāmahe,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18239: upamānāc chabdapravṛttir iti cet. na hi kasmiṃścid anupamite{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18242: tasmān nopamānam. ato dravyaṃ svarga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18246: tad eva hi dravyaṃ kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na svargaśabdo 'bhidhāti. prītiṃ tu na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ na{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18254: 153*} nimittam, nābhidheyaḥ. evam eṣa na prītivacanaḥ prītisādhanavacanas tv eṣa svargaśabda iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18255: nanu svargaśabdo loke prasiddho viśiṣṭe deśe. yāsmin noṣṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18265: na tarhi sa pratyakṣo deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18268: te cākhyātavanta iti cet. na tatra pramāṇam asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18270: te ca dṛṣṭvācakṣīrann iti. tasmād evaṃjātīyako deśa eva nāsti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18271: nanu ca lokād ākhyānebhyo vedāc cāvagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18272: deśa evaṃjātīyakaḥ svarga iti. tan na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18273: puruṣāṇām evaṃvidhena deśenāsaṃbandhād apramāṇaṃ vacaḥ. ākhyānam api puruṣapraṇītatvād anādaraṇīyam. vaidikam api svargākhyānaṃ vidhiparaṃ nāsty
GSP28msbh1-7u:18274: bhavati tu vidhyantareṇaikavākyabhūtaṃ stutiparam. yady api kevalasukhaśravaṇārthāpattyā tādṛśo deśaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18276: prītisādhane svargaśabda iti. tena deśena vyavahārābhāvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18281: yāgo 'tra kartavya iti śrūyate svargakāmasya. tatrāvaśyaṃ svargasya yāgasya ca saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18283: bhavyaṃ karma. bhūtasya ca bhavyārthatā nyāyyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18288: 158*} yadā kāmasyāpi kartavyatāsmād vākyād avagamyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18291: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmād ayam arthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18292: svargakāmo yāgaṃ kuryād iti svargakāmasya yāgaḥ kartavya iti. kartavyaś ca sukhavān,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18293: akartavyo duḥkhavān. kartavya iti cainaṃ brūte. tasmāt sukhaphalo yāgo bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18295: tasya sidhyati nānyasyeti gamyate. tena svargecchā yāgasya guṇabhūtā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18298: dṛṣṭenaiva dvāreṇa. iha tu svargasaṃjñakadravyecchaiva niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18299: yathaiva sā guṇabhūtā prāptā. tathaiva sati niyamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18301: nādṛṣṭenopakāreṇa. tena svargechayā guṇabhūtayā svargadravyaṃ prati yatiṣyate yāgaṃ sādhayitum. athāpy adṛṣṭena,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18307: *{5/150: E1 (v.l.): nety āha, na hi kasmiṃścid anupamāne}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:18319: prītiviśiṣṭe dravye svargaśabdo vartata iti. yady evam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18320: pūrvaṃ tarhi prītau vartitum arhati. tāṃ hi sa na vyabhicarati. vyabhicarati punar dravyam. yasyaiva prītisādhanasya dravyasya vaktā svargaśabaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18321: tad eva yadā na prītisādhanaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18327: sa daṇḍasya vācakaḥ. iha punaḥ svargaśabdaḥ eva prīter abhidhātā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:18331: prītyarthaṃ hi puruṣo yatate, tena na [602]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:18332: 160*} prītir yāgasādhanam iti vijñāyate. dravyaṃ hi yāgasādhanam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18334: yasmād dravyadevatākriye yajatiśabdo vartate. asatyām api prītyāṃ bhavati yāgaḥ. yadi ca yāgo na prītyartho bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:18344: 161*}. ucyate, yady api yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ śrūyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19379: kiṃ tasya tasya kṛtsnena phalenārthinaḥ satre 'dhikāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19384: ṛddhikāmā ityevamādi vidhīyamānam ṛddhilakṣiteṣu samasteṣu vyasteṣu ca prāptam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19386: tena taṃ tam adhikuryāt parṣadaṃ veti bhavati saṃdehaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19388: ekaiko na samartho bahukartṛkaṃ satraṃ racayitum,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19389: parṣadaṃ tu kartrīm arthinīm avagacchāmaḥ. na cākartuḥ phalaṃ bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19394: tasya tasyārthinaḥ kṛtsnaṃ phalaṃ satrān nirvartate. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19396: sahakriyamāṇe sarva ekaikaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati tantreṇa,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19400: ekaiko na śaknoti bahukartṛkaṃ kartuṃ iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19403: tadānyān saṃkhyānirvṛttyarthaṃ sāmādibhiḥ prayokṣyate. ekam ekaḥ puruṣārthaṃ sādhayati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19405: tena sarve kartāraḥ savyapekṣā bhaviṣyanti. sarve cet kartāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19412: yad ekaṃ karma bahubhiḥ kriyata iti. yady ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19414: ekena karmaṇi kṛte dvitīyaḥ kiṃ kuryād iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19416: tantreṇa tu kriyāyāṃ bhavati kvacit saṃbhavaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19418: 300*} syāt, yathaikaikasya sattvasya hastino 'śvasya vā darśanam ekaikena kṛtsnam abhinirvartyate. evam eva satre tantrabhāvo bhavet,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19423: utpattyaiva tu saṃkhyayā karma saṃyujyate. yadi hy utpannaṃ saṃyujyeta,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19425: utpattisaṃyoge tv etan nāsti. tasmād ekaikasya kṛtsnena phalenābhisaṃbandha iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19436: athavaika eva yajeteti. nanu tṛtīya uktam{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19446: puruṣe yāgaṃ śrāvayitvā kṛtārthaḥ śabda ekasya dvayor bahūnāṃ vā yāgaṃ na vārayati. nāsau puruṣo yāge śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19448: yāgena vā phalam abhinirvartayed iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19449: yāgena phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti. yāgasya vā phalanirvṛtter vā nāṅgaṃ puruṣaḥ. yadi hy aṅgam abhaviṣyad yāge phalanirvṛttau vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19450: tadā saṃkhyā guṇabhūtā tadaṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ paricchindyāt. atha punar aṅgabhūtaṃ puruṣaṃ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19453: yāvān arthī samarthaś ca tāvantaṃ sarvam adhikṛtyaitad ucyamānaṃ na śakyate ekena vacanena viśeṣayitum. kathaṃ ca puruṣaprādhānyam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19461: eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti. tathā ca darśayati,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19465: 308*} iti bahubhyo yajamānebhya iti dvayor bahūnāṃ ca yāgaṃ pradarśayati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19478: tataś ca phalaṃ prāpnuyād iti. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19480: katarad atra jahīma iti nādhyavasyāmaḥ. tasmād ubhayam api pratyetavyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19483: ubhayaṃ ca pratīyate. tasmād ubhayārthavacanataiva nyāyyā. yāgaṃ prati ca guṇabhāvād vivakṣitam ekavacanam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19486: *{5/310: E2: ced bhavān paśyatv avivakṣitam ekatvam iti. pratyarthaṃ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19489: tādarthye puruṣe pradhānabhūte sati nāṅgabhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19493: vacanasyārthavattvāt. ato na guṇabhāvaḥ kartur avakalpate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19495: sā yadi phalotpattiṃ yāgotpattiṃ vā vidhatte,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19498: tadā yāgaḥ phalaṃ vā tādarthyena. na caitad yaugapadyena bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19501: yathobhābhyāṃ bāhubhyām iṣūn asyati devadatta iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19507: tadā yāgasya phalasya vā guṇabhāvo gamyate. tatra vyāpṛtatvān na tayoḥ prādhānyam api gamyate. tasmān na yāge phale vā puruṣasya guṇabhāvaḥ. ato yāthākāmyaṃ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19508: eko dvau bahavo vā yajerann iti. [638]{*5/312*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:19522: śabdapramāṇakāś ca vayam īdṛśeṣv artheṣu. kathaṃ tarhi kāmasyātmasaṃbandho 'vagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19526: na parasya. yatra tūbhāv arthau vaktavyau bhavataḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19532: tatra guṇabhāvaḥ prādhānyaṃ ca gamyate. na tv atraivaṃ dve vidhāyike śrutī vidyete. guṇabhūtas tu puruṣaḥ śrūyate bhāvayed iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19536: sukhasaṃbandhenātmanas tu kṛtyam. tasmāt saṃbandhāt puruṣaprādhānyaṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19537: na śruteḥ. ato guṇabhūtasya puruṣasya saṃkhyā vivakṣiteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19544: evaṃ sati yadi svargakāmo 'nyasyāpi svargaṃ kāmayamāno bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19545: anyasya svargaṃ kāmayamāno 'py anyo yajeta. tatra pūrvokto nyāyaḥ pratyuddhṛto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19551: 319*} svargakāmaśabdo na vācaka iti. kathaṃ tarhi?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19552: phalam asau na prāpnotīti. kathaṃ punaḥ phalasyāprāptiḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19568: phalavidhiś ca sūktavākena prastaraṃ praharatīti vidhānāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19571: itarathādṛṣṭaṃ kalpyeta. tasmād ānuṣaṅgikaphalārtham anyasya svargakāmo 'nyo yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19580: evaṃ svārthenādhānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati. na hy ādhānasya svārthatāyām asti viśeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19581: pradhānaphalaṃ vānuṣaṅgikaṃ vā sarvam evādhātari samavetum arhati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19585: yadi nityaṃ nāyurādikāmaḥ. tasmān nāvasthito nyāyaḥ pratyuddhriyeta{*5/

GSP28msbh1-7u:19598: dviyajamānake bahuyajamānake ca karmaṇi pratipad vidhāne karma tathā yuktaṃ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19607: samavetaṃ hi karma vidyate dvābhyāṃ yajamānābhyāṃ bahubhiś ca yajamānaiḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19610: teṣu pratipad vidhānam arthavad bhaviṣyati. tasmād eko yajeteti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19613: grāmakāmo yajetetyevamādi karma samāmnāyate. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19614: kiṃ prakrāntaṃ niyogataḥ samāpanīyam utecchayā kāryaṃ heyaṃ veti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19620: upakramād ārabhya yāvat parisamāptir ity etāvān vyāpāraviśeṣas tasyārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19621: na yathā pākas tyāga iti. tatra hi pākasattāmātraṃ nirdiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19623: 332*} iti. evaṃ cākhyātārthaṃ laukikā api pratipadyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19624: tatra nārambhe puruṣaprayatnaś codyata iti gamyate. yataś coditaṃ na niyogata ārabhante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19629: parisamāptyām arthaprāptatvād ārambhasya. tasmāt parisamāptiḥ śabdārtha iti gamyate. sā cec chabdārthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19631: ārambhe nāsti kartavyatāvacanam. tena na niyogata ārambhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19632: niyogatas tu parisamāptiḥ. tenopakrānte karmaṇi yadi vīyāt phalecchā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19639: yāgasya tu kartavyatā śrutyā gamyate. tasmād grāmakāmena{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19640: 335*} yāga ārabdhaḥ parisamāpanīyaḥ. grāmādikāmanāvacanaṃ nimittatvena tadā bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19641: nimitte cotpanne yat kartavyam ity ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19644: na hi tadvinaṣṭam anutpannaṃ bhavati. utpattiś ca nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19645: na bhāvaḥ. tasmād vītāyām api phalecchāyām upakrāntaṃ parisamāpayitavyam. kriyāyā hi nimittam ārambhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19650: *{5/334: E2: kartavyam iti codyate yad iṣṭaphalam. nanv}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19653: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aniyamo vā. kasmāt?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19657: sā hi vidhīyamānā phalasya vā yāgasya vā syāt. phalasya na tāvad vaktavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19658: na hi yo yat kāmayate tasya tat kartavyatopadeṣṭavyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19663: yāgena kriyata iti. na ca yāgasya kartavyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19667: tadā na virodhaḥ. yāgakartavyatāyāṃ phalaṃ kalpyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19668: na ca kalpyamānasya pramāṇam asti. kartavyopadeśaś ca śakyādiṣv artheṣu bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19669: tasmān na yāgaḥ kartavyaḥ. phalakāmasya yad iṣṭaṃ tat kartavyam anūdya yathāprāptaṃ yāgasya sādhanatā vidhīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19672: evam upakrāntaṃ nāvaśyaṃ samāpayitavyam. yat tu vākyārthaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19674: tatra vākyārtho gṛhyata ity uktam eva. tasmād aniyamaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19676: *{5/336: E1 gibt phalaṃ cikīrṣamāṇasya in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19679: niyamo vā tannimittatvāt kartus tat kāraṇaṃ syāt//6.2.15//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19681: tat kartuḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt. kiṃ kāraṇam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19682: satyasaṃkalpatā yo hy ārabdham evaṃjātīyakaṃ samāpayati, na taṃ{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19685: śiṣṭavigarhaṇā ca doṣaḥ. tasmād ārabhya samāpayitavyam. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19686: śiṣṭāḥ punaḥ kim arthaṃ vigarhanta iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19692: kenacid gṛham upakrāntaṃ bhavati śakaṭaṃ ratho vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19698: yathaiva vaidikāni tathaiva tāni niyogataḥ parisamāpayīyāni. kutaḥ?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19703: pūrvasyāṃ diśy etā devatā itarāsv etā iti, yadi{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19709: teṣāṃ ca laukikānām aparādhe tais takṣabhiḥ prāyaścittaśāstram āmnāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19710: āre bhagna indrabāhur baddhavyaḥ pāyasaṃ ca brāhmaṇo bhojayitavya iti. prāyaścittaṃ ca yady adṛṣṭārtham,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19712: tato 'py adṛtam eva tad iti gamyate. [644]{*5/343*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:19716: tasmād arthena gamyetāprāpte vā śāstram{*5/345*} arthavat//6.2.18//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19717: tuśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. aśāstrā tv eṣām upasaṃprāptir iti brūmaḥ. smṛter asyāḥ śāstraṃ bhavatānumīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19719: na ca smṛtim antareṇa takṣṇāṃ grantha upapadyata iti. ata ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19721: evam idaṃ gṛhādi karma ramaṇīyaṃ bhavatīti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19722: nāsmāt karmaṇo 'dṛṣṭaṃ kiṃcid iti. yā cāsau ramaṇīyatā sāntareṇāpi śāstram,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19724: jñātvā ca smaryate. tasmāt nāsyāḥ smṛteḥ śāstraṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:19727: tataḥ śāstram atrārthavad iti prakalpyeta. tasmān nedaṃ śāstroktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19728: śāstrokte ca sāmikṛte tyakte 'tyantaṃ śiṣṭā garhante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19729: devatāśraye ca. nanv atrāpi devatāḥ parigṛhītāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19730: asyāṃ diśīyaṃ devatā yakṣyate 'syām iyam iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19737: pratiṣedheṣv akarmatvāt kriyā syāt pratiṣiddhānāṃ vibhaktatvād akarmaṇām// 6.2.19//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19740: na laśunaṃ na gṛñjanaṃ ceti. tatra saṃdehaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19743: atha vā niyogato varjayitavyam eveti. kiṃ prāptam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19750: yadi vā bhakṣaṇaṃ na kartavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19751: yadi nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam ity abhyupagamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19753: nañ bhakṣayati viśeṣaṇam. tadvyāpārāc ca kartavyatayā nañ na saṃbadhyate{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19757: śrutiś ca vākyād balīyasī. tasmād abhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19759: na tasya kartavyatāsti. tasmād yas tatra mānaso vyāpāraḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19761: yenopāyena nañviśiṣṭaṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ bhavati. pūrvaṃ nañbhakṣayatyoḥ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19763: nodyantam ādityam īkṣetetyevamādiṣu prajāpativrateṣu kurvataḥ phalam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19773: mit MS nañ saṃbadhyate zu lesen}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:19774: śāstrāṇāṃ tv arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate tayor asamavāyitvāt tādarthye vidhyatikramaḥ//6.2.20//
GSP28msbh1-7u:19776: yuktaṃ yat prajāpativrateṣu śāstrāṇām arthavattvena puruṣārtho vidhīyate. tatra niyamaḥ kartavyatayopadiśyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19779: yo na kartavyaḥ sa pāpodayaḥ. kathaṃ punaḥ prajāpativrateṣu niyamaḥ kartavyatayā codyata iti. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19780: tasya vratam iti prakṛtya prajāpativratāni samāmnātāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19781: vratam iti ca mānasaṃ karmocyate. idaṃ na kariṣyāmīti yaḥ saṃkalpaḥ. katamat tad vratam?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19785: tasya ca pālanam. tatra tasmāt puruṣārtho 'stīty avagantavyam. tatra caitāny eva [646]{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19792: na hi kalañjaṃ bhakṣayan pratiṣedhāvidhiṃ nātikrāmati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19793: iha punar ādityaṃ paśyan nātikrāmati vidhim,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19794: na hi tasya darśanaṃ pratiṣiddham. niyamas tatropadiṣṭaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19797: iha tu pratiṣidhyate kalañjādi. katham avagamyate?
GSP28msbh1-7u:19799: vratam iti prakṛtya vacanam asti. na ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19800: na bhakṣayitavyam ity asya mānaso vyāpāro 'rthaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19801: bhakṣayitavyam iti ca bhakṣaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ śabdenocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19802: neti tat pratiṣidhyate śrutyaiva. evaṃ prasiddho 'rtho 'nugṛhīto bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19804: śrutilakṣaṇāviśaye ca śrutir nyāyyā na lakṣaṇā. tasmād iha pratiṣedhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19806: 350*} nāma, doṣo 'tra na śrūyate. tasmāt pratiṣiddham apy anuṣṭhātavyam iti. kalpayiṣyata iti cet, na,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19809: vyartho 'pi hy upadeśo 'jñānāt saṃbhavati. tasmān na kalpyo doṣa ity. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19815: yac chiṣṭā varjayanti. tasmān niyogataḥ kalañjādi na bhakṣayitavyam iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19818: tatra doṣadarśanān niyogato na sarpāyāṅgulir dīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19822: *{5/349: E1 gibt etāvatā kṛtenāyukta enasā bhavati in Klammern}*

GSP28msbh1-7u:19848: yāvajjīvaṃ darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti puruṣārtho 'yaṃ yāgo vidhīyate{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19849: 356*}, nāyam abhyāsaḥ karmaśeṣa ity uktam. ihedānīṃ saṃdihyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:19884: nanu viguṇasyāpi prayogān na kāla ādaraṇīya iti. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:19886: nimittaṃ hy etad ity uktam. tasmād anyeṣu kāleṣv avihitatvāt kṛtam apy akṛtaṃ syāt. tasmād āśritakālasya yāvajjīvaṃ prayoga iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19892: apa vā eṣa svargāl lokāc chidyate yo darśapūrṇamāsayājī san paurṇamāsīm amāvasyāṃ vātipātayed iti{*5/
GSP28msbh1-7u:19894: tadā kasyātipattiḥ syāt. tasmād api na satatam abhyāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:19908: tathā kiṃ sakṛt paurṇamāsyām amāvāsyāyāṃ vā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21390: tṛtīyā vibhaktir bhavati. sā ca śākhāyāṃ tṛtīyā. tasmāt prastarasya śākhā guṇabhūtā,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21418: sā tṛtīyārthe. katham avagamyate. sahayoge ekasmin{*6/
GSP28msbh1-7u:21419: 154*} kāla ubhayam api prahartavyam iti. atra yasya nirjñātaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21435: na ca, śākhayā prastarasyopakāro dṛṣṭaḥ kriyate. kāṣṭaṃ dahyamānasya tṛṇasya nopakāre vartate. tṛṇaṃ tu kāṣṭhasyopakuryāt. tasmān na śākhā prastarārthā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21440: 155*} iti. ucyate, yadi prastarasya prahriyamāṇasyāṅgabhūtā śākhā, tato vinā{*6/
GSP28msbh1-7u:21442: na prahartavyā bhavati. athāṅgabhūtā vināpi prastareṇa prahartavyā. asmābhir uktaṃ prastarakāle prahartavyeti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21454: tathā sāṃnyāyyapakṣe śākhā satī hi pratipādyata iti. tatraivopaveṣo nānyatreti. [701]{*6/159*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:21457: abhyudaye kālāparādhād ijyācodanā syāt yathā pañcaśarāve // MS_6,5.1 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:21464: tān agnaye dātre puroḍāśam aṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapet,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21472: tatrejyācodanā syāt. katham. puroḍāśam agnaye dātre madhyamān kurvate{*6/
GSP28msbh1-7u:21473: 163*}, ye sthaviṣṭhās tān indrāya pradātre dadhani caruṃ kuryāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21477: 166*} gamyate. yathā pañcaśarāve dravyadevatāsaṃbandhena karmāntaraṃ gamyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21484: tān viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāḥ,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21507: 168*} vibhajed ity atra tāvad vibhāgamātraṃ vidhīyate. anyat sarvam anūdyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21514: teṣāṃ śṛtasahitānāṃ viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭo devatā vidhīyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21530: tatas tasmin dadhani caruḥ kṛta iti,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21561: prakṛte yāge devatā vidhīyata ity uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21566: sāṃnyāyye 'pi doṣaḥ. tad api hy abhyudaye tatkālāpabhraṃśād duṣṭam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21567: na tasyāduṣṭatvād aviśiṣṭaṃ hi kāraṇam // MS_6,5.8 //

GSP28msbh1-7u:21588: tasminn evābhyudaye saṃśayaḥ. kim upāṃśuyāge 'pi devatāpanayo bhaven neti. kiṃ prāptam. upāṃśuyājo yathāprakṛti syāt. kasmāt. avacanāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21592: kṣodiṣṭhānāṃ viṣṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caru iti. naitad upāṃśuyāje 'sti. tasmāt sa yathādevataṃ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:21596: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. upāṃśuyājasyāpanayaḥ. kena kāraṇena. pravṛttyā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21597: akāle tantrapravṛttir devatāpanayasya kāraṇam. kutḥ. na hy atrābhyudaye sati taṇḍulā vibhāgārtham upādīyante. kiṃ tarhi. abhyuditasya haviṣo vibhāga ucyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21617: asminn evodāharaṇe saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ yadi nirupte 'bhyudayo 'vagamyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21623: vāśabdaḥ pakṣaṃ vyāvartayati. akāle tantrapravṛttimātre syād etad vidhānam. prāptaṃ hi tāvaty eva nimittam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21624: yasya havir abhyudetīti havir grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇatvena. yasya havir abhyudetīti havir lakṣita udayo nimittam,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21650: anirupte 'bhyudite prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathyas taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt // MS_6,5.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:21651: pravṛttamātraṃ nimittam iti sthitam. naimittikas tu devatāpanayo devatāntarasaṃyogaś ca,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21655: 188*} anirupte 'bhyudite prākṛtībhyo nirvaped ity āśmarathya ācāryo manyate sma. kutaḥ. taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayāt. taṇḍulabhūteṣv apanayaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21656: yasya havir niruptaṃ purastāc candramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulān vibhajed ity abhyudayāvagamād

GSP28msbh1-7u:21670: uta tūṣṇīm eveti. kiṃ prāptam. vinirupte sāminirupta ity arthaḥ{*6/
GSP28msbh1-7u:21671: 189*}. na tatra devatāpanayaḥ syāt. kutaḥ. tadguṇatvāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:21674: 190*} sa ca nirvāpas tad devatākaḥ. kutaḥ. catuḥsaṃkhyāpūraṇārthatvād abhyāsamātraṃ kartavyam. tac cābhyāsamātraṃ punaḥ kriyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21679: *{6/189: E1 hat sāminirupta ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:21681: na prākṛtībhyo nirvaptavyam. kābhyas tarhi. vaikṛtībhyaḥ. kutaḥ. aprākṛtena devatāviśeṣeṇa saṃyogaḥ śrūyate,

GSP28msbh1-7u:21686: anyāś copajātāḥ. tasmād vaikṛtīnāṃ saṃyogena nirvāpaśeṣaḥ kartavya iti.
