GSP28msbh1-7u:23560: cintitā. uttareṇedānīm avihitetikartavyatākeṣv aindrāgnādiṣu cintayitum iṣyate. tatra
GSP28msbh1-7u:23561: yadi darśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ prakaraṇe ye vihitā dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23563: tatas tair eva dharmair aindrāgnādayo 'pi dharmavanta uktāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23564: tathā kartavyāś ceti. nārtha uttareṇa ṣaṭkena. atha ye yasya prakaraṇa ucyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23570: tadā ke kiyanto vā kathaṃ cānuṣṭātavyā iti. tad artham uttaraḥ ṣaṭkaḥ pravartanīyaḥ{*7/2*}.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23571: tatra saptamena tāvat santi dharmā ity ucyate. aṣṭamena ceme 'syeti. itthaṃ prayoktavyā iti navamena. daśam aikādaśadvādaśair etāvantaḥ prayoktavyāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23575: kathaṃ yajir guṇavān syād ity evam artham āmnāyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23576: āhosvid apūrvaprayuktāḥ. katham apūrvaṃ syād iti. yadi yajiprayuktāḥ, [2]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23578: tato yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhante. kiṃ punar atra yuktam. apūrvaprayuktā iti. apūrvaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23579: hi phalavat. aphalo yajiḥ. phalavati ca prayāso vidhīyamāno 'rthavān bhavati. tasmād
GSP28msbh1-7u:23582: śrutipramāṇatvāc cheṣāṇāṃ mukhyabhede yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syād iti. mukhyāny apūrvāṇi. tāni hi phalavattvāt pradhānāni,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23583: pradhāne ca mukhyaśabdaḥ. teṣāṃ bheda uktaḥ śabdāntarādibhir hetubhiḥ. tasmin mukhyabhede sati yathādhikāraṃ bhāvaḥ syāt,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23585: 5*} śiṣyante, te tasyaiva bhaveyuḥ. śrutipramāṇatvād ayam asyāpūrvasya śeṣaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23586: ayam asyety atra śrutir eva pramāṇaṃ kramate. na pratyakṣādīnām anyatamat. śrutyā ca ye yasya prakaraṇe śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23587: te tasyaiva bhavitum arhanti. na cānyasyokto 'rtho 'nyasya bhavati. na hi yad devadattasya grāmāc chādanādikam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23588: tad yajñadattasya bhavati. tasmād yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavasthā dharmāṇām.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23596: yathāprakaraṇaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthā iti. kiṃ tarhi. aikadharmyaṃ syād iti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23597: samānadharmatā. sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthāḥ. kutaḥ. utpattyarthāvibhāgāt. utpattir iti yajiṃ brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23599: yajiprayojanatvāt. tayor avibhāgaḥ. sarvāṇy apūrvāṇi yajimanti. yajisaṃyogena dharmāḥ śiṣyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23600: yajetety uktvoktāḥ. te yajau na saṃbhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23602: 7*} tatrāsaṃbhavantas tatsaṃbaddheṣv apūrveṣu vijñāyante. sa ca yajisaṃbandhaḥ sarveṣām apūrvāṇāṃ tulyaḥ. tasmāt sarvārthā bhavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23605: 10*} iti gotvasaṃbandhena śrūyamāṇās tatrāsaṃbhavantas tatsaṃbaddheṣu piṇḍeṣu vijñāyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23606: tasya ca gotvasaṃbandhasyāviśeṣāt sarvagavīṣu śuklanīlakapilakapotikāsu bhavanti. evam ihāpi.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23607: ucyate, viṣama upanyāsaḥ. tatra gosāmānyasaṃbandhena dharmā vidhīyante. gaur na padā praṣṭavya{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23608: 11*} iti. iha punar yajiviśeṣasaṃbandhena dharmā vidhīyante. darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23609: 12*}, jyotiṣṭomena yajeteti. viśiṣṭayajisaṃbaddha evāpūrve bhavitum arhanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23613: na dharmaiḥ saṃbadhyeta. na hi dvayor vidhīyamānayoḥ paraspareṇa saṃbandho bhavati. anuvādaś ca sann aviśeṣāt sarvayāgānuvādaḥ. tasmāt sarvathā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23614: nanu darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo viśeṣako bhaviṣyati. na darśapūrṇamāsaśabdaḥ śaknoti yāgaṃ viśeṣṭum. ayaṃ hi vidhir vā syād anuvādo vā. yadānuvādaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23615: tadā dharmasaṃbandhārthaḥ. sa ca dharmasaṃbandho yāgānuvādenaiva tayoḥ siddhaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23617: darśapūrṇamāsāv evetthaṃ kuryān nānyān iti. naivaṃ śakyam. yat kāraṇam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23618: na tasyānyanivṛttiḥ arthaḥ. nanu parisaṃkhyayā kariṣyati. nātra parisaṃkhyā yujyate. yady anyena vākyena yāgamātre dharmaprasaṅgaḥ kṛtaḥ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23619: 14*} syāt, tata etat punarvacanaṃ parisaṃkhyāṃ kuryāt. atha punar asati prasaṅge 'nenaiva prasaṅgo 'nenaiva nivṛttir{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23621: [4]{*7/16*} evaṃ tarhi, nātra yajeteti śabdo dharmavidhibhiḥ saṃbadhyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23622: yajetettham iti. kena tarhi. darśapūrṇamāsaśabdena. pratyakṣo hi tenāsya saṃyogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23624: parokṣo dharmavidhibhiḥ. kas tadā vākyārthaḥ. darśapūrṇamāsau kuryād iti. naivaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23625: śakyam. evaṃ sati dharmā asaṃbaddhāḥ pāriplavā bhavanti. kathaṃ kṛtvā. yeyam ākhyātikī vibhaktiḥ yajeteti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23626: sā darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatāṃ vidadhāti. tatra kathaṃ yāgamātreṇa yāgaviśeṣeṇa vā dharmasaṃbandhaḥ syāt. vidhāyikā vibhaktir nāstīty asaṃbaddhā dharmā bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23627: naiṣa doṣaḥ. na vayaṃ vākyena dharmāṇāṃ saṃbandhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ. kena tarhi. prakaraṇena. katham. kartavyatāyāṃ coditāyām itikartavyatākāṅkṣā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23628: kathaṃ kuryād iti. prakaraṇena dharmāḥ saṃbadhyanta itthaṃ kuryād iti. naivaṃ śakyam. yadā hi darśapūrṇamāsau kartavyatayā codyate{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23630: 18*} tayoḥ. asatyāṃ cetikartavyatākāṅkṣāyāṃ prakaraṇam eva nāsti. evaṃ hy uktam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23632: evaṃ tarhi, naivātra yāge dharmā vidhīyante. nāpi darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ kartavyatocyate. kiṃ tarhi. darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti padadvayena viśiṣṭaṃ yāgam anūdyātra dharmā vidhīyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23633: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajetettham iti. evam api darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity anuvādo na yujyate. tṛtīyārthasyāsiddhatvāt. pūrvān anuvādo bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23634: apūrvaś ca tṛtīyārthaḥ. so 'vaśyaṃ vidhātavyaḥ. tasmiṃś ca vidhīyamāne 'nyad evāsaṃbaddham āpadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23635: darśapūrṇamāsau yajeḥ karaṇam iti. tasmāt sa eva prathamaḥ pakṣo 'stu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23637: nanu tatrāpi darśapūrṇamāsābhyām ity etan na saṃbadhyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23638: [5]{*7 /20*} nanu saṃbhantsyate. kālavacanaḥ san prāyiko nityānuvādo bhaviṣyati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23639: prāyeṇa yāgānāṃ darśapūrṇamāsakālatvāt. tṛtīyā ca kālasyārthakṛtaṃ guṇabhāvam ālocyopapadyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23640: tathā cet sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthāḥ bhavanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23648: *{7/13: E2 und E6 lesen: darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajetety atra na śakyante yāgaviśeṣe dharmā vidhātum. kiṃ kāraṇam. yadā yajau dharmā vidhīyante tadā yajir anūdyate. yajetettham iti}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:23654: codanāśeṣabhāvād vā tadbhedād vyavatiṣṭherann utpatter guṇabhūtatvāt // MS_7,1.3 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23655: karmacodanāyāḥ śeṣabhūto dharmasamāmnāya ekadeśabhūta ity arthaḥ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23657: anayāgnyavādhānādikayetikartavyatayeti. tasyāṃ codanāyāṃ yajer guṇabhāvaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23659: 22*}. karaṇabhāvo 'tra yajeḥ śrūyate. darśapūrṇamāsākhyena yāgasamudāyenānyat kuryād iti. yat tato 'nyat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23665: na tu tadyajinā kriyate. vinaṣṭe yajau tad bhavati. apūrvaṃ tu tena kriyate. tasmāt tasya kartavyatā ucyate. yasya kartavyatā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23666: tad itikartavyatayā saṃbadhyate. tasmād apūrvārthā dharmāḥ. teṣāṃ cāpūrvāṇāṃ bhedaḥ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23667: 24*}. atas tadbhedād yathāprakaraṇaṃ vyavatiṣṭhante dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23668: athaitasmin pakṣe kathaṃ darśapūrṇamāsaśabdena yāgo viśeṣyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23669: naivātra yāgo viśiṣyate. kiṃ tarhi. apūrvabhāvanaivobhayapadaviśiṣṭocyate{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23671: 26*} iti. viṣama upanyāsaḥ. tatra hy anyad dravyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23673: 27*}. iha punar yāgaḥ eva tau darśapūrṇamāsau. tenehobhayaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ{*7/ 28*} [6]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23680: 31*}. na caitad yugapad bhavatīti. evaṃ tarhi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23681: naivātra śrutyarthe parigṛhyate. kiṃ tarhi. vākyārthaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇam. śrutyarthe parigṛhyamāṇe
GSP28msbh1-7u:23682: darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo 'narthako bhavati. yajatiś cānuvādaḥ. yajaty ātmakatvād darśapūrṇamāsayoḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23685: *{7/21: E1 hat ekadeśabhūta ity arthaḥ in Klammern}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:23686: *{7/22: E2: śrūyate, darśapūrṇamāsābhyām iti. darśapūrṇamāsaśabdo hi yajivacanaḥ}*
GSP28msbh1-7u:23697: 33*} iti. atra gavākṛtau dharmaḥ śrūyate. ākṛteḥ padārthatvāt. na ca tatra saṃbhavati. ato 'sāv ākṛtiḥ sahacāripiṇḍalakṣaṇārthā vijñāyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23701: sarvapiṇḍeṣu vihitaṃ bhavati. tasmāt tat sārvatrikaṃ pratīyeta. iha tu yajer guṇabhavena śravaṇān naiva yajau dharmāḥ śrūyante. kiṃ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23702: 35*} tarhi. apūrva ity. evam apadiṣṭo hetuḥ. tasmād anupanyāsaḥ satvavad{*7/36*} iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23712: 37*} iti. yajiprayuktā eva. kutaḥ. avibhāgāt. yajināvibhāgo dharmāṇām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23716: yad dravyaṃ devatām uddiśya mantreṇa tyajyate. sa eṣa pratyakṣo yajinā saṃbandho dharmāṇām. apūrveṇa tv ānumānikaḥ. phale 'pi yajeḥ pratyakṣaśruto
GSP28msbh1-7u:23717: svargakāmo yajeteti. ānumāniko 'pūrveṇa. anumānāc ca pratyakṣaṃ balīyaḥ. tasmād yajyarthāḥ dharmāḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23718: nanu yajir bhaṅgitvāt kālāntare phalaṃ dātum asamarthaḥ. tatra kṛtā dharmā asamarthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23719: eva bhavatīty uktam. atra sthitasya nyāyasyākṣepeṇa pratyavasthānaṃ kriyate. tailapānavad
GSP28msbh1-7u:23720: etad bhaviṣyati. yathā tailapānaṃ ghṛtapānaṃ vā bhaṅgitve 'pi sati kālāntare medhāsmṛtibalapuṣṭyādīni
GSP28msbh1-7u:23721: phalāni karoti. evaṃ yajir api kariṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23725: evaṃ ca sati sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthā bhavanti. tathā caindrāgnādiṣu prayājādayaḥ santi. tatra saurye karmaṇi prayājānāṃ darśanam upapadyate. prayāje prayāje kṛṣṇalaṃ juhoti{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23726: 38*} iti. itarathā prayājāś ca vidhātavyāḥ. prayājeṣu ca kṛṣṇalahomaḥ. tathā ca dvyarthaṃ tat syāt{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23727: 39*}. dvyarthatvaṃ ca vipratiṣiddham. tasmād yajiprayuktā dharmā iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23731: utpattau vidhyabhāvād vā codanāyāṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt tataś ca karmabhedaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.7 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23735: codanārthatvād apūrvārthatvād apūrvaprayuktā dharmāḥ. phalavattvād ity ukto hetuḥ. yat tu prayakṣo yajisaṃbandho dharmāṇām iti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23736: utpattau vidhyabhāvāt. utpattir iti yajiṃ brūmaḥ. utpattau yajau nāsti vidhiḥ. yajyarthā dharmā iti. kevalaṃ yajau śrūyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23737: kriyante ca. naitāvatā tadarthā bhavanti. yathā vāsasi rāgaḥ śrūyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23739: vāsasi ca kriyate. na cāsau tadarthaḥ. stryarthaḥ puruṣārtho vā bhavati. evam ihāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:23740: yajau śrūyamāṇāḥ kriyamāṇāś cāpūrvārthā bhaveyur arthavattvāya. tataś ca karmabhedaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:23741: syāt. yato 'pūrvārthā iti. yat tu yajeḥ pratyakṣam{*7 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:23743: 42*} bhavatīti, prāṇāliko vijñāyate. praṇāḍyāpi ca yena kriyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23744: tat kāraṇaṃ bhavati. yathā gomayaiḥ pacati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23746: tailapānavad yajitaḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23747: tailapānasyāpi na kālāntare phalaṃ bhavati. dhātusāmyaṃ tasya phalam. tac ca tatkālam eva. yac ca phalaṃ balapuṣṭyādi,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23748: tat samyag āhārapariṇāmād bhavati. tasmād viṣama upanyāsaḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23752: yadi vāpy abhidhānavat sāmānyāt sarvadharmaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.8 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23756: abhidhānavat sāmānyāt. abhidhānaṃ tāvad eteṣāṃ samānam. apūrvam ity abhidhānavad dharmeṇāpy asya samānena bhavitavyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23759: yo yo vāhīkas tasya tasya yavānnaṃ kriyate. yathā vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23762: 43*} pātavyam iti. sarvatra ca hy akṣyāmaye mudgaudano bhujyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23763: udarāmaye 'pi payaḥ pīyate. evam ihāpy ekasyāpūrvasya ye dharmāḥ śrutās te sarvāpūrvāṇāṃ bhavitum arhanti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23764: api ca, aruṇaparāśarā nāma śākhinaḥ. teṣāṃ paricareṣu smṛtirūpaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati. ye darśapūrṇamāsayor dharmāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23766: yāvat sarvāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayo 'nuktāntā iti. tac cānukramaṇam etam eva nyāyaṃ sūcayati. tasmād apūrvaprayuktatve 'pi sarve dharmāḥ sarvārthā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23768: arthasya tv avibhaktatvāt tathā syād abhidhāneṣu pūrvavattvāt prayogasya karmaṇaḥ śabdabhāvyatvād vibhāgāc cheṣāṇām apravṛttiḥ syāt // MS_7,1.9
GSP28msbh1-7u:23775: so 'vibhaktaḥ. sarvavāhīkeṣv anugata ity arthaḥ. tannimittaś ca prītiviśeṣo na puruṣanimittaḥ. kathaṃ jñāyate. pūrvavattvāt prayogasya. pūrvavān atra prayogaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23776: bahuśo vāhīkāś cāvāhīkāś ca bhojitāḥ. tatrānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ jñatam etat,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23778: na puruṣanimittatā. tasmāt tathā syād vāhīkādiṣv abhidhāneṣu. atheha karmaṇaḥ śabdabhāvyatvam. nānyataḥ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:23780: 45*} dharmā iti. śabdena ca vyavasthitā vijñātā dharmāḥ. apūrvāṇāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23781: ataḥ śeṣāṇām anyatra vihitānām anyatrāpravṛttiḥ syāt. [10]{*7/46*}
GSP28msbh1-7u:23789: pūrvavatī hīyaṃ smṛtiḥ. codakaṃ dharmagrāhakaṃ vakyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23790: vidhyanto vā prakṛtivad iti. tena prāpitānāṃ dharmāṇām ayam anuvādaḥ. etan nyāyapūrvikā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23791: nāprāptānāṃ vidhāyikā. yat kāraṇaṃ vyavasthā dharmāṇām etena nyāyena bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23792: arthasya śabdabhāvyatvāt prakaraṇanibandhanāc chabdād evānyatra bhāvaḥ syāt // MS_7,1.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:23793: idaṃ nigamanasūtram. nigamanaṃ ca pratijñāyā hetoś ca punarvacanam. tad idam ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23796: pratiprakaraṇaṃ ca nibandhanāc chabdād evānyatra bhāvaḥ syāt. yathā gandharvāpsaraso vā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:23798: ya unmādyaty etā vai gandharvāpsaraso yadrāṣṭrabhṛtam. tasmai svāhā tābhyaḥ svāheti
GSP28msbh1-7u:23799: juhotīty agniprakaraṇe utpannānāṃ rāṣṭrabhṛtām udvāhe upadeśaḥ. eteṣāṃ rāṣṭrabhṛto
GSP28msbh1-7u:23800: juhoty abhyātānāṃ juhotīti. asty etasmin vacane yathādhikāraṃ vyavatiṣṭheran dharmā
GSP28msbh1-7u:23801: iti. evaṃ ca saty adharmakāṇy aindrāgnādīṇi. tadartham uttaro 'dhyāyaṣaṭkaḥ prārabdhavya iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:23802: tatra saptam ena tāvad aindrāgnādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ dharmāḥ santīty ucyate. te cātideśeneti.

GSP28msbh1-7u:25132: na dharmā laukikāḥ. kaḥ punar ayaṃ vidhyanto nāma. vidher anto vidhyantaḥ. atha vidhiḥ kaḥ. yad vākyam upalabhya puruṣaḥ kasmiṃścid arthe pravartate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25134: sa vidhiḥ. vidhīyate hy anenārthaḥ. yathā loke devadatta gām abhyāja śuklām{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25136: 288*}. itaro 'ntaḥ. vede 'pi darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ yajeteti vidhyādiḥ. vidhyanto 'pi
GSP28msbh1-7u:25137: pradhānavidhivarjitaṃ kṛtsnaṃ pauroḍāśikaṃ brāhmaṇam. tena sameto 'yaṃ vidhyādir
GSP28msbh1-7u:25138: viśiṣṭāpūrvanirvṛttiṃ prati puruṣaṃ pravartayati. tasmāt so 'syāntaḥ. tathā somena yajeta{*7 /
GSP28msbh1-7u:25139: 289*} iti vidhyādiḥ. saumikam api brāhmaṇaṃ vidhyantaḥ. eṣa vidhyanto nāma.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25141: vidhyanto nāsti. eteṣv api sa vidhyantaḥ kalpyeta. kathaṃ kṛtvā. aparipūrṇaṃ yad vākyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25143: vyavahitakalpanayā vā. tatrādhyāhārād vyavahitakalpanā jyāyasī. adhyāhāre hy aśrutaḥ kalpyeta{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25144: 290*}. itaratra śrutena saṃbandhaḥ. tasmād vyavahito brāhmaṇāvayavo 'sya paripūrakaḥ kalpyate. yathā vasantāya kapiñjalān ālabhate{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25148: tatra na bhavati. tad etanmayūranṛtyam āpadyate. tad yathā,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25149: mayūrasya nṛtyato 'nyadapāvriyate 'nyat saṃvriyate. evam ihāpīdaṃ saṃvriyate tadapāvriyate.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25150: naiṣa doṣaḥ. pratyakṣas tasya tatra bhāvaḥ. iha punar ānumānikaḥ. na cānumānikaṃ
GSP28msbh1-7u:25151: pratyakṣaṃ bādhate. iha tarhi na prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25153: yadi virodhaḥ syāt. na tv asti virodhaḥ. tatrāpi bhaviṣyati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25157: aṣṭame prakṛtiniyamaṃ kariṣyati. iyam asya prakṛtir iti. tad ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25158: vidhyanto vā prakṛter iva pravarteta. yā yā tasya karmaṇaḥ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25162: atha kasmān na laukiko vidhyantaḥ kalpyate. ucyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25163: laukikasya vidher abhāvād vidhyanta eva nāsti. kutas tat kalpaneti. āha,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25166: vaidikī hy atretikartavyatā na laukikī. kasmāt. tathā hi liṅgadarśanaṃ prayājādi samarthitaṃ bhavati.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25178: tena tarhy aliṅge laukikaṃ syāt. yatra karmaṇi kiṃcil liṅgaṃ nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25183: liṅgasya pūrvavattvāc codanāśabdasāmānyād ekenāpi nirūpyeta yathā sthālīpulokena // MS_7,4.12 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:25185: yadi liṅgahetuko vaidika upāyaḥ syāt. na tv asau liṅgahetukaḥ. kiṃhetukas tu. vidhyantahetukaḥ. vidhyanto 'pi nyāyapūrvaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25186: sa ca nyāyas tulyaḥ sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ vaikṛtānāṃ liṅgavatām{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25187: 296*} ca. kutaḥ. codanāśabdasāmānyāt. karmacodanāyāṃ śābdaḥ samānaḥ. sarvatra vidhyādir asti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25188: na vidhyantaḥ. tulyaś cāpekṣayānyatra śrutena vidhyantena saṃbandhaḥ. tad etan nyāyapūrvakaṃ liṅgam ekatrāpi dṛśyamānam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25189: tulyanyāyānāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmavattāṃ jñāpayati. yathā sthālyāṃ tulyapākānāṃ pulākānām ekam upamṛdyāny eṣām api siddhatāṃ jānāti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25190: tulyo hetur asya cānyeṣāṃ ca siddhatvasyeti. tasmāt sarvatra vaidikītikartavyatā.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25193: sāmānyatodṛṣṭam etad upadiśyate. sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ ca yad avyabhicāri,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25194: tat pramāṇam. savyabhicāraṃ caitat. dṛṣṭā hi gaṇayāgādayo 'nevamitikartavyatākāḥ. tasmād dṛṣṭapravṛttitvād ity ahetuḥ.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25195: yat tu vaidikyā bhāgitvāt tatpūrvakāṇi liṅgāni bhaviṣyantīti. atra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25196: 297*} kila hetuḥ. tad bhāvaś ca tasyāḥ śabdapūrvaḥ. śabdena ca darśapūrṇamāsayor asau vijñāyate{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25197: 298*}, na sarvatreti. tasmān na bhāgitvam. ato vidhyantenaivetikartavyatā prāpyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25198: nānyathā. atha kasmād etāni vaikṛtāni vākyāni nyūnāny eva nānumanyante,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25199: kim ebhiḥ pūritaiḥ. nyūnāny anarthakāni bhavanti. bhavantu, ko [63]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25200: 299*} doṣaḥ. śiṣṭair eṣāṃ saṃparigraho na yujyate. pramādād bhaviṣyatīti. nāsty akṣare mātrāyāṃ vā pramādaḥ. kuto etāvati granthe bhaviṣyati. katham. tulyaṃ ca sāṃpradāyikam{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25201: 300*} ity uktam. vyāmoho 'pi viduṣāṃ yugasahasrāṇi bahūni nānuvarteta. yujyate caiṣām apekṣayā pūraṇam. tasmād ūnāni nānumanyante. ato vaidikītikartavyateti
GSP28msbh1-7u:25207: dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvād aikāhikam adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavat // MS_7,4.13 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:25211: 302*} iti, gavāmayane dvādaśāhiko vidhyanta iti vakṣyati{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25213: 304*} iti. tatra codakena dvādaśāhikā dharmāḥ prāpyante. ekāhānām api yathā svaṃ nāmabhiḥ prātisvikāḥ. ye tatra dvādaśāhikā aikāhikair aviruddhāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25214: te yathāprāptaṃ kriyante. viruddheṣu saṃśayaḥ. kiṃ dvādaśāhiko dharmaḥ kartavyaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25215: utaikāhika iti. kiṃ prāptam. tatra sūtreṇaivopakramaḥ. dvādaśāhikam ahargaṇe tatprakṛtitvāt. dvādaśāhaprakṛtitvād vidhyantenaiva prāpyante.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25216: nanv evaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bādhyate. na bādhiṣyate nāmadheyaṃ jyotir ādi. adhikāgamād bhaviṣyati. ye jyautiṣṭaumikebhyo 'dhikāḥ stotraśastravikārāḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25218: ekāhavat. yathā tasminn eva jyotiṣy ekāhe jyotiḥśabdo 'dhikāgamād bhavati. satsu jyautiṣṭaumikeṣu jyotiṣṭome 'bhāvāt. adhikadharmārtho 'yaṃ śabdaḥ, [64]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25219: 305*} na cādhikānāṃ dvādaśāhikair virodho 'sti. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ viruddhaṃ kartavyam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25220: adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād ekāhavad ity etasyāparā vyākhyā. ye dvādaśāhe 'dhikā aikāhikebhyaḥ kecid dharmā ucyante. abhiplavo 'nvahaṃ bhavati{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25221: 307*} anvahaṃ bhavatīti. teṣām adhikānām āgamāt tadākhyaṃ syāt. etad dvādaśāhikam aharjyotirākhyam āyurākhyaṃ vā{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25222: 308*}. katham. ekāhavat. yathā tasminn evaikāhe 'yaṃ jyotirādiśabdo jyautiṣṭaumikebhyo 'dhikeṣu vaiśeṣikeṣu dharmeṣv āgateṣu bhavati,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25223: evam ihāpy adhikāgamasāmānyād gauṇo bhaviṣyati. yathā ṣāḍahikānāṃ pṛṣṭhānāṃ bhāvād ekāho viśvajit ṣaḍaha{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25224: 309*} ity uktam. tam ekāhaṃ ṣaḍaha ity ācakṣata{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25225: 310*} iti. evam ihāpi. gauṇaś cen na prāpakaḥ. tasmān nāsti nāmadheyād dharmaprāptir iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25238: yathā dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. kiṃ liṅgaṃ bhavati. dvābhyāṃ lomāvadyati dvābhyāṃ tvacaṃ dvābhyām asṛg dvābhyāṃ māṃsam{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25241: ātmānam etan nirvadyata iti dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ dvādaśopasattvaṃ darśayati. tad upapadyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25242: yadi dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmajātaṃ virodhi kartavyam. itarathā caikāhikaṃ ṣaḍupasattvaṃ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25244: dvādaśāhikaṃ kartavyam iti. tathedam aparaṃ liṅgam. yasyātiriktam ekādaśinyām ālabheran na priyaṃ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25245: 314*} bhrātṛvyam atiricyeta. atha yad dvau paśū samasyeyuḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25247: 315*}. yady ete brāhmaṇavantaḥ paśava ālambhante nāpriyaṃ bhrātṛvyam atyatiricyate [65]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25249: 317*}, ekādaśinyāṃ vihāraṃ dvādaśāhikaṃ dharmaṃ darśayati. katham. vihāre saty atirekaḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:25250: paśūnām āpadyate. atirekabhayāc ca dvayor dvayoḥ samāsaḥ. ekāhadharmaprāptau vihāro
GSP28msbh1-7u:25251: na syāt. tatraitaddarśanaṃ na yujyate. tasmād dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25259: na vā kratvabhidhānād adhikānām aśabdatvam // MS_7,4.15 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:25260: na vā dvādaśāhikaṃ kāryam. kiṃ tarhi. ekāhikam. kiṃ kāraṇam. codakena dvādaśāhikaṃ prāpnoti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25261: nāmadheyenaikāhikam. nāmadheyaṃ ca codakād balīyaḥ. kutaḥ. pratyakṣatvāt. pratyakṣaṃ nāmadheyam,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25263: nanu vidhyanto 'pi pratyakṣaḥ. satyaṃ prakṛtau pratyakṣo vidhyantaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25268: nanv adhikāryaṃ nāmadheyam ity uktam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25269: adhikānām aśabdatvam. adhikānāṃ śabdo nāsti. ime jyotirādayaḥ śabdāḥ karmanāmadheyānīty uktam. api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yad utpattāv apūrvam avidhāyakatvād{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25270: 318*} iti. yat tu, adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syād iti. tatra brūmaḥ,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25271: vacanād adhikāgamo na nāmadheyena. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25272: teṣv asatsu śabdasyābhāvād iti. naite kadācid āyurādiṣu na santi. kathaṃ teṣām abhāve śabdasyābhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ. yat tu,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25273: jyotiṣṭome nāsti jyotirādiḥ śabda iti. karmāntaratvāt. jyotiṣṭoma āyurādiḥ śabdo nāsti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25274: na dharmābhāvāt. tasmād aikāhikaṃ viruddhaṃ dharmajātaṃ kartavyam iti. adhikāgamāt tadākhyaṃ syāt. ekāhavad ity etasya dvitīyavyākhyāparihāraḥ. gauṇaḥ sann anu[66]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25275: 319*}vādamātram anarthakaṃ syāt. tasmāt pūrvoktena nyāyena nāmadheyaṃ dharmāṇāṃ prāpakam iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25278: liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt tadarthāpatter dravyavat // MS_7,4.16 //
GSP28msbh1-7u:25281: tasya parihāra ucyate. liṅgaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ syāt. liṅgam etatsaṃghātadharmaḥ syāt.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25282: dvādaśāho 'haḥsaṃghātaḥ. sa phalāya codyate. dvādaśāham ṛddhikāmā upeyur iti. gavāmayanam
GSP28msbh1-7u:25283: api ahaḥsaṃghātāntaram. tasminn eva kārye phalasiddhau vidhīyate. tasya tatkāryāpattyā
GSP28msbh1-7u:25286: dravyavat. yathā dravye vrīhau dharmāḥ śrutās te tatkāryāpanneṣu pratinidhibhūteṣu{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25291: naitad yuktam. kutaḥ. arthadharmatvāt. apūrvadharmatvād ity arthaḥ. apūrvadharmo
GSP28msbh1-7u:25292: dvādaśopasattvaṃ na saṃghātadharmaḥ. kasmāt. saṃghātasya guṇatvāt. ahāny atra pradhānāni.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25294: 321*} teṣāṃ guṇaḥ. viśeṣaṇam ity arthaḥ. viśiṣya eva kāryaṃ pratīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25295: na viśeṣaṇe. yathā rājapuruṣa ānīyatām ity ukte puruṣa ānīyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25298: na śākaṃ sūpo vā pratīyate. yad eva pradhānaṃ tat pratīyate. kim ataḥ. ato 'hāni phalavanti,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25299: na saṃghātaḥ. phalavataś ca dharmāḥ. tasmān na dvādaśopasattvaṃ saṃghātadharmaḥ. evaṃ [67]{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25300: 322*} cen na gavāmayane kāryāpattito dharmāḥ prāpyante. ato 'parihāro 'yam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25304: yad uktam{*7 /323*}, dravyavad iti. yuktaṃ dravyeṣu. tatra hi vrīhikāryāpannā nīvārāḥ
GSP28msbh1-7u:25305: kāryāpattitas taddharmāṃl labhante. iha punar dvādaśopasattvaṃ naiva saṃghātadharma
GSP28msbh1-7u:25306: ity apadiṣṭo hetuḥ. tasmād adṛṣṭānto dravyavad iti.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25307: āha, kathaṃ tarhi idaṃ liṅgadarśanam. atrocyate,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25312: prāyaṇīyo 'tirātraḥ. tasya dharmo dvādaśopasattvam. tadupādāne mukhyasyānugrahaḥ. ṣaḍupasattvopādāne jaghanyānāṃ jyotirādīnām,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25313: mukhyasya prāptakālam anugraham atikramitum kiṃcit kāryaṃ{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25314: 324*} nāsti. atas tadanugrahārthaṃ dvādaśopasattvaṃ bhavati. tathā mukhyayā{*7/
GSP28msbh1-7u:25316: na codakaprāptyā. yasmāc codako nāmadheyād abalaḥ. vakṣyati ca,
GSP28msbh1-7u:25337: vāruṇam antata iti. tad anārabhyavādānāṃ prakṛtyarthatvāj jyotiṣṭomaṃ praviṣṭam.
GSP28msbh1-7u:25338: tatrāhnāṃ bahutvasyābhāvād asaṃbhavād aparāṃ prakṛtiṃ dvādaśāham āgatam. tatrāpi
GSP28msbh1-7u:25339: punar jyotirādīnāṃ paryāvarteṣv ity etan na yujyata iti tṛtīyāṃ prakṛtiṃ gavāmayane praviṣṭam{*7 /
